You jump off your master and onto the floor, wagging your tail, as he gets out of his bed. He stretches and yawns, before looking down at you and saying, "Come on, let's get you some food,...

As you eat, however, a strange, warm, tingling feeling begins to spread throughout your body, starting with your paws and spreading outwards from there. Before you can try to figure out what the feeling was, however...

11111121122.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You awaken, stretching out as much as you can without disturbing your master. Your master always liked to keep you close while you slept, although you weren't sure whether it was for warmth, or something else entirely.

One thing you did know about your master was that he was incredibly powerful. He only had to touch the wall and a miniature sun would appear above both your heads. He only had to hunting for an hour or two at most, and returned enough food to last for weeks. Said food was often alien enough to make you ill, particularly a strange brown bar that he had not realised he had dropped, allowing you to take a bite out of it before he threw it away.

You had gotten pretty ill after that, but your master never left your side, always making sure you were okay. It was a testament to your master's power that he could eat the brown bars without becoming violently ill.

Your master could even see distant places in the world, and even outer space, using a black rectangle in one of his rooms. He often invited you to sit next to him while he watched it, you laying your head in his lap. He also had a much smaller version in the room where he slept, being able to manipulate it to a larger degree.

You are shaken as your master rolls over slightly in his sleep, and hugs to to his chest. As he does so, you feel a bizarre tingling feeling run from his arms and into you, and it is only growing stronger!

You weren't sure what this feeling was, but you begin to feel... Powerful, able to do anything for your master...

You can sense a near infinite amount of the tingling energy in your master, so surely he wouldn't mind if you took some of it?

What do you do?
11111121122.title: The Curious Husky

choices: Wake your master up, he'll be pleased with you!
Uh-oh... You can't stop the power flowing into you! Growth time!
111111211222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Hrm...

While your master certainly had a heck of a lot of power, you didn't know the possible effects of taking too much, or if he would be angry if you did so. Better to only take a little bit, then.

You draw your master's power into yourself, and your vocal cords begin to develop in ways you wouldn't think possible, words and phrases and letters and numbers flowing into your brain. You halt your power siphon quickly, having gotten what you desired, and growing a fair few inches in doing so. A gentle stream of golden sunlight emerges from a gap in the curtains as you lay in his arms.

What do you do?

choices: She has another, even bigger, growth spurt
Take her out on a short walk to enjoy her new size
11112121221.content:
You can't help but leave your mouth open as you hear your pet husky speak for the first time, and continue to leave it open as she appears to be...growing?? How is this even possible?

Lily appears to be thinking the same, her face surprisingly expressive with a look of shock and confusion on her maw as she swells bigger and bigger, rather quickly approaching 4 feet tall on all fours, then 5 feet, 6 feet, 7...all while her bulk pushes back your bed, the dresser, and other furniture as she grows.

The huge, beautiful husky began to taper off her growth spurt at 10 feet tall, her head and back very close to hitting the ceiling. Her owner's mind might have been playing tricks on him, but he swore that he saw a look of disappointment flash across her maw as her big growth spurt ended.

"Wow, Master, that sure was something..." Lily said, her voice slightly deeper, and more womanly. You could tell by her inflection that if she could blush, she would be doing so at the moment.

"Y-yeah, it sure was..." you stammer, not knowing what to say after your beloved pet spoke right before having a huge growth spurt and now towering over you and the room as you look up into her kind, sweet, piercing blue eyes.

You ponder your choices, not sure what to do now with your huge husky...
11112121221.title: She has a growth spurt.

choices: There's a wood nearby, that should be secluded enough and give her plenty to do!
That abandoned factory nearby. You need a place that can handle so much Husky!
111121212212.content:
You let out a deep sigh as you look down at your hands, slowly relaxing your iron grip on the bedsheets that you'd grabbed when Lily had pushed your bed up into the corner of the room. When she'd first spoken, you couldn't help but dimly wonder if it were all some sort of bizarre dream. Then her flank had begun to push your furniture away, just like that, with literally no effort on her part she had casually brushed aside furniture that would take at least two people to move. You glanced over at the crushed remnants of what used to be the other bedside cabinet, which is now scattered across the area of the bed you weren't lying in. The bed is so tightly pressed against the wall that there is simply nowhere else for the scraps of wood to go. This was definitely no dream.

You looked back to Lily, her immense bulk mere inches from your comparatively tiny form. Casting your gaze over the entirety of her massive frame, you could only gawk at the powerful musculature that flexed and swelled with even the slightest of movements. You swallowed thickly as you considered just how easily she had pushed away all of your furniture. Your bed, your dresser, everything. Brushed aside as if it weighed nothing, all without even trying. You couldn't even dare to begin to imagine just how strong she had to be now. You couldn't see anything else apart from the titanic frame of your pet Husky, so the only way you could estimate that the rest of your furniture was probably intact was that you hadn't heard any sounds of creaking or cracking wood as you had no doubts whatsoever that if she pressed against them, likely without even applying that much force, they'd be completely crushed.

"Master?" Lily asks, her deeper voice rumbling through you. She looks down at you, again, her face is surprisingly expressive for a dog. You look up at her, your gaze moving from her massive flank, past her muscular chest, her thick neck and up to her big blue eyes, wide with awe. God, she was so beautiful. Her fur seemed so glossy, her musculature was incredibly well-defined even beneath the thick fur, her gaze was so sweet and kind.

"Master?" She asks again, her voice shaking you out of your daze. "Ah, uh, yes, Lily?" You stammer out, still trying to wrap your head around the fact that you now need to look up to look you dog in the eyes. You've never been more thankful for the old house's tall ceilings. They looked beautiful and while it did make heating the house a bit of a pain at times, you were sure that if the house had shorter ceilings Lily would have simply smashed straight through and into the attic.

"Are you okay?" She leans down, nosing into you gently, pushing you back slightly as her huge head presses into you. You let out a weak chuckle as her big, slightly wet, cold nose brushed against your head. She'd just grown into a literal giant of a dog and gained the ability to speak, her intelligence exponentially skyrocketing, yet here she was, worrying over you. You still had no idea what could have caused this, or how it was even possible, yet her thoughts were for you.

You felt a warm smile come over your lips as you reassured her. "Yeah, I'm fine thanks. I mean, I have no idea how this could even be possible, but, you know, I'll deal with it somehow. We'll deal with it." You smiled, prompting Lily's face to brighten up as her tail began to wag furiously, although given that it was pressed up against the wall, which if you strained your hearing, you could hear lightly groaning under the force her backside exerted upon it, it had rather limited motion.

"I've got to be honest, I'm kind of surprised you're so calm." You admitted, causing Lily to smile down at you - it was so strange to see her actually smiling like a person. "Well... I don't really know how to describe the feeling of suddenly being so smart, so strong... so big..." She trailed off before continuing. "But, I need to stay calm for you Master!" She beamed widely.

You blinked. She was facing a situation she could never have dreamed of, and she was keeping herself calm for you. You shook your head, bringing a hand up to run over your face. This is unbelievable.

However, you still had to get up. It was Friday, so you were going to have to call work and explain that you weren't coming in, no way were you leaving Lily alone like this. There was no way they'd believe you if you told them your Husky had grown into a giant and was now talking, so just something non-specific should do. But first, you had to actually get up.

"Alright Lily, I'm going to need to get up now, okay?" You asked, to which the big Husky giggled. You almost could have sworn the room shook as she did so, but you dismissed it as your mind merely overcompensating to make sense of the situation. "No problem Master!" She beamed, as you pushed the covers off and climbed over the bed to the door, pressing up against the wall and her bulging flank as you did so, her thick, soft fur pressing into you. You could feel the powerful, steely hard musculature beneath with ease. God, she was so big! She couldn't stay here however. If she grew again...

"Uh, listen, Lily? I think we're going to have to get you out of the house." You explained from between the wall and her flank, halfway to the door. Lily immediately twisted her huge head around to face you as perked up. "Does that mean we can go on a really long walk this morning?" She gasped out, to which you nodded slowly. "Uh, sure thing."

Lily's entire face lit up with unbridled joy. "Well, hold on now, I've got to shower and get dressed first, so I'll be back as soon as I'm done with my shower, okay?" You pointed out, to which she reassured you. "Oh of course Master! Don't worry, I'll stay right here!" She smiled brightly as you stepped out into the hallway, making your way to the bathroom. It felt almost like a dream. You could still scarcely believe any of this was happening.

You got through your shower as fast as you could, your mind racing the whole time with thoughts of how completely impossible all of this should be. Dogs can't talk, yet Lily could speak fluent English, without having even studied it for years like a human would have to! Nothing can grow to that size so quickly, yet in mere moments, Lily had more than doubled her size! You shook your head to dispel the thoughts and clear your mind, yelping when water got in your eyes. You were just glad it wasn't shampoo. You quickly finished up and dried yourself off, before wrapping the towel round yourself and heading back to your room.

As you stepped through the door, Lily immediately spoke up. "Master! Are you alright? I heard you yelp in the bathroom." She asked, to which you blinked and nodded. "Yes, I'm alright Lily. I just got water in my eyes." You explained, to which Lily nodded. "Ah, right. I couldn't have protected you from that then." She mused. You furrowed your brow, wondering if you should inquire further, but a chill ran through you, forcing you to make a decision.

The problem was, your dresser was Lily's other side, and that was assuming it hadn't been reduced to splinters beneath Lily's massive weight. How much did she weigh now? She was far beyond hundreds of pounds, she had to be measured in tons now! Did she weigh a ton? Two tons? You swallowed, trying to ignore the thrill than went through you at the thought of Lily weighing several tons. It was a chill of something, but it wasn't fear. Not quite. It was fear mixed with... something...

"Uh, Lily? I can't reach my dresser, so I'm going to need you to get out of my room so I can reach it. It's uh, well, it's going to be a tight squeeze." You murmured anxiously as you looked at the door and then back to Lily, trying to work out how exactly a 10 foot tall Husky who was built like a tank was going to fit through a door that was only about 6 and a half feet tall.

"Don't worry Master! I'll manage!" She smiled. You jumped as the entire house suddenly seemed to loudly groan and creak as the enormous Husky shifted her position, her every movement causing a litany of groans and whines from the building's structure. You could only stare in dumbfounded awe as the colossal Husky crouched down and gingerly squeezed her way through the doorway. Despite the awful groaning, the structure remained intact. "There we go Master!" She called through happily.

You swallowed, turning back to the now much more spacious seeming room. You quickly got yourself dressed and head out to meet Lily on the landing. You go downstairs as she follows behind you, the stairs groaning under her tremendous weight as the bannister creaks as it's pressed into by her tremendous bulk. "Alright Lily, I'll just phone work, grab something to eat and we can be on our way." You explain, to which Lily grins widely, her tail whipping about madly.

As you pull up your phone to call into work, you wonder where exactly you'll be able to take Lily on her walk, now that she's a literal giant of a Husky.
111121212212.title: Getting Ready for a Walk

choices: Lili ofer you a ride/somethink happen

What do you think about that big building we were once? let's go there" as you walk, you looked at Lili. She was so big and even that she walk with such grace despite her monstrous size. You could easly notice strong muscules under her furr. interesting is she as big as elephant? after few minutes with a phone you realise Lili at her 10ft ia almost as big as elephant and according to calculations she could weight even about 4 tons. You gulp when you think how to feed such giant pet.
1111212122122.title: That abandoned factory nearby. You need a place...

choices: She's interrupted by a sudden growth spurt
11112121221221.content:
Pushing the repercussions of owning a giant pet to the back of your mind, you focused on getting Lily to the abandoned factory as fast as possible. "Come on, Lily," you called out to her. The ground shook a little bit as the enlarged dog trotted over to you, eager to start the walk. Practically power walking, you lead her to the sidewalk and headed in the direction of the factory. Thankfully, Lily was loyally following behind you and not wandering off, even if it looked like she wanted to explore the world that seemed to have shrunk around her. For a few good minutes the two of you just walked in silence, the only sounds being your footsteps and the heavy paws of your husky hitting the pavement. Then, you stopped as you came to a gravel alleyway wedged between two houses.

When Lily came to a stop, the concrete beneath her front paws cracked. "We're going to cut through here," you told her.

"Okay, master!" Lily enthusiastically barked. The alleyway was a bit of a detour but you figured it would help conceal your giant dog. Unfortunately you were wrong. The husky was much taller than the fences on either side of the alley and she stood out like a sore thumb. More than once you could hear some frantic mutterings or a gasp from behind the fences from people that were probably just hanging up their laundry for the day. You picked up the pace, even more so when Lily started stopping to say hello to the stunned bystanders. After taking a turn, rushing to another alley and detouring through a small reserve, you eventually arrived at the base of the factory. There weren't any mobs following you and Lily so you assumed the two of you were in the clear.

A chain-link fence was your first obstacle. You easily passed it by crawling through a section of cut fence but as you tried to pull it back for your husky you noticed there was no way she would fit through. Lily noticed too. She took a few steps back from the fence and startled you as she started running and then jumped. She flew right over your head and made the landing on the pavement behind the fence with a loud crash. The force of her landing made cracks radiate out from beneath her and sent little pebbles flying. From her expression, she was clearly very proud of the stunt.

You gave her a pat on the large flank of her leg as you passed by her to the next obstacle. A large, rusted double door on the factory that was closed shut. Usually, the door was left open but it seems that the local council deemed it mustn't be so. A heavy, thick chain was wrapped between the two doors with an impressively large padlock to match it. For a moment you were lost as you tried to recall if there were others ways you could get Lily into the factory but as you looked around in thought, your eyes landed on the big dog herself. The powerful muscles beneath her fur were flexing as she meandered about the factory yard and after watching her for a bit an idea formed in your mind.

"Hey Lily, come here," you called out to her.

With only a few steps she cleared the distance and lowered her head down to you. "Yes?"

"We need to break the lock," you stated. "Do you think you can do that so we can get you inside?"

"I think I can do that," Lily said. With that you stood a safe distance away and watched as she got into position. Lily pressed her big nose against the lock and made it jangle before she moved to the side and pressed her shoulder onto the doors. Her muscles tensed up as she pushed herself into the large steel doors. The doors groaned for a few seconds and just when you were starting to feel they were too strong, the chains broke apart with a loud clang. The doors jolted open, swinging inward along with Lily who almost fell over at the sudden movement. Quickly following behind her, you swung both the doors back to a closed position.

You couldn't help but praise her feat of strength. "Good job, girl!" She was happy for the compliment but she was far too busy taking in her new surroundings. The factory was almost completely empty, save for a few odds and ends. Most, if not all the machinery was presumably taken out and stripped for parts when the factory shut down, leaving the area clear besides a few orderly rows of supporting pillars. There were a few tertiary rooms off to the side along with a metal staircase that lead to a network of catwalks way up high. It was illuminated by light which was pouring into the building from sets of square windows that adorned the top of the walls. In all, it looked like a good place to hide a certain giant canine.

Lily explored for a bit before she found her way back to you. "This place is huge!" she excitedly barked. "But what are we going to do now, master?"

"I'm not sure," you admitted. You were still coming to terms that your dog evolved into a giant talking super-husky and you had only thought as far as keeping her out of public sight. Her size was something you were getting used to, though. Lily had proven she knows how to maneuver her enlarged body and she was conducting herself very carefully when she was near you. To fill in time as you thought of something for Lily to do, you reached up to pat the side of her large furry face. She enjoyed the touch and leaned into it, blissfully closing her eyes and letting out a satisfied hum before pulling away and sitting down on her belly.

Even with her sitting down, the top of her head was about level with your eyes. You continued petting her for a while, savoring the softness of her fur as you brainstormed. Maybe having a giant dog as a pet wouldn't be so bad? Lily raised her head suddenly and affectionately looked you in the eyes. "Master, if you don't mind, could I maybe suggest something we could do together?"

"Hm? What's that?"
11112121221221.title: You reach the abandoned factory

choices: After a while, Lili get hungry

choices: He starts to have a much bigger growth spurt!

111122212.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

Ever since you were little you had had Max, your pet doberman. However, the really strange thing was that Max had bizarre growth spurts throughout his life, and no one, including your own parents, would tell you why Max was having these spurts. You first noticed that Max seemed bigger than usual a few days after Christmas when you had gotten him as a puppy: He wouldn't fit into the little bandana you had gotten him just the other day, and his cute little puppy bark somehow seemed a little deeper than usual.

Not thinking much of it, the months passed before you realized that he was growing (no pun intended) into a much bigger dog than you realized. Compared to all the other dogs on the sidewalk or in the dogpark, he must have been a foot taller than them. Never really seeming to catch on when he had his slow, gradual growth spurts, you watched as your bigger and bigger doberman continued to grow throughout the months, reaching the height of 10 feet tall when you were in 8th grade. Not only did you have to constantly make accommodations for your growing pet such as buying bigger dog beds and bigger and more treats and toys (not to mention being careful that he didn't damage anything while inside the house), you also noticed that he seemed to age much slower than other dogs. You couldn't make heads or tails of this, and were rather sure it was related to his growth spurts.

Now that you were in high school, nearly ten years after you had first got him, he just now seemed to have grown into an adult dog. But the most noticeable issue was that he had grown to a staggering 20 feet tall! He was of course no longer able to stay in the house and spent most of his time in the backyard where you tried to play with him and spend time with him when your schedule permitted. You would have gone out on walks with him but the other dogs and their walkers were now terrified of him at this size, even though he was one of the friendliest dogs you could ever meet.

One day when you had gotten home from school you go outside to greet and play with Max a bit as usual when you notice something odd: He is sitting down in the perfect sitting position, his four huge paws side by side, being almost as tall as your two-story house even while sitting down. But you also notice that his eyes are closed and his head down a little, almost as if he were in some sort of doggy meditation.

All of a sudden, you hear and feel a deep rumbling underneath you, seeming to come from the very earth itself, and then your attention is quickly drawn back to Max:
111122212.title: Huge, and about to get even bigger!

choices: "I think you're a bit small, max... Care to correct that?"
"Not right now, we need lots of space for you to grow..."
1111222122.content:
Original author: Infinity421

"Master! I can talk now, isn't this great!?"

Your jaw drops open as Max speaks. You stare fourteen or so feet up at the affectionate Doberman, who had an intelligent gleam in his eyes. Before you can register what is happening you are happily nuzzles to the ground by the house-sized canine, who adds in a few licks for good measure.

Max nips the back of your hoodie and lifts you up into the air, his hot breath rhythmically blowing your hair back then pulling it towards him. Max lays over on his side and deposits you on top of his body, his black fur seeming to glisten slightly.

"So, what do you think, master? I was already the biggest dog in the world, and now I'm the only dog that can speak! You know...-" he puts his massive muzzle right next to your body and laps you gently with his tongue, before resuming speaking in that rumbling, deep voice. "if you wanted to... If be the even biggerest dog in the world... Just for you, master..."

As Max's eyes look into your own, despite utterly eclipsing yours in size, you think about Max's titanic size, and him growing even bigger, just for you...

What do you say?
1111222122.title: Max Speaks!

choices: "Can you grow other dogs too, Max?"
11112221221.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

"I think you're a bit small, Max... Care to correct that?" You say, winking.

The big doberman seems to wink back at you and smiles, bringing his snout back down to muzzle you and gently lick you once more. You also notice that his stubby tail is wagging, undoubtedly excited at the prospect of growing even bigger for his master. "I agree master, and I'd be more than happy to fulfill your wish. I'm going to be the world's biggest dog! And all for you, of course, master..." he says in his excited, deep, rumbling voice.

You feel the earth beneath the huge dog tremble violently again, and soon feel Max's massive body expanding beneath you. His growing and growing body swells and swells while he lays on his side. He begins to pant with his tongue hanging out of his mouth, enjoying the sensations of growing so big so fast, before he realizes that you might be in danger from his expanding form. Max takes you again by the back of your hoodie, his teeth growing steadily and his warm breath breathing down over you. He gently places you atop his gigantic and still-growing back to enjoy the ride. The doberman continues to grow, bigger and bigger and bigger, pumping up higher and higher above your house and soon the neighboring houses. All the while the earth continues to tremble as if fueling the dog's growth, and you look over the side of his back at the shrinking world beneath you, wondering when or if his growing would stop soon...

His massive growth spurt stops at a little over 100 feet tall, his body towering over all the houses in the neighborhood, now five times his previous size in just a matter of moments! Even though Max's hefty paws grow big enough to crush parked cars, front yards, and parts of houses underneath them, they just seem to harmlessly smother everything underneath them without damaging anything.

Max turns his now billboard-sized muzzle back to look into your eyes, his own eyes gleaming with satisfaction and contentment. "Did I do good, master? How is this for a size correction?" He licks you again, careful not to sweep up your entire body with his giant tongue. "Are you happy too, master? What should we do now?" his deep voice booms across the area, shaking houses slightly.

You reply:
11112221221.title: "I still think you're a bit small, Max"

choices: "Max, see if you can grow any other dogs this big!"

111122212211.content:
Original author: Infinity421

"Bigger, Max! You must get BIGGER!"

Max's muzzle grins as you finish the sentence, both of you excited at the prospect of him growing even larger. The earth starts to shake even more than last time as he pants and huffs openly, the growth slowly powering up.

"If you... huff... Insist, Master... I'd be more than happy, to... huff... Oblige your request..."

Max starts to stretch bigger, with you safely on his back as the canine's harmless paws press into buildings down below, as he shivers and blows up a few feet, then a few more, and then a few more!

"Of course, you didn't say HOW much bigger, so I think we can leave that to both our discretions at a later date..."

Max begins to slowly rocket upwards, his rate of growth speeding up as he grows larger. You feel his shivering and quaking form sucking in more and more air, further curling his furiously fast expansion as you lay on his back, feeling him grow and grow and grow. Max lets his tongue flop out of his mouth once more, the three hundred foot tall Doberman panting more and more, the air sucked in speeding up the growth, which makes him pant harder, which speeds up the growth...

BEST VICIOUS CYCLE EVER!

You happily hug Max's rumbling body as it warmly swells past four hundred feet tall, his paws covering entire neighberhoods as be rises higher and higher into the sky, still panting deeper and deeper, greedily curling his growth more and more. He hungrily blows up another twenty feet, then another forty, then another eighty, as his growth increases exponentially, and he floods outwards in a titanic surge of growth, passing a thousand feet tall within mere seconds before he breathes in so long and so deep that he doubles that massive size, and then again, and then again, and again, and AGAIN!

The thirty two thousand foot Doberman surveys his body, which even now was pushing back planes, vehicles and people as his growth rate slowed to a comparative crawl, the section of his back where you lay looking like a flat, black, furry plane.

Max sighs deeply, lost in pleasure for a moment before he snaps back to reality. "DO YOU LIKE THE VIEW, MASTER? I'M SO HUUUUUUGE!!!"

Max's voice, so loud and deep that the earth miles away rumbles and shakes, has no negative effects on anyone, especially you, as he turns and licks you with a multi-mile wide and long tongue.

Then, you get an idea.

Your original 10 feet just expanded to 15 feet in a total of just a minute. That's 3 times the human you pounced on a second. The feeling of growing was a pleasurable feeling that could last forever. In fright, the human dropped his gun the made you grow and ran away. Then you focused your attention to the growth gun and wanted to use it on yourself but that wasn't an option. You were too gigantic to grab it because you would crush it instantly and your fingers couldn't hold a machine like that properly anyway. So you decided to stay there, under a light in the late-night sky and begin to fall asleep.

Just then you hear a new voice. After slowing opening you eyes you spot another human. You thought all the humans would be sleeping by this point but you were slightly incorrect. This appeared to be the only human out in the alley. The human then speaks to you in a kind, innocent voice, "Hello kitty, what are you doing out here and why are you big?" He also picked up the gun and said, "What's this?"

The next thing you do is...
1121122211.title: Nothing changed. You just kept growing

choices: The police arrive to investigate the gunshots
The boy grabs your paw and asks "Can I ride on your back?"
11211222111.content:
You gaze down at the small human. He looked comparatively smaller than the other humans, you guessed it was a child that heard the commotion and came outside. He was looking down at the gun, looking at it from every angle. The human then looks up to you, "Is this a gun?"

You spoke. "Yes, child." You jumped slightly at your voice as it just came out as if you had been speaking your whole life, nevertheless you speak to the child.
"I have been getting bigger and you humans have been shooting guns like that at me to make me even more larger."
"Oh, okay." The child meekly said. He looked down to the gun and back up to you, smiling enthusiastically. "Can I make you bigger?"
"Of course!" You said, swishing your tail. The thought of getting bigger and the pleasure of growing filled you with anticipation.

The boy inspects the gun and places his hand on the grip and readies his finger on the trigger before aiming up at you. You close your eyes as a flash of light and a loud bang fills the alley. Again, you felt that pinprick and purred. The child stands frozen in awe as your frame begins to expands. From 15 feet you slowly swell, gradually gaining foot after foot of height as pleasure wracks your body. About a minute passes and the growth grinds to a halt, leaving you at 20 feet tall. Looking down and making eye contact with the boy you break him from his trance. He looks up to you and flashes a toothy grin, aiming the gun at you once more.

You let out a gasp as a flurry of shots hits you as the child fired repeatedly into your chest. They weren't so much as pinpricks now, but more of a slight pressures against your fur. Your body begins to slowly creep up once again. Suddenly jumping up a few inches and sending jolts of pleasure with each successive shot. After several shots you heard the gun start clicking over and over. "It's out, I think!" The boy yelled up to you.
"T-that's okay!" You tell him, your voice shaking from the sheer amount of pleasure your body was experiencing from growing. By this point you have probably gained another 10 feet, but still you grew. You adjust yourself in the alleyway, moving your paws carefully so you don't step on the child. A slight tinge of worry overcomes you as both your sides press up against the alleyway. You decide to wait it out, feeling your body create massive cracks in the buildings beside you.

With a sigh, your growth slows to a stop, leaving you 40 feet tall. You barely fit in the alleyway. "You're so huge!" the child yells, loving the fact he is contributing to your size. "I wish this gun had more shots in it though."
"That's fine." You say as you adjust your body to get a better view of the child. He was probably just a head taller than your paw. "I think that gun was starting to lose effectiveness, anyway."

Calming down from the ordeal you notice you are definitely stuck and it would take some effort to get out the cramped alleyway. You were about to start wriggling back out of the alley before something interrupts you.
11211222111.title: You speak to the new human

choices: The child declines, It's too dangerous
112112221111.content:
You're interrupted by the sound of whooping sirens and screeching tires out on the road behind you. You weren't exactly surprised to hear those sounds, they always happened shortly after a loud sound like the gun's happened in the city. You turn and raise your head to try and look behind you, you think there are three cars with the flashing lights out by the entrance to the alleyway. The men in blue uniforms rushed to take position behind the cars, they were holding guns much like the one that made you grow before! The thought that the humans wanted to make you even bigger pleased you, but you would prefer it if they waited until you got yourself unstuck from the alleyway at least.

You begin to push yourself backwards, your 40 foot frame rubbing against the buildings to either side of you causing them to crack and groan in protest. The policemen behind you were yelling back and forward to each other, obviously confused and scared by the sight of the furry monster in front of them. Accidentally knocking over a multitude of trash cans and boxes with your back paws, your rump slowly squeezes out of the alley. As you continue to try and wriggle out of the confines of the two buildings you obliviously flick your tail about to give you some better balance. Unfortunately the policemen were in the range of the furry battering ram. Your tail almost bowls a group of them over and then comes back again to swipe across the sirens of one of the cars, smashing the lights to pieces. It was then that you heard gunshots and felt multiple pinpoints of pressure on your behind. "W-wait!" You try and reason too late.

You can't help but let out a moan as the pleasant sensation suddenly washes over you again, the pressure on your sides increasing as you begin to grow. Your view began to rise faster as you gained more and more height, the cracks in the walls beside you getting even more larger. You look down to see the child intently watching you from behind a dumpster. You had to get out of that alleyway or you might accidentally hurt him! Already at 50 feet, you give a mighty push backwards, your thighs crumbling and spilling into the buildings beside you. Your rump was essentially bulging out of the alleyway now and you noticed that if you lifted your head up you could actually see over the buildings. The policemen were still firing as you shoved yourself backwards again, inadvertently causing more of your body to invade the buildings beside you by destroying more wall. At this point even your front legs and paws were running out of room in the tight alleyway. You looked about as your head rose above the two buildings, and as you reached the 60 foot mark you gave one last push to free yourself. With a loud crash your thighs destroyed the walls and you practically launched yourself out of the alley, landing onto a police car with a loud crunch.

Luckily for the humans they were able to get out of the way before you spilled out onto the street, regardless still they shot at you persistently. You were flattered that they just wanted you to get bigger and bigger. Still in your sitting position after freeing yourself from the alleyway you watched as some of them got different looking guns from the cars that looked longer and more powerful. You flinch as one of the policemen fires at you with it, creating a loud bang and causing you to suddenly grow two feet. Before long a barrage of these louder and more powerful shots impact your body causing you to rocket up to 70 feet, then 75 feet, then 80. You just watched the small policemen as they continued to open fire while slowly backing away from your expanding body, the asphalt road cracking under your tremendous weight. Your thighs were even pushing against the other cars the humans drove here, causing their tires to screech slightly as they were pushed by your 90 foot and growing frame.

While their yelling was inaudible over the sound of the loud guns, you did hear one of them that held a device up to his face. "Retreat, retreat!" He yelled. Just like that, the firing suddenly stopped and the policemen scattered, disappearing out of sight. Your growth slowed down considerably and with the street empty you felt it was safe to stand up, getting a slight bit of vertigo as you underestimate how much bigger they actually made you. You look down to the alleyway. As your growth grinds to a halt at 100 feet, you were nearly twice as tall compared to those buildings you were recently jammed between. You even think that if you put one of your forelegs in the alleyway it would completely block it. Looking at your surroundings, everything looked so much different. You were bigger than many of the buildings but there were still some that were taller than you, especially in the center of the city where the skyscrapers loomed.

You feel a slight tugging sensation at one of your paws. You see the small form of something at the base of one of your toes, it takes you a second to recognize the small figure as the boy that made you grow before. Lowering yourself down you could hear him cheerfully yelling at you. "You're massive! Those police officers made you so big!"
"I guess they did" Your loud voice causing the boy to cover his ears. Oops, you suppose being bigger means you have a bigger voice. Lowering your voice considerably you ask the child, "Why do you humans want me so big?"
"Dunno!" The kid chirped "But I think it's really cool! I kind of just want to see how big you can get."
"Is that so?" You ask as you move your face closer to the small child. "In that case, how about you climb on my back so you can watch me grow first hand?"
112112221111.title: The Police Arrive

choices: You take the opportunity to go on a light rampage
The military arrive on the scene
1121122211112.content:
The boy looked ecstatic. "Really?" He asks, "I can ride on your back?"
"Yes, you can." You say as you lay down. "You're going to have to climb up yourself though."

With that the boy begins scaling your huge paws and begins to slowly make his way up your body. As you watch the small human struggle to climb your arm you can't help but think how much you've grown. He was so small compared to you and you barely felt his weight has he grasped onto your fur to pull himself up on you. Completely different from a few days ago when people would all tower over you. As you waited for the boy to get on your back you looked around the street. Lights in the building were turning on and a few people were even starting to run out of the buildings away from you. You could feel a slight pressure in between your shoulder-blades. "Hey! I'm ready!" a small voice called out.

With that you slowly rose back to your towering 100 foot height. You could just see the sun rising over the horizon as morning came. Looking down even more people were pouring from the buildings, creating a steady stream of people running away from you. Before long there was just a few stragglers running about the street and you thought it was safe to finally move about. You step forward, producing a loud thud and making cracks in the pavement form all around your paw. You liked the sensation, it reminded you of walking on thin ice when you were smaller. You take a few more steps, savoring the feeling of the ground cracking under your weight. You turn your attention to a car parked on the side of the street, a machine that humans use to get around. Raising a paw you rest it against the roof of the car, feeling the metal bend. Slowly you put more pressure on the vehicle and the metal warps, windows shatter and various parts and pieces break off. You even grind your paw up and down the car a few times, crunching the car up even more and getting smaller pieces of car stuck between your toes.

At the base of your neck you could feel movement. "Wow..." the child said. "You're so powerful, kitty!"
"I guess I am!" You boast as you look at the flattened car. The child was right, your new size made you immensely powerful and something itching in the back of your mind made you want to experiment with your newfound power a little further. You noticed that most the people in the area had evacuated. If they already left, they wouldn't want these cars anyway, right?
1121122211112.title: A Little Companion

11213112.content:

"You are very kind human." The cat says. Your first reaction is to move back, causing you to stumble backwards. "I'm sorry, did I startle you?" She asks in a apologetic tone.

"You-you talk!?" You ask, still shaken up.

"Of course, many animals can talk, they just prefer not to around humans." She responds, still as calm as ever.

"So... Why are you talking to me then?"

"You seem like a nice person, so I feel comfortable talking around you."

"Oh... Okay then... Well... Do you have a name?" You ask.

"Lily." She responds. "And yours?" She asks, you hesitate a moment before responding.

"Mike." You say, smiling, you could get use to this talking cat. Suddenly, a cold breeze swoops by, causing Lily to shiver. You remember that this cat was a stray, and needed a home. "Lily... Would you like to live with me?" She looks back up to you and smiles.

"Yes, please." You gently pick her up and start to head back home with her. As you are doing so, you start to feel Lily becoming heavier. You just brush it off as you being tired, making it seem like she was heavier. But she has become heavier, and bigger, from a foot and three inches tall to a foot and a half.

You open the door to your home and set Lily down, she begins to walk around and inspect the place. She then finds a comfortable spot on your couch, looking back to you and saying.

"Thank you for your kindness Mike." She says as she rests her head and starts to go to sleep. You yawn again, and head for your own bed to go to sleep.

11213212.content: The cat lays down on it’s belly and nuzzles you a bit, showing absolutely no signs of aggression. This puts you in a complete state of shock as you expected to be eaten right then and there. You freeze in place, your mind unable to process this strange turn of events. The cat motions for you to lay down between it’s paws and you do so as if in a trance. You lay down, facing away from the cat as it starts to lick and groom you. It grooms you for 5 whole minuets, treating you as it would it’s own kitten. Unbeknownst To you, ever lick the cat gave you, it grew half an inch. By the time it was done, it had double in size. The cat slowly moved forward until it was laying on you, only letting your head stick out and smothering you in warmth and her fur. You soon snap out of your trance and are shocked to see a massive cat laying on top of you. What do you do?
11213212.title: Lies down and nuzzles you??

choices: The cat stands up and shows off her new size
The two of you fall asleep and you both wake up bigger
112132122.content:
Despite being in the presence of a huge predator known to constantly snack on your kind you felt very safe under the black cat's fur so you sigh and let your body relax. Besides, you were completely smothered by her and could barely move an inch even if you wanted to. Turning your head you managed to look up at your captor's face. There was already a big size difference between cats and mice but this cat definitely looked much bigger than normal. It felt like the distance between the black fur tickling your nose all the way up to her feline eyes stretched on forever.

You found yourself relaxing further as a rhythmic rumbling started coming from the cat's chest, her purring gently shaking your whole body. You felt yourself slip back into a trance as you savor the warm, indirect massage. Shortly after, her fur started to encroach all around your body and soon you found yourself completely enveloped in fur. Once again, the black cat was growing and once again you didn't notice, assuming she just scooted forward until she was on top of you. You were kept even more ignorant to the fact because the vibrations of her purring was masking the sensation of her fur lengthening all around you. You just relaxed under the slowly swelling cat.

The cat by now had already doubled in size again and her presence in the tight alleyway was becoming more and more imposing. With the rhythm of her purring and the soft warmness of her fur you found yourself getting drowsy before you started to nod off. You were about to fall asleep before you felt the cat move above you, rocking your body slightly...
112132122.title: Sigh and relax.

choices: It’s a farm where the owners left it to run down (animals still live there)
It’s a forest or open field.
1121321222.content:
The large cat settles down again, laying it’s head between it’s paws and closes it’s eyes, falling asleep almost instantly. The gentle breathing of the sleeping cat is enough to push you right over the edge of consciousness and you fall asleep. That’s when the cat’s growth really starts. The cat starts to grow 3 inches a second until the cat nearly touched both sides of the alleyway with it’s sides. The cat fortunately stopped growing then... at least for the time being. The cat had already grown to be 20 ft tall while standing. This massive growth spurt also triggered something in you, casing you to grow as well, though not as quickly as the cat. You stopped growing when you were about 2 ft long.

The next morning you wake up first and find yourself completely smothered by the black cat and it’s fur. You try to move but are unable to and are forced to wait until the cat wakes up. Fortunately for you, it isn’t long until the cat wakes up with a yawn and stands up to stretch, having just enough space to do so. You roll onto your back and look up, seeing the massive cat standing above you. You look the cat over, admiring it’s size and the beauty of it’s pitch black fur. Offhandedly you notice that the cat is female. You see the cat looking in between her legs at you, head cocked. You roll back over and stand up. This is the first time you notice your own size growth. While the growth is small compared to the monstrous cat, you did grow to about 8 times your previous size and are about the size of a normal cat. You won’t have to be worried about them eating you anymore, not that any cats would try to eat you while the massive female one was around.

You look around the alleyway and see that the cat is rather cramped in it. If she ever grew bigger, you both would be having serious problems. It looks to you that you both have to find a better, and far larger, place to stay. And you know of just the place.
1121321222.title: The two of you fall asleep and you both wake up...

So you want a powerful Polar Bear to be the one to grow, swelling upwards and outwards for the rest of time as far as can be told?

Brilliant!

1131.title: Polar Bear

11311.content:
A polar bear wandered the frozen plains. It saw some glowing things that ever shifted its size shape and colours. It rushed towards the bears faster then any animal.

It shifted into a mountain sized bear made out of the northern lights. It looked down on the bear radiating compassion and sadness.

"You'll do, you are chosen"

An arc of ever shifting light struck the bear. Suddenly the bear new all the language of all animals and could understand concepts it could never even think of before, it was fully sapient now.

"Choose for what?" asked the bear.

"To be my envoy on Earth. I am the sun. I have looked upon the earth since before it even formed. Behind is powerful magnetic field I could not reach. I have seen that the earth is in danger. You have seen it: the ice is melting, the fish are going and the air is just wrong. I can however reach into the uttermost north. I can give my power to another to act in my stead. You are the first fundamentally good being I've come also so you are chosen," declared the Aurora bear.

"So I can used this new power to protect all the creatures of earth?" asked the bear.

"Yes, but your current body is too small and weak to hold all the power your need. I have to make you bigger and lot bigger," explained the Aurora bear as light struck from it yet again.

The bear felt it self surge with power. It former height of 5 feet was soon left behind. It pulsed up to 5 feet five and then 6 feet. 7 feet followed and then eight. As it grew it grew more and more fluffy. It was so soft it could step on a mouse and leave it unharmed. It's fur glowed with angelic light. It surged out to 10 feet and then 15.

The Aurora bear picked up the hugged the growing bear. Its flooded it with power and kindness. The few grains of malice that remained in the bear soul where completely smothered.

"Grandchild, I love you so much, I love all of them, I always have. But I never got to tell them, tell them for me, pass this hug on. I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. I should have done this so much earlier," as it talked the bear grew to 25 feet and then 50feet tall. With one extra big hug the bear surged to 100ft tall.

The bear was placed back on the snow.

"That should be enough power to start with. Go out and do good, you already know how."

The 100ft bear, now the largest animal on the planet meet off to find something to help.

The first thing is finds is...
11311.title: The power of the Aurora

11313.content:
The story begins when a small group of scientists isolated deep in the Arctic discover a polar bear that had been frozen in ice that dates to be at least a thousand years old. With such a well-preserved specimen they would be shooting themselves in the foot not taking back to their home base to study. In the middle of thawing out the bear an incident occurs and members of the laboratory have to leave for a short while, leaving one volunteer to stay behind and examine the defrosting polar bear. Upon completely thawing out however, the scientist is shocked to find that the bear has revived! To make matters worse (or better) the beast seems to be getting bigger...

Continue with this story?

1141.content:
Original author: Infinity421

So, you wanna be the growing horse, then? Alright, let's have some scenarios...

The Pet:
"I love you too, master..."
You live on a small farm with your master, who raised you from near-birth. One day, all of the affection he has lavished on you makes itself known in a BIG way, allowing you to talk as you steadily grow larger and larger...

The Hard Worker:
"I will work harder..."
Since your earliest memories you have been working on a farm, at the instructions and guidance of your master, who genuinely cares for you despite the incredible level of work they are forced to relegate to you, due to your immense strength and size. One day, something stops you from doing your job, be it an injury, or even you not having the strength required for the task. Your body seems to have other ideas, however, and decides to grow stronger and stronger...
