choices: You are very large, but nothing that warrants extra attention.
You grew absolutely huge, and by this point are larger than most buildings!
114112.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Your eyes shoot open as you suddenly awake from a dream. Blinking, you look around your stable and huff slightly. Why did you have to wake up then, that was a good dream! It was... Something to do with your master...

Oh, that was it! It was your first memory of your master!

Your master looks at you, so much younger, then. Not to mention a lot smaller. He is uncertain of what to do, and he looks to his parents, as if for advice or approval. Hesitantly taking the initiative, your master lifts a younger hand and begins to gently run it through your mane. He starts to pet you slightly faster.

One of his parents hands him a small cube of sugar, which he places on the palm of his hand and offers you. It vanishes in a flash of movement, and he smiles. Later that day, once his parents are asleep, he manages to sneak out into the stables, bringing a blanket and pillow with him. He spends the night under the blanket, cuddled up to your warm body. When his parents find him in the morning they do not seem angry, and one of them sneaks back to the house for their camera, mentioning a future photo album.

Of course, that was years ago, when you were only just a filly. Both you and your master had grown a lot since then, you far more than him. Of course, the question was, how much had you grown?
114112.title: Female

choices: You manage to speak! Your master will be so proud!
Nothing for now... Your master takes you for a gentle ride.
1141121.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You were large, certainly, but you certainly weren't the biggest, and your size wasn't really a concern. Your owner was tall, at six foot even, but even then you utterly towered over him by an entire seven inches. Being a big Percheron had its perks.

You hear a familiar whistle outside the stables, and stamp excitedly. Your master loved to lavish affection on you, and you loved to return it. Your master opens the doors to the stable and walls over to your pen, which took up most of the interior.

"Hey, Bella! How you doing today?" Your master asks, and it saddens you that you are unable to reply in his own language, forcing you to settle for a whinny. By this point your master has entered your pen, and is standing in front of you. "Good girl..." He sighs, linking his arms around your neck in a hug. He seems content to simply stand there for a while, and you wonder how you could display your affection for him.

Suddenly, inspiration strikes. You rear up and place your two front legs on his shoulders, returning the hug. It takes your master a second to realise what you are doing, but he leans inward and nuzzles your chest, grinning. "I love you too, Bella" he says as you disengage from the hug.

You, however, feel strange. There was a buzzing, tingling feeling running through your body, gathering from some unknown source of power as your master tries to get your attention as you zone out. Your eyes widen in a very human reaction to shock, as...
1141121.title: Big, but not too big

choices: You sit next to your master while he relaxes.
11411212.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You feel rather disappointed with the lack of payoff from the strange tingling, but tou have other things to pay attention to. You sit down and your master sits on your strong back after fitting a rein onto your head. Your master guides you out of the stables, and you realise he had forgone a saddle for some reason. Your master did this from time to time, and you thought he was trying to train himself to ride without a saddle.

You trot in the direction he indicates using the rein and enjoy the gentle breeze on your skin. The walk lasts for a few more minutes before you feel a raindrop on your head. Your owner curses under his breath and mutters something about "British weather" before turning you around and heading to his house, which he would only just be able to reach before the brewing storm started to bucket down.

Your master slips off you and quickly opens the door, before gently pushing your behind to get you to walk inside, after which he slips in and closes the door behind him. He slips past you and takes the rein in how hands once again, guiding you down the hallway into a large room with several sofas, lots of space, and a TV in the corner. "Been a long time since you've been in here, huh Bella?" Your master enquires, chuckling and running a hand through your long mane.

What happens next?
11411212.title: Nothing for now... Your master takes you for a ...

choices: An hour or so. Time to wake your master up!
It doesn't stop... Looks like you'll have to spend the night in here!
114112122.content:
Original author: Infinity421

There is a loud BOOM from outside as the local area was illuminated by a flash of lightning, before it starts to tip down, the heavy rainfall turning the ground outside into a brown, muddy, wasteland. Your master gazes out of the window for a second before sighing heavily and turning a knob on the wall. The temperature suddenly increases by several degrees, satisfying him. He grabs what you know to be called a 'remote' and aims it at the TV, which jumps into life.

Your master flops onto a sofa, lying on his back as he makes himself comfortable. Thinking for a second, he stands back up, and pushes the coffee table away from the sofa, inviting you to lie down in the space he created. You gladly oblige as he lies back down on the sofa, placing yourself right next to him.

He gently strokes your mane, making you shiver slightly. He smiles to himself, and begins to talk to himself. "You always were a sweetheart, weren't you Bella?" His smile widens as he glances at the TV before returning his attention to you. "When this damn storm has stopped I can get you back in the stable."

He lets out a loud yawn and he turns onto his side, facing you. You nuzzle him and he giggles slightly, hugging you like a massive stuffed animal. "Heh, wake me up when the storm's stopped, okay, Bella?" He adjusts himself again before sleep quickly claims him, his arm left on your thick neck where he had been stroking it.

How long does it take for the storm to stop?
114112122.title: You sit next to your master while he relaxes.

choices: You grow, all the way up to seven and a half feet tall!
You gain the ability to speak human!
1141121222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You lay there as your master sleeps, listening to his soft breathing and the relentless thundering of the storm outside. You wait for almost two hours, but the storm hasn't stopped, and is just as furious as ever! You can barely see outside, there was so much rain!

You look back at your master, whose limbs are twitching slightly, indicating he was dreaming. He jolts awake suddenly, and gulps in a breath of air. You notice he is sweating slightly, he must have been having a nightmare...

It takes a few moments before he gets his bearings back, and notices the storm is still going strong as ever. He growls under his breath, and, looking at the clock, tells you to stay where you are, before trudging out of the room.

You hadn't seen your master act like that before. The rain must have really frustrated him for some reason. You hear your master enter the room again, and he is carrying...

A pillow and several blankets?

Your master manages to get you to lie on your side, before layering several blankets over you, and folding one up to act as a pillow for you. He then places his pillow down on the floor, lies down, and covers himself with his blanket.

Not saying a word, he leans into your warm body, hugging it tightly. The massive grin on his face illustrates his feelings perfectly.

You lay there as you and your master slowly drift off into sleep, emulating the night you first met each other.

What happens during the night?
1141121222.title: It doesn't stop... Looks like you'll ha...

choices: He remembers you being able to talk? (Reality has changed)
11411212222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Your eyes flick open as the morning sunlight dances in through the window, illuminating the beige carpet, white walls, and red furniture of your master's living room. This being the same master who was clinging to you in his sleep like a frightened foal. Looking out the window, you realise there is still a light shower of rain. Wow, that must have been one massive storm!

Your master begins to stir, and your attention is drawn to the large bags under his eyes. Cradling his head underneath your muzzle, you gently whisper, "go back to sleep, master...", and he does so a splitsecond before the realization that you just managed to speak sets in.

OH, YES! You can finally talk to your master, and tell him 'thank you' and how much you appreciate everything that he's done, and how much you love him, just like any loyal pet would!

Hesitantly, carefully, you position your legs so that they surround him in a gentle yet somewhat tight hug, you master unconsciously burying himself into the nearest and hottest source of warmth, which in this case happened to be your body, your chest in particular. You give him another ten minutes before you rub your muzzle over his head, quietly giggling as he yawns and stretches in your grasp.

"Morning, Bella..." He starts before another yawn cuts him off. "I suppose... There wouldn't be any harm in staying like this for a while..."

He places his head on your chest, listening to the steady beat of your powerful heart, and whispers, "Just like when we first met, huh, Bella?"

Now's your chance! Smiling inside, you reply, "It is, isn't it, master?"

What is your master's reaction?
11411212222.title: Speech

choices: Only a few horses can speak...
114112122222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Your master giggles slightly, before replying. "Yeah, I guess it is."

Uh... what? Shouldn't he be very confused right now? Your master seems to sense your confusion, and ask you, "Are you okay, Bella?"

Feeling a pressing need to highlight the obvious, you give your master a squeeze with your forelimbs as you talk. "Master, I can talk now! Why aren't you... Surprised?"

Now it is your master who is confused. His face briefly shows bewilderment, before concern sets in. "Oh, no... I knew the medicine could cause some memory trouble, but nothing this bad..." He sighs at your blank expression and continues. "About a week ago you came down with a nasty cold. The bad weather only made it worse and I've had you in here for the past few days due to the storms. Because of how bad your cold was - well, it was more flu than cold - I got some medicine from the vets' for you. They said it might cause a little bit of memory trouble, but I didn't think it could possibly be this bad, just a few hours lost at the most."

Sensing your master's spiralling mood you hug him tighter and nuzzle him, which seems to cheer him up for now, at least.

A question suddenly enters your mind and you ask it. "Master, how many horses can speak like me?"

Your master pauses for a splitsecond before answering the unexpected question...
114112122222.title: Shift

choices: You grow to seven foot five, but reality changes so you were always that big!
Your master sits down next to you, still worried but somewhat optimistic.
1141121222222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

"Uh, all horses can talk like you, Bella." Your master brings his hand to his face, pinching the top of his nose. "Let me out of this hug and I can call the vet, make sure everything's gonna be okay." You, however, are not so eager to break off the display of affection, especially as your master had been pressed against your chest and neck for the past few minutes by your legs. He would probably get cold or something.

You master sighs, however, and manages to quickly and expertly squirm his way out of the hug, leaving you on your side in the space he had created. Your master picks up the TV remote from the sofa and turns in the TV. "I'm gonna make a call to the vet. You can... I don't know, watch the horse trials or something, you usually enjoy them."

He switches the TV onto the second channel before walking into the kitchen to take advantage of the reduced noise levels. You watch the screen with rapt attention. You hadn't watched the horse trials before, but these were simply amazing! The horses were more animated than you had ever seen others of your species be so before, and the woman interviewing the jockeys also let the horses add their own comments. One particularly titanic stallion, breaking seven foot five inches, wouldn't stop praising his rider, often pausing to nuzzle down on the far smaller human, almost knocking him down every time he did so.

You notice that there seem to be rather a lot of horses from a place called "Britain". That sounded familiar, you had heard your master talk about "British weather" on several occasions, but you had just assumed it was another word for "bad" as in "bad weather", as the remark had often accompanied the start of rainfall. Looking about you realise that the flag that was displayed for the British horses was also hanging from one of the walls of the living room. Well, that cleared that up, then.

You look at the different flags that are displayed for different horses and riders; they were all rather interesting in their own way, really. Then, a mare fails while trying to jump over an oddly shaped bale of hay, sending her rider tumbling off her as she falls. You wince as she abandons the trial to assist her rider, who seemed to be healthy, if rather dazed.

You hear your master placing down the phone and walking into the living room, your powerful ears easily picking up his soft footsteps.

What happens next?
1141121222222.title: Alter

choices: The stallion has grown along with you, to eight foot three inches!
The program is almost over! Aaaaw...
11411212222221.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Your master's footsteps pause, as if he is weighing his options. They resume, but you can hear him walking back into the kitchen, the sound of the fridge being opened reaching your ears a few seconds later. You are about to stand up when you feel a bizarre tingling feeling welling up in your stomach and travelling throughout your body. Your ears twitch slightly as your stomach groans, even though you don't feel particularly hungry.

The tingling is replaced with a nice, warm feeling, and you feel your head begin to press into the sofa as you grow...

WHAT?! you watch, helpless yet enjoying the feeling the growth gave you as you slowly swell outwards, your brown fur and hooves slowly rolling over more and more of the carpet. The white fur surrounding your ankles fluffs up as your hooves, ankles and legs swell disproportionately large for a second before the rest of your body catches up. You had always been a big horse, but this was seriously pushing the boundaries of that definition!

The feeling fades all of a sudden and you sigh, relieved yet disappointed by the end of the spurt. You had to be at almost six foot nine by now! As if answering your slight disappointment, you gently swell an inch taller, the growth being much more uniform this time. Swallowing, you fidget slightly before hiccuping and blowing up another two inches, then another one, putting you at exactly seven feet tall. The spurt isn't quite over yet, however, as you begin to have more and more spurts, each of them absolutely tiny, but no less pleasurable than the steady growth of the first growth spurt. Panting slightly from the inner warmth the growth made you feel, you hiccup one last final time and groooow three inches larger in one long, slow, spurt.

Your master's breakfast assembled, he walks back into the living room, where your even larger form lay, taking up almost the entirety of the space your master had made for you. You aren't really surprised when your master doesn't notice the massive size change, remembering you as always being this titanic. Your owner plops down on the floor next to your chest, leaning against you and eating his sandwich while you giggle slightly.

Your eyes are once again drawn to the TV as your master eats, and you realise that the massive stallion from earlier was once again being 'interviewed', although he seemed content to use the time that would have been used to discuss his exploits to instead talk about his rider, much to the seeming embarrassment of said rider.

As you watch, however, you notice something...
11411212222221.title: First Growth

114112122222211.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You realise with a jolt that it wasn't just you that had grown to new heights. The stallion on the TV, who had been your current height just a few minutes ago, now stood at eight feet and three inches tall, slightly taller than the ceilings in your master's house. He utterly dwarfed everything around him, the black horse having to lean down so far to nuzzle his rider now.

And, despite his already preternatural size, he isn't done growing.

He shivers slightly, then harder, as the interviewer halts mid-sentence, the humans nearby seeming to forget what they were doing as his immense size only further increased. Eight foot four... Eight foot five... Eight foot seven...

The growing stallion snorts through his growing nostrils, breathing heavily. His tightly packed muscles strain and stretch as he slowly pumps upwards in height, his size increasing by an inch only to lose eight tenths of the gain a second later, giving the illusion he is bouncing on his hooves as he enlargens further and further, clearing eight foot nine inches as he gulps in more and more air, the action itself seemingly inflating his massive body.

He reaches nine foot even and freezes, the growth suddenly halting. His entire being begins to vibrate subtly, then more rapidly and forcefully as his slow growth resumes again, the pattern of gaining an inch, losing most of it, then repeating starting up again. The camera automatically pans upwards, letting his continued growth be browdcast on TV more effectively.

Just how big does he get?
114112122222211.title: A Massive Mare And A Supersized Stallion

choices: He stops growing at twenty five feet tall!
1141121222222112.content:
Original author: Infinity421

The stallion continues to pump up larger, the pattern of growing then losing some of the size starting up again. He whinnies loudly and steps backwards as he suddenly gains another two feet in height before his normal growth pattern resumes. His tongue lolls out of his mouth, hanging out of his mouth as he breathes harder and harder as his growth escalates, now losing no height from the spurts!

He begins to grow all over in spurts of an inch, then two inches, the brief pause in between each individual instance of growth making it look like someone was inflating him like a balloon. He quickly reaches twelve feet, then begins to shudder, even while he is continually pumped up bigger and bigger. The shuddering increases more and more, shaking the ground and rattling the camera that was sending the events to your TV. The unresponsiveness that has gripped the humans on the TV has also affected your master, who stares at the telly, his eyes glazed over slightly.

The stallion huffs deeper and deeper, drawing more and more air into himself. As he breathes in, his whole body expands, only adding to the accelerating growth as his shudders increase again, then halt all of a sudden.

CREEEEAAAAAAK...

The stallion's body lets loose a thundering creaking, squeaking noise, similar to that of stretching rubber. He looks around and stamps one massive hoof before bu-bu-BURSTING larger, and larger!!

His massive chest ploughs through the cameraman and camera, both unharmed. His rider is swept up and carried along by an expanding hoof, and the interviewer is left untouched as the ever more titanic stallion grows straight over her, getting bigger by the second!
1141121222222112.title: Bigger!

choices: He stops growing at 75 feet tall!
11411212222221122.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

You continue to watch in amazement as the humans surrounding the massive and growing stallion are pushed back gently yet forcefully as the horse's body continues to swell larger and larger.

The camera, having been dropped to the ground once the cameraman was unceremoniously plowed by the expanding body, was swerved in the opposite direction, catching all of the action on screen. Off in the distance a bit you can see the rider being swept up and carried along by the giant and growing hoof, unharmed but looking dazed while continuing to have that glazed look over his eyes. You quickly glance at your master and see that he too still has glazed eyes, blindly waiting for the moment when the stallion had always been that huge.

The titanic stallion whinnies and neighs as his hulking body further and further expands, filling up more and more of the sky around him. His body's shuddering only intensifies as he breathes deeply, fueling and accelerating his exponential growth, the sound of stretching and heavy breaths resonating throughout the area. He satisfyingly paws at the ground, and the earth around him shakes underneath his ponderous weight.

His massive chest has completely risen out of the camera's field of view, and the rider now pales in comparison to the massive stallion's hoof in front of him: It must now be almost twice as tall as him!

And yet, the huge stallion continues to grow even bigger and bigger...!
11411212222221122.title: BIGGER!!!

choices: "Why did Billy, Phaedra and Maximus grow so much?"
"When did you take care of Billy and Phaedra?"
114112122222211221.content:
Original author: Infinity421

The stallion's body expands ferociously in one last, huge, spurt, before he shakes his gigantic body and shivers his way out of the growth spurt, leaving at seventy five feet tall, towering over everything within view. The humans, your master included, quickly snap out of their trance-like behaviour and the interview with the horse whose hooves are larger than small buildings resumes.

The tone of the interview as well as the questions have changed along with the black stallion's height. Before, they were about he and his rider's feelings about their performance in the horse trials. Now, however...

"So, at what point was it that you realised, 'I'm growing bigger than every other horse I know, and not stopping?'" The stallion paws at the ground with a hoof far taller than any human you've ever seen, and replies. "Around about the point when I went to sleep normal size and woke up with my back touching the ceiling of the stable." His voice is so deep and loud that the ground trembles ever so slightly when he speaks. However, despite the sheer volume, the humans do not seem to be bothered at all.

You notice your master is eagerly leaning forward, his eyes drinking in the details of the black stallion's body. Said stallion then asks, "Can I say something before the program finishes?" To which he receives a yes. He sucks in a massive lungful of air, bursting up to a hundred feet tall as he does so, although the humans don't notice the spurt.

"HELLO, OLD MASTER!"

A wide smile now adorns your master's face and he gasps in happiness, before turning back to you and gripping you in a vice-like hug around your neck. "Isn't this great, Bella? All this time and he still remembers me!"

You look through your memories and remember a period of time a few years ago, when your master had take. Care of you and a black stallion, who had been so large as to have trouble being fitted with a saddle. Apparently that same stallion had now grown so large that most buildings were insignificant compared to him.

You both turn your attention to the TV, the horse trials on which are almost finished. "And that was Maximus, Britain's fifth largest horse, twenty ninth largest horse in the world, and the only macro horse we could find that was small enough to actually fit in the trial area as opposed to gently smothering the surrounding few miles under one massive but harmless hoof. So, to recap, the top five largest horses in Britain are:

Big Billy, at sixty seven miles tall.
Phaedra, at twenty five miles tall.
Blaze, at ten miles tall.
Adonis, at one mile tall.
And last, but certainly not least, Maximus, at one hundred- one hundred and te- thirt- sorry, fifty-"

You swallow as you realise Maximus is steadily pumping upwards again, although his normal breathing suggests he is happy with his new height, at least for now.

"Sorry, we've been having some communications trouble. So, last but not least, is Maximus, at one hundred and seventy five feet tall, and due to reach two hundred feet tall in a matter of days. Thank you for watching, we hope you have a pleasant day. Goodbye!"

The program ends and the next one begins. Your master idly strokes your neck as he thinks out loud. "Good to hear Maximus remembers me. I wonder if Billy and Phaedra remember me as well..."

It seems your master has a knack for raising ludicrously huge horses, then. You gently nuzzle your master to get his attention.

What do you ask him?
114112122222211221.title: He stops growing at 75 feet tall!

choices: You dream that you are an ever-growing horse, never stopping...
You wake up in the middle of the night, and realize you're growing!
1141121222222112211.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

"Master, why did Billy, Phaedra and Maximus grow so much?" you ask.

"To tell you the truth, Bella, I'm still not exactly sure myself!" he says happily, a twinkle in his eye. "All the local farmers and breeders always come up to me and ask, 'Hey Clive, how do you always grow such huge horses? What's your secret?' Your master chuckles. "I told them that there never has been a secret, and there never will be. All I do is feed my horses the best grain and hay on the market and give them my unconditional love and support. Those seem to be the only ingredients necessary to make a stallion or mare grow up big and strong!" he says gleefully.

"But master, exactly how did your other horses grow so big?"

"To that, Bella, I still have no answer," he says, smiling. "Billy, Phaedra and Maximus have certainly been my biggest though, they have made this aging man very proud! At their heights, it wouldn't surprise me if they have traveled the world, seeing the sights and having the time of their lives. Hopefully they remember old Clive one day though and come back to visit with us! Still though, I'm so happy for them!" your master concludes.

He turns off the TV and starts turning off the lights. "Well Bella, time for bed. Sweet dreams my special girl!" he says, stroking your mane lovingly.

As he heads towards his room you can feel your eyelids begin to droop, and soon you are asleep. But what happens during the night?
1141121222222112211.title: "Why did Billy, Phaedra and Maximus grow s...

choices: You have grown to twenty feet tall, and your master thinks he is your pet!
You and your master's other horses are continent-sized, and are considered gods!
11411212222221122111.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You find yourself standing in a dark void, your master sitting on top of you. You never did understand why he joked about his age so much, he was barely... thirty?

Yes, that was it. Your master scratches behind your ear and you whinny happily. Perhaps it was because he was quite a bit older than you? That was probably it.

Soon, you begin to feel a powerful tingly feeling, and begin to rapidly grow, your master sitting on you and leaning against your expanding neck. You stamp with a massive hoof, larger than your master's house, and the shock waves reverberate back into you, further fuelling your growth!

Bigger and bigger you grow, not paying attention to exactly how large you are getting and instead concentrating on the rush that the growth spurt gave you. You pant and pant, hugging the shrinking Earth to your growing form, as the galaxy sized masses that were Billy, Phaedra, and Maximus are powered onto even more absurdly huge sizes by your growth alone!

The pure white form of Phaedra gently nuzzles you, the gentle mare lavishing her affections on both you and her home planet even as both of you continue to flood into space, growing larger and larger still!

Then, your entire body begins to quake and rumble, and you burst bigger, and bigger, and bigger, and bigger...

You quickly pass Maximus' size, growing larger than the Milky Way in the process. Then Phaedra begins to shrink in comparison to you, the mare scrutinising your growing back for your master, whom she easily finds and places on her own body, which is still pulsing larger. It takes a while to completely outgrow Phaedra, as her growth rate had increased at almost the same rate yours had. Eventually Phaedra had broken off from the growth race, storing her energy in preparation for a growth spurt that would put most multiverses underhoof.

You had continued to grow, and were currently filling the quarter of the universe not occupied by a single hair strand from Billy's body. The name Big Billy suited him more than ever before. The sheer noise of the stallion's growth alone drowned out every other noise in an incalculable number of universes, all of which Billy filled to the brim, then outgrew almost instantly, spreading throughout the multiverse at mind-breaking speeds. Billy pants and pants and pants, breathing harder and harder as he outgrows the multiverse, flowing into the nearest five more as a single hair fibre dominates your universe.

Then, it happens. You grow again, instantly outgrowing Billy, doubling, tripling, quadrupling, dectupling his size in mere moments and continuing to grow faster as Phaedra lets all of her pent-up growth energy out, matching your size and then surpassing it, just like you did to Billy, who is breathing in harder and faster in an effort to outgrow the local exoversal cluster.

You weren't sure how much later it was that you all stopped growing. You, several trillion yottaverses tall, Billy eclipsing your vast size by several orders of magnitude. And then there was Phaedra. Everything that ever was, is, could be, might have been, or wasn't, was held firmly in the affectionate embrace of the Arabian mare, who had long ago grown into different dimensions while you and Billy were still stuck with being but a few trillion yottaverses tall. Or, in Billy's case, a few septillion ultraverses. You feel slightly woozy, however, and close your eyes for a second...

You are suddenly jolted out of your dream. Still mostly asleep, it takes a while for you to realise that anything is wrong.

What about reality has changed?
11411212222221122111.title: The Dream

choices: You hear a rhythmic booming in the distance - it's Phaedra!
114112122222211221111.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You realise something is off just after you woke up. You had grown, obviously - but your master's house had disappeared, as had your stables. Speaking of your master, he was sleeping peacefully on your back, lying against your neck.

The only other visible changes were rather disconcerting, although you couldn't quite pin down exactly why. The sky, which had been grey and overcast for a few seconds, had warped and shifted as the sun itself moved backwards across the sky until it was early morning, causing the sky, now devoid of clouds, the take on a pinkish hue.

The ground itself had changed, as well. Instead of the brown field of mud that had awaited you and your master yesterday, a stereotypical but beautiful meadow that stretched on and on, trees and bushes dotted about every so often. The mountains on either side of the valley where you lived were still there, snow-capped peaks rising majestically into the sky.

Your master begins to twitch as he slowly awakens, and you giggle quietly as he flips over and buries himself into your fur in an attempt to fall back into sleep. However, he is unable to stop the early morning rays of sunlight from rousing him, and pushes himself into a sitting position, laying against your neck.

Your master shifts slightly, as if weighing his options. Eventually, he comes to a conclusion of whatever argument he was having inside his head, and speaks in a low, quiet voice.

"Are you awake, Mistress?"

He... WHAT?!

Swallowing the lump in your throat, you lower your voice before responding. Wait, what was your master's name, again? Ah, Clive! That was it!

"I'm awake, Clive. Did you want anything?"
"Yes, Mistress... could you help me off you? You're a bit too big for me to be able to get off on my own..."

You nod as your ma- er, Clive, moves to the midsection of your back, allowing you to turn your head and nip the back of his clothes, before placing him on the ground next to you. He looked a little younger than last night, maybe a couple of years younger, and looks about... twenty three? You're not that good at pinpointing humans' ages by their appearances.

Your m- no, Clive, happily moves over to your chest and pushes himself into it, snuggling you as you try to comprehend just how much had changed.

What happens next?
114112122222211221111.title: Reversal

1141121222222112211112.content:
Original author: Infinity421

The ground rapidly begins to shake as you hear rapid but rhythmic booms off in the distance that were quickly coming closer. Clive, who had concentrated on the severity of the shaking and loudness of the booms, now seems overjoyed. Suddenly, the surrounding area is plunged into shadow as a gentle nickering echoes down from above.

Both you and Clive look many miles upwards at the gigantic form of Phaedra, the colossal, titanic white mare gliggling as Clive leaps to his feet and runs to her closest hoof, launching into a hug with it when he is close enough.

"Hello, Clive. And hello, Bella!"
Phaedra enters into a slight giggling fit as Clive hugs Phaedra's massive hoof, the titaness all too happy to soak up affection.

What happens next?
1141121222222112211112.title: Phaedra

choices: You rapidly grow to Phaedra's size, and then grow even bigger!
11411212222221122111121.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

You smile as you watch your pet Clive hug the colossal Phaedra's hoof, it alone being a few miles wide by itself and filling up a considerable amount of space within the large mountain valley that you and Clive are resting in.

All of the sudden, the earth began to tremble with the same intensity as during Phaedra's arrival, and the massive white mare began to grow even more massive, her beautiful and radiant body steadily rising and expanding further into the deep blue sky.

Clive appears to be overwhelmed with affection for the growing horse, and holds onto her ever-growing hoof almost comically in a sort of spread eagle pose, nuzzling her gently. You grin from atop your perch above Clive, nestled in the white fur just above the hoof; you figured it was safe to stay up here on Phaedra's body as she continued to grow, lest you end up harmlessly smothered underneath that gigantic and growing hoof. You and Clive were delighted as her body continued to swell up higher and higher, bigger and bigger and bigger...

More and more the miles were added onto her height, the mare surpassing the size of the surrounding mountain ranges quickly, soon becoming the size equivalent to a county, then almost to the size of a state! At this rate, it was difficult for you to comprehend Phaedra's absolutely immense size, and yet she continued to grow bigger and bigger and bigger!

Just how big will she get?
11411212222221122111121.title: Phaedra grows!

choices: Before you can grow, the other horses grow up and outsize you!
Ha! This size is child's play to what you can really do!
11411212222221122112.content:
Creeeeaaaak...

Huh, that's an odd sound to hear.

Creaaaaaaaaaaaaakkkkk...

It's even louder somehow. What is making that strange and horrible sound? You open your eyes to see, and notice that once again, you're growing! The creaking was coming coming from the sofa you were growing into, as it was straining to try and keep you making it break. Though to no avail as with a loud *CRASH*! The sofa breaks, and your growth only picks up from there. 10 feet, 11 feet, 12 feet, up and up and up you grew. You wanted to wake master, to get you to stop, but...it feels so gooood. "Mmm...maybe...a bit bigger...wouldn't hurt. Or a lot." You moan through the pleasurable growth as your body presses against both the walls and the ceiling at the same time, causing them to make the same creaking and groaning sound that the now broken sofa was making. Lucky for you now, your master had already heard the crash of the sofa and came downstairs to investigate, seeing your huge and growing form in his living room.

"B-Bella?! Whoa, I wasn't expecting you to grow like this!" He admits as he pets your growing hide as it reaches 15 feet tall and still grows. "Mmmm...It feels wonderful master. Do...do you think I can make it go faster?" You ask panting through the pleasure. "Hmm...probably Bella, I mean, most horses only grow during the day. So grow Bella, grow!" he cheered. And with that, with the blessing of your master, your growth exploded! You burst free from the home at a massive 30 feet in size and were only growing more and more with each huff of your breath, as you doubled in size. 60 feet...120 feet...240 feet...Bigger and bigger you grew, already outsizing Maximus, as far as you knew. But it wasn't enough. It just wasn't enough for you. You wanted more, to make your master proud of you as a growing goddess of a horse. And so, through sheer will power, your growth goes from doubling in size every huff, to TRIPLING in size.

720 feet...2160 feet...1.5 miles and still growing bigger and bigger. Luckily, your body harmlessly rolled over the landscape, not hurting anything or anyone. The news was reporting on your growing body as you grew over their station at 4.5 miles in size and still growing.

"This is astounding folks! A new super horse has made herself known at this very moment! And she's still growing stronger and stronger!" The lady says reporting on you. "According to sources, this growing beauty is named Bella, another horse raised by Mr. Clide. Not surprising, as almost every horse that is on the charts, was at some point raised by him. And gosh dang, it looks like he's won the lottery with this horse! Why, she's already 13.5 miles tall, and still growing! The rate she's growing, she'll probably outsize the planet sooner or later!" The news woman said to everyone who was listening, though it was hard to hear over the deafening sound of your creaking growing hide.

And even still you wanted to grow faster, so you willed yourself to grow QUADRUPLE your size with every breath you took this time. 54 miles, 216 miles, 864 miles, the whole Earth was becoming like a too small bean bag cushion for you to sit on. But on and on you swelled, growing bigger and bigger with every huff and puff you took. 3,456 miles, 13,824 miles, 55,296 miles. Everything was tiny to you by this point where your growth FINALLY stopped. The planet was now the size of your eye, and your master was caught in the fur of your hide. You felt proud, happy and powerful. You wondered though...could you grow bigger?
11411212222221122112.title: The growing horse goddess

114112122222211222.content:
Original author: The Growth Ray

You and your master stare at the screen, your master transfixed, as the impossibly big black stallion continues to grow ever larger in size, his hooves getting more and more colossal by the seconds! Every once in a while, his expanding hooves stomp the ground, causing tremors everywhere.

As you watch these events unfold before your eyes, you estimate that, given the hooves of the stallion were now about the size of two-storey homes, the horse must be at least a hundred feet tall by now. However, you cannot really tell for sure, since the equine giant was still growing, still becoming more and more massive by the moments.

Suddenly, the growth and the tremors stop. For a brief second, it looks like the horse has finally stopped growing. At an enormous 200 feet, the stallion lowers his huge head towards the tiny reporter, the camera backing up to show the full enormity of it all. Goodness, you think as you compare the sizes of the two organisms, his head is as large as a house!

Then, without any alarm whatsoever, the equine behemoth sucks in a big lungful of air, and surges exponentially! The reporter quickly backs away petrified as the horse surges up and up in size, his growth becoming seemingly never ending...

At what size does he stop at?
