Original author: Bluecrystal12

First, what gender are you?
11412.title: The Hard Worker

choices: You wake up the next day, power coursing through you before you start growing!
You have dreams about growing absolutely huge, and wake up startled.
114121.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

You shift about sleepily as you feel a hand pat your side, gently trying to stir you awake. You lazily open your eyes, temporarily blinded by how bright the morning sunlight is that is creeping into the stables. You stand up on all fours quickly as you realize that it must be a few hours later than when you usually wake up to help your master on the farm. You look shamefacedly at your master, fearing his disappointment, but he just smiles warmly at you and pats you again reassuringly.

"Have a good sleep, Colton? Come on boy, time to get up and at 'em...that's it," he says, helping you through the stable door. He takes the specially-made harness used for plowing off the wall opposite your stable and helps you into it, making sure it has a snug fit. "We've got another long day ahead of us, but with a bit of hard work we can get done a couple hours before sundown," he says, petting your head. You neigh understandingly and trot out of the stables in his wake, ready for a full day of work.

Ever since you could remember you have been working on the farm with your master; he had lovingly raised you since you were a small colt, hence your name. Although you always remember being a working horse since you were little, you also remember growing up much faster and stronger than the other horses too. Although you and your master were perplexed by this when you were growing up, you both didn't think much of it as he continued to work you more and more on the farm, giving you more endurance-based tasks that you could pull off with your gaining size and strength. By the time you were an adult you were able to do all the hardest jobs around the farm, the hardest of which included plowing field after field, day after day, so your master could plant the seasonal crops after harvesting the last batches. The old tillers and cultivators that you pulled behind you weighed over a few hundred pounds a piece, but pulling them behind you was easy; after all, you had grown very strong and muscular for a stallion and stood at a massive 8 feet tall!

You are pulled out of your reverie as your master whistles at you from across the field, calling you back to the barn for the next task, having finished with the fields for the day. As you turn your body towards the barn's direction you feel a sharp, stabbing sensation, and you snort in pain before collapsing to the ground. Your master rushes over as you try to assess the damage: it looks like your front left leg is badly sprained. You try to stand up and put some weight on it, but it's a no go, and you rest back down on the newly cultivated earth. Your master finally reaches you and knows what's wrong immediately. He finds a cart nearby, empties the dirt from it, and heaves your huge left leg into it gently. You still wince in pain as your master slowly wheels the cart toward the barn while you trot along with your other legs, but you are very appreciative of his help during this difficult time. You both finally reach the barn and your master leads you to a large mound of hay, heaves your left leg out of the cart, and you lay down in the soft mound.

"Chin up there, Colton, it could have been much worse," your master says, bending down and patting your head. He must have guessed how somber and disappointed in yourself you felt. "I can get a few more of the horses to do your work over the next few days as you rest. Although I must say it'll take them much longer to do it, even with their combined strength! But you getting better is much more important, so don't you worry. Just rest and focus on getting better," he tells you, smiling. He pats you again affectionately again before making sure the trough in the corner is filled with water for you and there is plenty of hay to eat. When done, he bids you goodnight, closes the large doors, and heads back to his farmhouse.

"My master has always been so good to me, even with all the work I do," you think to yourself. "I just wish I could keep on working and helping him even with this injury..." But you know that a sprain this bad will take at least a few days to heal, so you just sigh and lay down completely, lying down peacefully before drifting off to sleep...
114121.title: Male

choices: That you and all the other horses have grown by a more than noticeable amount!
That you and all the other horses can now talk!
1141212.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You feel all tingly inside as you examine your massive body, powerful muscles rippling slightly as they move underneath your shiny black fur coat. You nuzzle down on your master, who laughs and responds by hugging your thick neck, moving so that your head is just past his shoulder. It was almost comical how small your master was compared to you and the other horses, at times. Of course, compared to you, most other animals from the local area were rather puny, given your huge size and strength.

You were a whole two feet taller than your master. You remember rather vividly when you started growing, that your master had to extend the ceiling on your stable as you grew and grew. It was a good thing that he did, as your height - eight feet tall - had been the height of the ceilings in the stable. It would have been rather impressive to press against the ceiling simply because you stood up, though.

Your master was rather affectionate towards you and the other horses. Though you were sure he didn't know if you were fully sapient or not, that never stopped him from hugging you, petting you, and occasionally scratching behind your ears when he could reach them.

You nicker as you feel even more tingly and suddenly grow a foot taller, your master dropping the short distance between your neck and the ground. He and the other horses begin to circle around you, marvelling at your power. Then, the other horses all neigh in surprise, and blow up to your previous height of eight feet tall.

Breeze, a brilliant white mare whom your master used for riding, and Ace, a brown stallion who you knew to be an unofficial team leader of sorts for other the work horses, accidentally sandwich your master between them as they rapidly spurt upwards, continuing past both your previous height, and your current one!

Their growth stops at eleven feet tall, the white Arabian mare and brown draft horse nickering loudly as they turn to your master, who was firmly pinned in between them. Realising that his arms were pinned between her and Ace, Breeze takes the oppurtunity to nuzzle HARD into your master, who giggles as his favourite mare lavishes her affections on him.

Blowing up even more, Breeze steps away from the increasingly smaller Ace, and lets her master harmlessly drop to the ground before flumping and using her front legs to awkwardly hug your master as her growing rump begins to push into your side.

Then the tingly feeling comes back in full force, and before you know it you are bursting larger and larger, harmlessly pushing your master and the other horses back with your growing form. The earth beneath you is quickly cratered by your massive hooves, each twice the size of houses by now!

You breathe in heavily as you flow upwards and outwards, but it only seems to further fuel your growth, and you feel yourself ripple upwards in size until you pass one mile, then two, then five!!!

The other horses are growing with you, but at a much lesser rate. When you reach five miles they reach one, by the time you're ten miles tall they're barely reaching two. A titanic rumbling emanates from your stomach, shaking the ground itself, and you double in size again and again and again and again and again...

Some time later, you blissfully hug the earth to you, the beachball sized planet shrinking against you slightly. You feel the country sized horses wriggling slightly as they are fed with your growth energy, bursting larger than the solar system as you have another spurt and outgrow the galaxy. Your master would be very proud of you and the other horses, indeed...

You awake rather suddenly, disorientating you for a brief moment before you remember your surroundings. Stupid left leg.

Suddenly, a piece of information pops into your head, and you realise something.

What exactly have you realised?
1141212.title: Dreams

choices: Breeze and Ace are predictably growing bigger too, but not nearly at your rate!
No time to get a look now! You continue growing bigger, and bigger, and BIGGER!
11412121.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

As you wake up further, you gaze around the stables and do a double take: You and all the other horses had grown overnight by a considerable amount! Breeze and Ace, who have stables right next to yours, peer down at your lying form and neigh contentedly, seeming to enjoy their new size at 8 feet tall. You have always known that they wanted to be at least a bit bigger and stronger to help your master more around the farm like you did, and now that they were taller you felt happy for them.

And of course you felt good about being even more massive as well, but even more impressive was that you were now an immense 12 feet tall! You think back to your dream, and remember that you had grown many times the size of the other horses throughout your spurts. You stand up to your full height, or at least you try to: You soon realize your sides are jammed against the sides of your stable, and even if you did manage to stand up you would be far too tall for the ceiling and break through it. The next best thing to do would be to shimmy out of your tight squeeze, and you manage to do so after opening the door behind you with your large rump. Once in the stables hallway you are able to stand up to your full and gigantic height of 12 feet, having to bend you head down to avoid scraping the ceilings.

Your master shortly arrives to the stables to replenish the hay, clean, and do all the other morning chores before heading out into the fields for the day. Upon entering the stables, your master lets out a small cry of surprise. He can barely believe his eyes: All of his horses had grown absolutely huge! He gazed around at the lot, looking at the content Breeze and Ace in their stables before his gaze falls on your ginormous form. Shocked as he is about his horses' new sizes, especially yours, he doesn't verbally question the changes and still comes in and places down a bale of hay before smiling and patting your side. You close your eyes and neigh appreciatively. Suddenly, your body vibrates with that same tingling sensation you felt in your dream, and you feel your body expanding further and further in front of your master and the other horses. Your master's face shines in pleasant surprise and the other horses crane their necks up and up in awe as they watch your towering body pump higher and higher towards the building's ceiling. The top of your head and back soon hit the high old wooden ceiling, which instantly crumbles, and you feel your body vibrate powerfully once more as you take in a deep, heavy breath to further fuel your next big growth spurt.

You quickly notice with a small sigh of relief that your master and the other horses are not hurt as the stables fall apart around them and pieces of wood rain down on them. Knowing that your growing body would only push them aside and not harmfully smother them, your body vibrates tremulously along with your heavy breaths and you rocket higher, higher, and higher into the sky, your stallion body bursting bigger, bigger, and BIGGER still! You quickly outgrow your master's farm and then the surrounding neighborhood, your hooves multiple times the size of the ordinary house by now! And the craters caused by your hooves continue to expand further and further along with your body; you continue to breathe in deeply, fully enjoying the sensation of endless growth and knowing that you can consciously help increase your own growth spurts...

The vibrating, tingling feeling stops, and you gaze around at the tiny world beneath you. You must be over half a mile tall by now! Your master must be so proud of you right now, having long overcome your injury and growing up to be so big! Speaking of which, you crane your neck down and spot the tiny farm beside your right hoof, looking more like a small Lego piece than anything by now. You can just make out the specks that are your master, Breeze, and Ace surrounded by the wreckage of the puny stables. However, the glints of white and brown appeared to be fuzzy and then get back into focus, almost as if their bodies were vibrating and then growing bigger...could it be?
11412121.title: You and all the other horses have grown!

11413.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

The Magic Carrot:
One day your master gives you a carrot for being such a good help on the farm, but little does he know that the carrot he gives you is of the magical variety. To you and your master's delight, you soon find yourself growing, and able to control your size!
11413.title: More scenarios!

114131.content: And for the "magic" question: Are you are a Mare or Stallion?
114131.title: The Magic Carrot

1141311.content: It was a normal day like any other day, but today you and your owner were going to the town. Your own when to go get you a carrot from the grocery store store as well as a few other thing when he came across a man who looked pretty weak to weak to stand up on his own. so you wanted to help him out so you tugged at the reins toward the man and our own knew that you want to help him out so he got off you and lead you towards the man and spoke to him few a few mins and then helped him on you and the man weight was not what you were expecting your were expecting the man to be about your owners weight not lighter but not that you were complaining and then you and your owner helped him back to the mans house and he thanked your owner and your owner said that you had seen him and wanted to help him out so he said if you and your owner could wait a few minutes he had a carrot for you that made you happy as could be now your owner didn't have to spend more money on a carrot. 5 minutes later the old man came out with the carrot in tow and he asked if he could feed it to you and of course you owner happy said yes and then you ate the carrot, but it didn't taste like a normal carrot it was better than a normal carrot you didn't think about it too much
1141311.title: Mare

114132.content:
Original author: Hereward

Scenario: You are a young mare who lives in stables mostly used for riding lessons. One night you have a strange dream where some surreal figure tells you you can now alter the world as you see fit, but apart from size-changing these powers require a fair amount of effort. When you wake you'll soon learn just how true it all is.
114132.title: Another scenario

1141321.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Your hooves gently clop as you trot alongside your master, another human carried on your large back. Your master softly leads you forward, one hand underneath your muzzle to steer you. He chats with the human atop your back, having to look up not just at you, but to them as well!

Eventually, the human atop your back dismounts, handing your master some strips of multicoloured paper before leaving. Smiling at the fact that he is now alone with you, your master wraps his arms around your neck, resting his head on your muzzle. Giggling, you nuzzle him, nosing down on his smaller form. Laughing, your master begins to lead you back to your stables, taking the riding equipment off you when he arrives. After storing it, he leads you into your room in the stables, making a big pile of hay for you to sleep on. Whispering soft yet unintelligible words as you lower yourself onto the hay, your master strokes your mane, easing you asleep...

Blinking, you look around, not recognising your surroundings. Instead of your stables or the rolling green fields surrounding your master's house, or even the forests bordering said fields, you were floating in an infinite void of inky blackness. Thrning and twisting, you try to look for some way to escape when a feeling of calm washes over you.

Before you appears a figure, its appearance constantly shifting and morphing, never staying the same for more than a second before changing again.

"Blaze..."

Your eyes widen as the figure begins talking in a voice that matches its appearance - constantly morphing, yet still remaining recognisable.

"I have seen it fit to... grant you, a certain power..." Seeing you nod your approval, the figure continues. "You shall be allowed to warp reality at will... Go on; try making yourself bigger..."

Focusing on making yourself grow, you feel a warm, tingly feeling quickly spreading throughout your body, causing your eyes to roll back slightly as you expand. You slowly roll over the blackness, rapidly eclipsing the figure as your chest bumps him backwards through the void. The figure touches an appendage to your shuddering chest, reversing your growth until you are merely eight feet tall.

"Of course, you can do more than simply grow or shrink. Why don't you try something else?"

Concentrating, your soft brown pelt shifts to a brilliant white, then to a inky black, and then back to its normal brown. A fellow horse is summoned next to you, and he begins to expand, inflating to fill the area around him; each heaving, heavy breath forcing his shuddering body to grow, matching your scale before his sides begin to push you back, his hooves rapidly outgrowing your entire body.

Unsummoning the fellow equine, you concentrate on the darkness around you, turning it to a deep red colour before returning it to its original black.

"I think you have the hang of it... Just remember, your imagination is your only limit!"

You feel slightly woozy, the inky black void seeming to swirl around your massive body. Before you can even do anything, you feel yourself waking up...

Cracking one eye open, then the other, you awake to find that it was still dark; the moon shines in the sky, a few stray beams of light visible from your stable. Concentrating hard, you briefly force time to speed up, the sun appearing in the sky. A muffled knocking on the door to your stable alerts you to your master's presence, and you turn to face him as he enters.

Your eyes widen once more as you look down - and down and down - at your master, your presence utterly dominating the room as the small human slowly moves towards you. Thinking back to your dream, you remember the stallion you had summoned. Had he kept his size?

The ground trembles ever so slightly, and as your master guides you out of the stables, you see the same stallion you had summoned, patiently waiting outside. But he hadn't stopped growing when you summoned him, he had to have been twice as tall now, if not bigger!

You were about to shrink the stallion down when you notice your master's reaction to him. He didn't seem scared or disturbed; rather, he seemed to think that the stallion's size was completely normal. Grinning, you and every horse your master owns begins to rapidly grow, heavy breaths resonating throughout the area as all of you approach the titanic stallion's size. Cutting off the flow of growth, you look down at your tiny master. He was so cute!

But then, a thought occurs to you. With your powers, was your master really your master? What if...

What if you were his master?
1141321.title: Reality Warping Mare

1141322.content:
Original author: Infinity421

God-Mare:

In this scenario, you wake up in a field with only vague memories of the place and the humans that inhabit it. Looking over your body, you find your fur is a radiant gold, and your hooves, muzzle and tail, are blacker than midnight. Making your way through the fields, looking for the human you can vaguely remember being your 'master', you eventually find him, and when he looks upon you, he immediately starts to worship you, your body growing slightly larger.

Provided with a slow trickle of size from your former master's worship, you begin to explore, looking for answers to your various amnesia related questions, only to come across a motorway in the middle of a traffic jam. As you grow, you begin to remember what you have forgotten. Then, new companies arrive, and begin to film you, even while they worship you, allowing millions worldwide to see you.

Can you spell 'exponentially growing horse goddess'?
1141322.title: Another Scenario

choices: She is slowly growing as she eats the oats.
Nothing, you just have a feeling something is off.
1142.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You awake as several slivers of light dance in through your bedroom window. You yawn and get up from your bed, and look out of your window. You see the large grass paddock you had constructed for the single animal on your farm, your horse, Bella. You had inherited the farm after your parents had died, and you had given the animals away to adoption charities and other farms as you could no longer afford to feed them, but you kept Bella, as she had always been your favourite when you were growing up. You can see her, now, galloping throughout the paddock. You eat breakfast then gather the oats you feed her and walk out to the paddock. You open the gate and she gallops up to you. You pet her and stroke her mane, then hand her some oats before realising something...
1142.title: The owner of the horse

choices: Bella has a small growth spurt.
Bella has a BIG growth spurt.
11421.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You stop petting Bella as you realise that she appears to be... bigger than usual. You examine her for any indication for this idea, but find none. You look back up and find your chestnut-coloured companion staring at you, as if enquiring if something is wrong.

You reach up to her head and scratch it, prompting a happy whinny in response as bella nuzzles your face approvingly. As she does so, she feels...tingly, and she appears to be vibrating ever so slightly. The vibration slowly builds and builds until...
11421.title: She looks bigger than usual.

114211.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You watch in amazement as Bella's eyes widen in a very human expression of shock as she ripples upwards from her usual height of six foot eight, he hooves spreading outwards as her body grew.

Bella continues to slowly inch upward, passing seven feet tall and slowly growing to eight feet tall. Her body lurches upwards in height, putting her at eight and a half feet tall and still slowly growing.

Bella's growth gradually slows and slowly stops, leaving you with the now ten foot tall Bella, who is now the most massive mare in the world!

What happens next?
114211.title: Bella has a small growth spurt.

choices: Bella begins to speak! What the--??
1142111.content:
Original author: Growasaur

You keep your hands up in surprise, as if any reaction will worsen the problem; when she just blinks and sniffs down on your head, you know she's fine, and laugh some in relief, putting your hands down. Whatever happened to make her grow like that, it seems to be over and done with. Thank goodness! You put your hand on her muzzle gently, and she closes her eyes and rubs into it gladly, flicking her ears a little; she nuzzles harder, so much more powerful now, and you do your best to stay upright, lest she easily knock you down with her affections.

It's then, just as you have yourself righted again, that she tingles anew, her equine muscles all twitching here and there, before stretching her soft pelt out tight, and growing again, in a larger, decidedly more eager burst! The ten foot tall mare swells out all over, her sides bulging cutely as her tail swishes in approval; her hooves sink a little more every second into the soft dirt and grass, as bigger still she surges, creeping up and up to 12 feet in height, then 15, then 16, making you step back a little more as her chest bumps your nose, and her muzzle dips down to stroke on your head the way she would let you pet her in the past; it's both sweet and intimidating, an odd mixture!

You put your hand to her chest, as if to motion 'please stop', when her body flares even bigger against it, pushing you and your hand back yet again, as she spurts up to a whopping 25 feet in height! She's taller than the stables and barn now! With a soft nickering you look up to her as she looks back down at you; she lowers her head enough to rub the brunt of her bridge against all of you, pressing lovingly into you as she does so; she always was a sweetheart! Yet, you really don't quite know how to reciprocate; should you pet her again to tell her it's okay, or is it safer to wait until she gets the hint to let up? Because her own nuzzling on you seems to be calling up that tingle yet again, and it sounds LOUD this time...
1142111.title: She grows again.

choices: Tell her to go full gallop, and have fun with it!
Ask her to take it slow, in case she grows bigger again
11421112.content:
Original author: Growasaur

"Hello!" Bella finally manages to say, her throat rumbling the words out in a young, feminine voice; she swells up a few feet at a time, keeping her head pressed firmly and tenderly against you, letting you feel it every time she expands into you. "Hello, hello, hello! Are you pleased with me?" she asks, blinking her large eyes, flickering her big ears curiously. She towers over you, placing a very big, very careful hoof on your chest. "Are you okay, master?"

"I, er..." you begin, stunned in silence. You put a hand to her muzzle to steady her, and she closes her eyes and humbly responds, a lifetime of instincts taking over so that she happily relents, even though you're so much smaller than her now; she back off a little bit and stamps the ground excitedly.

"You must be pleased with me!" she whinnies happily, cantering in a huge circle around you. "I'm big now! Do you like me big? Do you, master?" she goes on and on like a kid on sugar, before you find and pat on her sides to get her still again.

"I...I, uh, I like you no matter what uh...size you are, Bella, s-sweetie..."

"But even more when I'm BIG!" she laughs, swelling up against you yet again, bigger and bigger, her soft, furred sides ballooning out into your small hand, her head rising higher and higher, her neck growing thicker, her hooves blowing up larger and wider as her growing tail swishes all over; the 40-foot mare snorts and shakes her mane of hair cutely, nosing down on you again and again. "Could you take me out to ride now, master? I can jump over whole houses now! Pleeeeeeaaase?" she snorts again, so excited that it'd just kind of break your heart to tell her no. The insanity of it all hasn't been lost on you, you just...well, you just hate telling your favorite horse of all time no, when she's, er...'asking' so nicely.

"Can you get me up there, Bella, dear?"

"Eeeee! I can, I can!" she says, nipping on your shirt collar, and carefully hoisting you up like a doll, depositing you on her gigantic backside. Wow, she wasn't joking--she's so tall, you can see well over the barn, and all over the valley surrounding the area! Do you...
11421112.title: Bella begins to speak! What the--??

choices: Bella catches you in her maw
You hit the ground hard, but survive barely
114211121.content:
Original author: Neirv

You tell Bella to just go where she wants, and she smiles widely.

"Okay, master!" she says cheerily, and starts trotting around so you get used to being on her now massive back. You hang on tightly by her mane, and take a second to wonder how interesting it is she still calls you master even when she's so much bigger than you. You'd imagine she could control you now, but she seems she's content with being under your control instead.

Bella trots away from the barn, and turns to face it. Leaning her head down and scraping her hooves on the ground, she charges at the barn and manages to leap over it, cheering as she goes. But when you land, the shake knocks you off her back, and you start falling....
114211121.title: Tell her to go full gallop, and have fun with it!

choices: Train her to get used to her size
Try to find a way to shrink her
1142111211.content:
Original author: Neirv

You're about to hit the ground when suddenly, a shadow covers you. Then, everything goes completely dark. You don't feel hurt at all, as if something cushioned your fall. You can't move, though, and you're cramped in a tight space. It's very hot and moist, and it feels awful.

Suddenly, the light returns, and you fall a few inches to the ground. You stand up slowly. Trying to wipe off whatever you're covered in, and turn around to see Bella standing over you. She lies down, looking down at you with concern.

"Are you okay, master?" she asks.

You look back at her, smiling slightly. "Yeah, except I'm a bit wet... Did you just..."

"Catch ya in my mouth? Yeah, but it was the only way to save you!" she said. "You understand, right master? Right?"

You look at her, your gaze suddenly hardening. You realize, maybe having a giant horse could be dangerous. More so than you thought.

You have two options, as you see it....
1142111211.title: Bella catches you in her maw

choices: A lap around the farm sounds fun
11421112111.content: You decide to train Bella to get used to her size so she doesn't hurt anyone athough you dought she even would want to do that or the thought ever crossed her mind, but training wouldn't hurt. The only problem was how do you train 25 foot horse. Um Bella I am going to try and train you to get used to you new size ok girl. "OK master what do you want me to do frist a lap around the farm, jump over the barn again, a nice general stroll"
11421112111.title: Train her to get used to her size

choices: Bella grows even bigger than that!
114211122.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You slowly crawl to Bella's head, and scratch behind her ears for a couple of seconds, before deciding how fast you want her to go. "Uh...Bella, is it okay if we start off a bit slower than usual?" Yo enquire to the forty foot mare, who responds with a slightly disappointed "aaaaw...", as she was obviously eager to test her new limits.

You wrap a handful of her mane around you fist and grip it tightly to stop yourself from falling off her, and tug lightly on it to spinal to Bella that she can begin. There were two things about the valley your house was in that you were grateful for now: you were the only person living in it, and it went on for miles. So no panic at the now gigantic horse as well as lots of space for her to run around and grow in.

Bella sets off into a light trot, her heavy hooves causing the ground to shake with each step she takes. She asks you, "am I doing well, master?" And you tell her yes, prompting her to let out a loud whinny and spurt up to fifty feet tall.

What happens next?
114211122.title: Ask her to take it slow, in case she grows again

choices: Bella keeps growing, bigger and faster!
You shout for Bella to stop before you get upset with her
1142111221.content:
Original author: Growasaur

The growing equine sure takes compliments well, as you feel her fur spreading quickly under your rear, spreading your legs some as her curvature grows closer to a level plain--she snorts and thunders along down the valley road, into the countryside, her huge hooves denting the grass in slightly-deepening degrees. She must be what, fifty feet tall by now? Amazing! Her flank alone comes up past the nearest trees, a truck passing by under her belly with a few choice honks.

"They must think I'm a good horse, too!" Bella cheers, watching the vehicle tear off behind her. "You think so, and I'm getting bigger and better!" She huffs lowly and tingles all over, making you tense up in anticipation as she huddles inward and booms up bigger, legs wobbling cutely, her mane pouring out over you, the follicles in your grasp growing larger and thicker as more of her hair flows over you; she balloons all over proudly, until she shivers her way out of her spurt, sighing loudly, at over 85 feet tall, at the eartips! Birds flutter away in shock as her inflated haunches brush out and into their treetops, her head peeking up adorably over an entire hillside as she looks around.

You begin to speak, patting down on her huge hide lovingly, though before you can calm the young mare down, she erupts even larger, with no warning this time, lurching violently up in height and mass, her belly pumping out on either side, her big, deep eyes closing as she whinnies and cries out:

"I know you can love me more, master, I know it! I can g-get bigger...I CAN BE BIGGER!!"

She roars the words, cantering in place, giggling and nickering as she bulges out to over 110 feet, then 130, then 165, the back of her head growing so much that you start to have trouble seeing what part of her gigantic neck you're resting on, her hairs covering you fully now, before she hiccups and booms rapidly up to 200 feet, then 250 feet! Her hooves widen explosively, shearing the grassy fields on either side of the highway, her tail whipping gleefully as she can see more and more of the area from her increasing vantage; she takes in a breath, and, before you can make so much as a muffled cry from within her mane, she erupts to over 400 feet in size, then 500!!
1142111221.title: Bella grows far, far larger.

choices: Bella breaks over a mile in size!
Bella overdoes it, and finds she can't stop growing anymore!!
11421112212.content:
Original author: Growasaur

Lost in a tangle of hairs half as long as your body, you wrangle clumps of Bella's gigantic mane away from your upper torso, enough to where you can finally shout aloud for her to stop growing, right away--the gargantuan young mare stops in her thundering tracks and snorts, swishing her tail all over, kicking up fairly big gusts of wind down on the ground.

"Stop, master?" she asks, cocking her long muzzle gently in curiosity. You take a deep breath of relief and pat her on her incredibly thick, long neck, nodding, and responding very-much in the affirmative. After all her giddy teenage ballyhoo about growing, you're really quite surprised she's taking your order so calmly. You can hear the world below kicking up some considerable fuss, car horns and buzzing helicopters all moving around the 500-foot tall equine giantess; Bella smiles down at everyone and stamps one colossal hoof proudly.

"Hello! Hello, little ones!" she cheers, flicking her ears adorably. "I always wondered what it was like to be this big! The air is so clear up here! I feel so powerful and strong!"

You caution her to try and just stay still, and not do any further damage to the countryside, or heaven forbid, the nearby cities. She nickers and giggles loudly, and nods to your request, staying perfectly still.

Then you make the critical error of saying 'good girl'.

"Ohhh, thank you, thank you!" Bella cries, tingling faster and faster under you. "Heeheeeee, I'm..."

Bella blows up hungrily, swelling up another 50 feet.

"...such a..."

She balloons more rapidly, disproportionately shooting up bigger in her rump, before her head follows, leaving her looming with a growing shadow at 620 feet, at the eartips.

"...GOOD GIIIIIIRRRRL!"

She cries out and ripples even larger, whinnying in joy, feeling her growing hooves sliding out further and further along the ground, dragging increasingly huge marks in the grass and soil; her head gets farther away from you as it grows and grows, the 690-foot equine leaning her muzzle way down, nuzzling away softly on the gathered crowds; they all tumble around unhurt, and scramble away as she loves on them.

"Oh, master!" she bellows, not meaning to, now trembling and bursting to over 740 feet in size, "all the other humans have a good idea! They want to see if I can catch up to them!"

You tell her no, in your loudest voice, now having to swim upstream through her mane, hugging on her ear to speak into it, which makes her giggle in total adoration, thinking everything you do is truly that awesome.

"Oh, I know, master! Watch how clever I am!! I won't disobey, I'll stay still, since you told me not to move anymore! I'll catch up with them another way..."

In horror, you realize the misinterpretation that's taken place, and start to correct her on your original meaning, but it's just too late, and she's just too cutely hyperactive and playful; with a tingling that swells into a quake that shakes the ground under her, Bella begins panting loudly, before gritting her teeth and bowing her head in sheer effort. Uh-oh.
11421112212.title: Mare May Not

choices: Tell her to stop growing, and NOW.
...Screw it. Tell her the truth, that you think she's just incredible!
114211122121.content:
Original author: Growasaur

"You'll praise me even more, when...hnnngh...I get b-biiiggerrr..." Bella stammers, trying hard to talk through her own escalating power flow; the sweet young mare quivers visibly, her fur pushing out longer as her hooves dig in deeper through the ground, shearing out craters that any construction crew would envy in seconds, her 800-foot tall body suddenly, suddenly...

...going dead quiet and still. You wait there hanging from her vast ear, seeing birds fly by in calm flocks, before with a massive booming echo and a whinny of total bliss, the sky changes; the ground is engulfed by the tones of her pelt, clouds starting to drop lower and lower and lower towards you both as her body rockets larger, pumping furiously in size; in moments she's standing over a mile tall, easily, her growing equine rump wiggling as she keeps her sort-of promise and locks her hooves to the spot, not moving her legs at all; of course, at the rate she's growing, her legs are growing farther and farther from the cratery quartet of gouges she had first made moments ago, long, increasingly wide and deep trenches being dragged further out from each of the four source points.

"I'M A GOOD GIRL!" she BOOMS, clouds puffing and breaking apart against her inflating shoulders and titanically long, thick, bulging neck; her rear swells out over the county line, growing into the next, as her neck extends far out, hovering imposingly over the nearby city, which the front of her 4-mile body has now more or less reached. Planes veer wildly to escape her growing mass, the 7-mile tall horse snorting and giggling, never once flicking you off with a motion of her ear. The other ear, sure, it's all over the place, as she scans for tiny voices.

"EVERYONE THINKS I'M SOOO BIG! I CAN HEAR THEM, MASTER! THEY LOOOOVE MEEE!"

With that she explodes twice as big, heaving up grandly into the heavens, over 15 miles tall at the ears; she looks here and there and here again, spying the map dwindling beneath her with gleeful fascination. She trots around in place, doing a 'little' destructive dance, making entire cities and roadways and hills all shudder ominously, the vibrations going off through half the entire state!

"LOOK HOW TINY EVERYTHING IS NOW, MASTER! NO OTHER HORSE COULD GIVE YOU SUCH A VIEW! SAY I'M GOOD, MASTER, PLEEEEEEAAAASE? I DID ALL THIS FOR YOU!! LOVE ME MORE!!"

You have to face things. She's grown to an unstoppable size. And part of you is amazed, quite frankly, though you thought earlier in the day that the interest in her growing would phase out fast. But she's huge and warm, and she just adores you so much...what do you say to all that!?
114211122121.title: Bella breaks over a mile in size!

1142111221212.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You want to deny it, but deep down, you know that you love Bella like this. And she's gone to so much trouble to please you! You bury yourself into the fur on her ear and whisper two words, just loud enough so she can hear them.

"Good girl..."

Before Bella can respond she is cut off as her growth returns, compounding itself over and over again, as her unstoppable growth restarts, as she regains control of her voice.

Just how big does she get?
1142111221212.title: ...Screw it. Tell her the truth, that you think...

choices: Calm her down, and see if Bella starts to cool her heels and shrink some
Hey, you just got warmed up here! Keep complimenting her!!!
11421112212122.content:
Original author: Growasaur

"YEEEEEEEEHEEHEE!" Bella stamps and snorts loudly, starting to pant openly as her gigantic, pretty mare eyes roll back; she lurches in, knees crashing into the state, her rump wiggling high above the cloud cover as the buzzing racing through her 20-mile tall body comes to a violent head, the world seeming to shiver anxiously underneath her quaking form; the panting gets worse and worse, her muscles tensing! You hold onto her ear for dear, dear life, knowing what's coming, and though you have no idea if you just did good or made the last decision in the existence of...well, anything non-Bella, you've made your call. At worst, she's going to be an adorable universe.

Little do you realize you're about to get better than 'worst':

"EEEEEE...YYYYEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSS!"

With that, Bella utterly explodes. In less than five seconds, her chest is rolling down over, into, and clear through mile after mile after mile after mile of valley, mowing through cities, power lines, forests, bumping planes back, bumping every unharmed car and unhurt human further and further along the rumbling curvature of the planet as the mare swells up over the entire state, 300 miles tall, then hiccup cutely and erupt twelve whopping times bigger, shaking so bad now that she seems to achieve some afterimage multiplicity--at 5,000 miles tall she flumps awkwardly, smothering the entire continent and then some, the waters of the ocean hardly even creeping up a fraction of her growing, bulging hooves and stretching limbs.

"GOOOOOOD GIIIIIRRRRRRLLL!!" she cries, and it's all she can get out, as she gasps and surges violently to over 9,000 mile in size, then 30,000, her body flowing like water over the shape of the dwindling globe; underbulk, half of the world feels the heavy, impossibly slide and press of her furred body, ton after heaving ton doing no harm to those below her--whatever powers she gained that made her this big seem to include the inability to harm any life--and that's at least some comfort, as she nickers and nuzzles on the moon, as it and the globe stick to her body, drawn into her growing gravity as she balloons giddily up past 600,000 miles in size; her chest pumping in and out as the power overwhelms her; she feels you petting the side of her now gargantuan, vastly huge ear, and it just makes her squeal in pleasure, knowing you still love her so. She wiggles her body around in space, giggling at the sensation of floating freely in the void, feeling her growth escalate furiously! The single compliment is only building up further, it seems, as she hiccups again and feels her rump shoving Venus away, the gravity forcing an entire planet to rollll up her rump like a shrinking marble, which just tickles her adorably.

"B-BIGGERRRR," she huffs, hungrily swelling through the galaxy, letting all the planets stick like fridge magnets to her inflating sides, fluttering her huge eyes sweetly. "MASTERRR...MAKE ME BIIIIIIGGGERRRRR!!!" She roars the words, even as you just let the previous compliment keeps working at her, tapping some unspent and still-gathering well of power; she's utterly incredible, growing so big! Even the Sun just kisses her muzzle, making her giggle away as she kisses it back, before it shrinks away between her lips, making her blink in confusion as to where it went--really, she's just growing that fast! And she's getting bigger, faster, shuddering away as all the spare matter clusters up into her fur, her erflickering making gorgeous contrails of light across the black, stray matter sparkling off of her thick tail as she roars and closes her eyes again, bloooooowwwwiiiing up and up and up and up and up!

The bigger she pumps, the more giddy joy she radiates, bathing everything in pleasant warmth as she canters in place, and octuples in size, her head finally peeking up and out of the Milky Way itself; bigger still she swells, groaning with bliss as more and more of her emerges from the gigantic cosmic disc; soon her lower body sticks far, far out from it, the ring hugging her thick, amazingly huge neck like a cute decoration, a necklace for a not-so-little pony (Zing!)...

She siiiighs and shakes all over, looking down at the necklace and giving a sweet coo.

"LOOK HOW PRETTY I AM IN MY NECKLACE, MASTER, LOOK!"

She's finally stopped growing, and her voice is like the end of everything, only cuter.

"It looks wonderful on you, Bella! I'm glad you like it!" you find yourself saying, before you chuckle and thump your own forehead, laughing at your thoughtlessness in saying so. But hey, in for a penny...

"YOU LIKE IT!? REALLLLY? OHBOYOHBOY!" Bella squeals, as the rumbling builds within her again...
11421112212122.title: She outgrows the solar system!

choices: You praise her until Bella's the biggest thing EVER
You ask her to use her new godly powers to grow you up with her!
114211122121222.content:
Original author: Growasaur

"You big, adorable, lovely, kind, gargantuan sweetheart," you hum to her, the 940,000 light-year mare gasping as you give in, and pile the kind words on without stop. "You're easily the mos incredible creature I've ever been with, and I'm glad you're with me."

"Master!" she whisper-booms, curling into a ball of mass, openly shaking as you add to the buildup.

"You're all there is to me now, and I couldn't be happier."

"MASTER!" she rumbles, spasming worse and worse, the ball she's curled into already heaving out in dangerous spurts, her shaking growing rapidly as the buildup compounds terribly within her, the uktra-equine not knowing how to even process all the praise.

"MMMMMMMMMMMMMAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!" is as far as she gets, as her adorably big eyes glow bright, all nearby galaxies beginning to tug in, as though getting pulled towards her; entire nebulae and systems flood into her body as she holds it all in, pauses...

...

...then BWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOMPFs with such cracking force that you almost pass out from the sheer energy of Bella's release, her mass increasing so aggressively that her head is briefly just a little horsey nub, compared to the rest of her; her shoulders and belly fillup all the space space has to immediately offer, her neck billowing out, her head bursting back into comparative size, before her body pumps and pumps and pumps and pumps and pumps, 1,000,000,000 ly of size flowing into her per milisecond! She expands so fast that she crashes through membranous layers of reality, dividing time, space and dimension, ballooning tremendously larger still, as she bowls over entire alternate realities, mowing through before any life forms there can even figure out what happened!

"BIGGER!" her deepening feminine voice pleads, insatiably shuddering with pleasure and growth.

1142111221212222.content:
Original author: Growasaur

This is beyond incredible, but there is a teeny part of you that kind of wishes you could see more than a great plain of endless Bella--decided, you momentarily stop gushing, and stroke her hide over comfortingly.

"Bella, sweetheart," you start, asking as loudly as you politely can, "think you can make me big enough to sit on you proper, like I used to?"

"Eeeeee! Yes, Master, yes!" she giggles, seemingly totally taken with the concept. Either she's feeling nostalgic, or more likely she just wants greater praise from a way, way bigger you. But hey, win-win! "I was already keeping you big enough, so you wouldn't go away, but that's wonderful-sounding! Yes!"

Oh, yeah. You were petting her hide, after all, and have never slipped through her atomic structure, or whatever likely would have really happened, maybe. There's really no time to ponder on the physics of the situation, as Bella gladly bends them, and you feel yourself SUUUURGE up in a quick, wild rush of power, feeling your legs slip out over her humongous sides. You boggle a moment, shaking off the insane, and at last, even the infinity-sized mare is determinable again, visually. You snuggle her neck as she giggles and squeals, nosing up at you lovingly.

"Master!! HI!!"

"We're so big!" you balk, stroking her mane absently as she excitedly canters in place.

"Oh, you can make me MUCH bigger, Master! Pleaseohpleasesuperyes!"

"Haha! I sure ca--hey, wait, why is everything lime-colored here? What dimenstion of existence do you think we've grown into, sweetheart?"

"I'unno! But I can get us out of it easy, if you keep loving on me!"

By the time she's down trying to look back at you, the sum-hue of everything has changed from green to near-black. With a booming noise, two light-green walls impact powerfully, before separating again, leaving everything dark.

"Whoa, this dimension's crazy," you murmur, blinking. Wait...blinking!? Oh, gods!

"That was me, sorry!" a much, much larger voice rumbles, shaking you and even Bella considerably with just its decibel force. Curious, you snuggle Bella and whisper praise gently into her ear, and the also-confused mare moans and puffs, before blowing up thousands and thousands of times larger--and that was just a light little one-word praise!

"Holy smokes!" you shout, at the sight of who had been talking to you.

A gecko. A gecko...A FREAKING GECKO, bigger than huge, looming still over you both. The voice is feminine, like Bella's, so...you hope she's friendly...

"H-hi!" you stammer, as she blinks her gigantic eyes, and cocks her head at you both.

"Well, hi! Hello!" she giggles, licking and eye cutely. "I can't believe anything is so big that I can see it at this point--my Master's been growing me bigger for so long, now!"

"You have a Master?"

"Oh, I did! She just...vanished into me...a long, long while ago! But she ordered me to grow forever, before she disappeared, so...here I am!"

"Wow, really?" Maybe she wasn't taken care of, like how Bella had kept you with her? "Aren't you lonely like this, er..."

"Flicka," she added, smiling.

"Huh! That's a horse name!" Bella laughed, wiggling happily.

"Is it?" the vast gecko asked. "What's your name, little horse?"

"Bella!"

"Ooh, that's so pretty! I like your name!"

At that, Bella suddenly rocketed even larger, bumping cutely against Flicka's immeasurable, endless belly. The gecko's great arms slowly, surely crashed in towards them, and she gave them both a godly hug.

"You...made Bella grow, too?" you gasp, suddenly only half the size you were, relevant to your proportions on her before she grew.

"I suppose so!"

"I thought only I could do that," you murmur, in complete shock.

"Don't worry Master, I still love you!! Nobody praises like Master does! He loves me!" Bella chirps, dancing in place, as Flicka continued hugging her softly.

"I see! Well, it's so nice to meet you both! Finally, some real company!"

"Same to you, Flicka," Bella cheered. "You're a very pretty reptile, too!"

"I've never been called that!" Flicka giggled, as she began to tremble violently all over. "But you're prettier, Bella!"

You''re too stunned that this sort of insanity happened with another pet, that it takes time for you to realize what's going on now. The more the two animals praise one another, the more aggressively their bodies continue to shake...

11432.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Groaning softly, you pull into the petrol station and begin the tedious and expensive process of filling the petrol tank of your car back up, idly noting the smell of muffins wafting over from the small cafe next to the station, overpowering the omnipresent yet bizarrely pleasurable stench of petrol.

Five minutes; a small cup of coffee; and a chocolate muffin later; you were back on the road again, keeping your eyes on the road, the sky gradually darkening as the sun started to sink below the horizon, as you went over the reason you were driving several hundred miles to your friend's house in the first place.

Danny was...a bit weird, every now and then, but other than subscribing to some truly bizarre conspiracy theories, was perfectly normal. He had called you an hour and a half ago, telling you to come to his house, ASAP. It was an unspoken rule between you two that texts were for chatting, and actual phone calls were for emergencies, so whatever he needed you for must have been urgent.

Pulling into the gravelly parking area in Danny's front garden, you wonder how he could afford the house at all, just like you did every time you visited for whatever reason came up. Realising that Danny's car was nowhere to be found, you frown and approach the front door to his house, glancing at the area of paddock approaching the front garden to see if Danny was lying there in an intoxicated haze.

Sighing in frustration at the lack of your friend, you ring the doorbell several times, receiving no answer. "Okay, getting a bit creepy now..." You mutter to yourself as you withdraw the key to the front door from your jacket pocket. It had been agreed you your group of friends, you and Danny included, that each of you needed to have a copy of the key to everyone else's front door, in case of emergency or something more mundane, such as forgetting your phone.

Unlocking the door, you flick the light switch to illuminate the large hallway, which was somewhat spartan compared to the rest of the house. "Hey, Danny? You okay, mate?" You all but shout as you close the door behind you, and receiving no reply, yet again. Gulping, you begin to methodically search the house for any sign of your friend, until there was only one room left; the kitchen/dining room.

Turning the lights on, the whole house now illuminated, you growl when Danny was nowhere to be found. Even if he had just been, say, sprawled on the floor, deep asleep, you would have been satisfied, if a little miffed. A folded piece of paper on the table catches your eye, and you lean against the fridge as you unfold and read it.

"Sorry, [your name], I would have called earlier if I could've, but the phone signal was out all day, and I really had to get going. I was going to explain the situation to you when you got here, but like I said, I really had to get going. Anyway...

-Danny"

Huh.

While Zayna being a thousand years old does seem rather impossible, so too would her growth, transformation, and ability to speak English. As you lay there, unable to see anything due to being smooshed between two huge walls of black fur, Zayna starts to tell her tale.

"My first master was an alchemist. You know, lead to gold? Well, he was trying to find a way to live forever, and used me as a steed as he travelled over the land, looking for expensive ingredients and substances for his experiments. One day, he was absolutely sure he had gotten his potion right, but he needed a test subject."

Having reached the end of her lungs' capacity, Zayna draws in a huge breath.

"So, he made me drink the potion, and hoped that it wouldn't cause anything bad to happen to me. As you can probably guess, it didn't. Anyway, he just thought that his potion didn't do anything and tried to find other ways of living forever. For some reason of other - i couldn't understand human speech at the time - he had to go away, and never came back, leaving me in the care of a retired mercenary. He seemed rather surprised when I was still completely fit ten years after he had recieved me. Even more so when I spoke to him."

Zayna giggles loudly, practically laughing.

"After that I was taught about how a horse who could live forever would shock most people. After that I swore each of my masters to secrecy about my immortality. About five hundred years ago, my eyes and mane started glowing bright green on the full moon. That really freaked out my master at the time. And about two hundred years ago I started to glow during the night, regardless of the lunar phase. After that, the moon just made me grow. Although never to this extent..."

Zayna squeezes you with her front legs, and you hug her back. You can hear her nickering under her breath, deeply appreciating your affection.

"So, what do you want to do, new master? It is rather late and you do seem tired, so if you want we could simply go to sleep. Or, we could do something else, if you prefer..."

A scientist testing out genetic experiments to create a new pet, designed to be incredibly clean and allergy friendly, as well as being quite fat and cute, but one day you accidentally disable the growth inhibitor gene on one or more test subjects while attempting to engineer human-level intelligence, leading to an army of ever-growing fuzzy friends who are more than happy to spread big ratty hugs.

115231.content:
You were always a fan of rats. They were an underappreciated pet and you were slightly upset that more people didn't consider getting one. after all, they were small, smart and contrary to popular belief, quite clean. Regardless, after becoming a genetic scientist you came up with a plan to improve all that by making them larger, more intelligence and even allergy friendly so they would become a more popular type of pet. After helping a high ranking scientist at the genetics research company you work at make a breakthrough the higher ups gave you your own small lab and gave the green light to start your own project. In the end you went with your plan to create a new breed of super-rat and they barely blinked an eye when you requested a huge number of rats to test on.

The day earlier you actually completed the serum and administered it to all of them. With luck, they should all be in their cages with the various modifications complete and all you would have to do is document it, do a few tests and write the report. Pushing open the door to your small lab you quickly ducked in and grabbed a white coat from a nearby hanger. Since you were pursuing this project alone you had the luxury of having the entire lab to yourself so you decided to skip the safety glasses and latex gloves you always had to wear. Starting up a computer for you to write down notes and data your eyes wandered over to something on the other side of the lab. On one of the tables were one of the cages you keep the rats in. You must have accidentally left it out when you clocked off the other night, not that it ultimately matters since the cage had all the food and water the occupant needed.

Stepping closer you noticed something; the serum had worked! Although, from how the husky rat's white and grey fur was pressing against the thin metal bars of the cage it seemed to have worked a bit too well. It was larger than a cat! The rat pitifully squeaked as you observed it in its cramped cage and you immediately noticed that it would be impossible to get it out of the small cage door. Since the only way to get the rat out of the cage was to disassemble it you searched the many cupboards lining the lab for a screwdriver. After sifting through troves of useless equipment you eventually found one and started working on freeing your overgrown test subject.

When you unscrewed the side of the cage off your furry friend wasted no time in leaving and stretching out on the table. For a moment you looked on with worry, it was a large animal and could do some serious damage to you if it so wished, after all. Thankfully the rat seemed to be friendly as it reached up and quickly licked your hand and gave a few playful squeaks. Well, since it was already here and wasn't acting up you decide that you might as well write down some results from it. The rat was far too large to navigate the maze you set up to test their intelligence but its size shouldn't stop you from measuring how large and heavy it is. "I'm just going to pick you up, okay?" you said to the rat before you cautiously wrapped your hands around it. You hated sedating the animals but thankfully the rat was more than willing to go along with whatever you were planning on doing.

It was heavy enough that you had to hold it against your chest as you moved it over to another table that had a large set of scales on it. You gently set it down and eagerly awaited for the numbers to stabilize, revealing that it weighed 6.8 kilograms. Ducking over to your computer and opening a spreadsheet you quickly entered in the number while the rat eyed you curiously as it continued standing on the scales. When you went back to the rat you were about to grab something to measure its dimensions when you noticed the digital numbers on the scales were slowly rising. For a moment you dismissed it as random fluctuations caused by movements from the large rat but it was sitting perfectly still as it watched you.

The numbers slowly ticked up one after another until the counter reached 7 kilograms. Dismissing it as faulty equipment you pulled out another set of scales and moved it over but this one was doing the same thing. It went from 7 to 7.1 to 7.2... For a moment you were dumbfounded until it hit you that this rat was actually getting heavier as the moments passed by. Backing away from it you could actually see it, too. It was impossible and defied reason but the rat before you was evidence enough something strange was happening. Measuring its dimensions would be useless because it was obvious at this point that the rat was still getting larger!

The growth was slow and barely noticeable but it was undeniable that it was bigger than it was a few minutes ago, you wracked your brain as to what was happening. Mutations happen all the time in organisms and it wasn't that crazy to think that one coincidentally occurred to the rat overnight and messed with the gene therapy, but then again it could be a case of that you just forgot to put in the gene that actually stops their growth. The latter possibility made a shiver run up your spine. In the next room over were over a hundred rats that all received the same treatment the night before and if your fuzzy friend's growth was anything to go by they would be growing out of their cages at any time now.

You stared at the door to the cage room, almost afraid of what was behind it. It would take you forever to get a serum to stop this rat's growth, let alone a whole army of them. Turning the handle of the door to the cage room creaked open to reveal that...

Add more members to the giant rat army
Don't worry about it and just enjoy the company of the huge friendly rats
1152311.content:
The door opened up to a scene of pure chaos that confirmed your fears that all of them were growing. It was a cacophony of squeaking and straining metal. A few of them had already escaped their cages but a vast majority of them were still cramped up in their increasingly small metal prison. Screws simply popped out of the frames of the cages as they failed to contain their expansive furry bodies and entire panels of the cages began springing off one after the other. More and more giant rats were freeing themselves, seemingly rejoicing at their freedom with their other enlarged brethren. Some of them were even forming small teams to help the other rats that weren't big enough to break free, their increased size giving them enough strength to just pull the sides of the cage off.

For a moment you were admiring their developed intelligence before you realized that even if you made them smarter, they were still just animals. The rats by now were considerably larger than an average cat and to make matters worse, there were over a hundred of them fighting for space in the small cage room. A squeak from the first one you found alerted the mischief of rats to your presence and you quickly noticed many beady eyes training on you. All at once, the horde moved and in a panic you tried to slam the door to the cage room shut. Too late, however, you found a large rat jump up and tackle your chest which made you fall to the ground. The survival instincts in your brain basically gave up and you went limp as you resigned yourself to be devoured alive by a horde of giant rats as more and more of them piled onto you.

However, you felt no fangs digging into your flesh nor claws raking at your body, just the oppressive weight of lots of rats.

Fur constantly rubbed against you and wet tongues would occasionally lash against your face. Getting over your initial panic you quickly caught on that they weren't hungry, but rather very happy to see you! Quite quickly you were enamored with all the friendly rodents falling over themselves to give you affection and you encouraged them by giving them pats and scritches as playful squeaks filled your ears. Furry bodies were on top of you, to the side and even occasionally lifting you up as they squirmed all around you. Unfortunately you came to the conclusion that you can't stay in this friendly fur pile for much longer since each ratty face that came to say hello to you was getting bigger than the last. Just like the first rat, all of these ones were getting bigger, too.

With some struggle, you managed to stand upright and got a look at the massive horde of rats that surrounded you. Many of them have piled into the lab but the cage room was still looking very cramped, an unfortunate side effect from how each rat was gradually taking up more space. The diverse patterns and colors of the various rats made it look like the room was engulfed in a turbulent ocean of fur and with how they were approaching the size of a dog it was an effort not to be swept up by the excited rodents. By now they were tall enough to come up slightly higher than your knees and by the second you could feel their fur slowly ride up higher as they grew.

That fact made you slightly nervous; you intended to make them larger and tweaked a few genes to accomplish that but now it was getting ridiculous. One of the main hurdles you encountered when developing the gene therapy was dealing with how their bodies would support their increased size but they all far surpassed your expected limit. You were glad that they still seemed healthy despite their increasingly ludicrous and unrealistic sizes, even if it hinted they could possibly grow indefinitely. As much as you were finding yourself adoring the giant friendly rodents, you realized that you should probably start working on a new serum and actually put a limit on their rampant growth.

Wading through the rats you made your way to the other side of the lab where you primarily worked on the serum. The limiter gene was already developed but it was just not inserted into the initial serum. It would be easy enough to put back in and start developing but it would take a substantial amount of time and looking behind you, that might present some troubles. In the small time since you opened the cage room the rats have almost doubled in size. Working on a fix might be a fruitless adventure. How big would they be when you finish making all their individual injections? What if they break out of the lab and escape into the wild? What if they don't want you to stop their growth?

Their temperament assured you that they would most likely remain friendly despite an eventual size difference so you weren't afraid of them. One of them was even wrapped around your leg in affectionate hug, happily squeaking and rubbing its cute muzzle against your side. When you opened up a few drawers to get your equipment your eyes wandered over to a small box which held a number of vials containing a clear liquid. From the label you could tell right away it was the same serum that you administered to all the rats, obviously lacking the limiter. You must have made some extras for some reason you couldn't remember but looking at them sparked a strange intrusive thought.

What if you administered it to more rats? Remembering the wholesome feeling of being cuddled by a horde of giant rats and seeing more vials of the serum triggered the thought. A part of you wanted other people to experience the feeling of being showered in affection by huge fluffy rodents and doubling the amount of growing rats sounded like a good way to achieve that. It was a silly idea but what was worse was that you were actually considering it. Being in a genetics research company, access to more rats was easy as walking to another laboratory.

Next to you, a small group of not-so-small rats were standing on their hind legs looking up at you expectantly as if they were silently willing you to go through with it. The fact that they were almost a foot shorter than you when they were standing like that jolted you back to reality. Overall their size had developed to a point they were essentially larger than a human-being and just maintaining eye contact with one of the rats you could see that their height was still gradually increasing. If you waited for a few minutes you might even see the point that it grows taller than you.

Yep, these were some very giant rats. You assured yourself that the world doesn't need more giant rats but the strange thought persisted. Creating an army of giant rats would definitely be put on your permanent record and if you intentionally added more fuel to the fire you could be put away if they accidentally hurt someone. It would probably be more responsible to try and stop them from getting bigger. Picking up a vial in one hand and the vial with the limiter in the other, you thought about what you should do...
1152311.title: Rodents of unusual size

What about a cetacean? (dolphins, orcas, etc)

Dolphin/orca
