Original author: Kardo

You look up at the massive seismosaurus. You see her head slowly turn and look down at you.

She has an expression of...
123111112.title: A gigantic seismosaurus!

1231111121.content:
Original author: Kardo

And so, at this point you were adopted by the huge seismosaur. Due to your tiny size, she had to protect you from the other meat-eaters around, especially the smaller ones. Life was great, though, with your caring adoptive mother. You learned to eat plants, and found you liked the taste!

However, this strange relationship did cause a bizarre effect...
1231111121.title: The nicest dinosaur ever!

choices: CHOMP! DELICIOUS TREE MAKES T REX GROW!
Think better of it, and let your mother eat it first.
12311111211.content:
Original author: Kardo

You take a step, as you hear your mother bellow to call you. Acres of forest crush beneath your foot, and with another step, another great mass of forest is forever smashed under your foot. You lean down, until your huge face is near your mother.

She smiles and shows you a tree she found, which is so huge it's taller than your toes! You haven't had a meal like that in a while, so you open your mouth and...
12311111211.title: Giant Friendly Dino

choices: Mommy gets 10 times bigger than you!
Mommy gets 100 times bigger than you!
123111112112.content:
You hesitate for a moment before nuzzling your mother into the tree, trying to tell her to eat first. She seemed happy that you were considering her feelings as well. She happily starts eating some leaves, happily munching away on the delicious tree full of leaves. But as she gobbles down the leaves, you notice something about her. She seemed to be...growing with every bite! "Mama grow!" You say amazed. "Hmm?" Your mother seismosaurus says as just chewing on the leaves makes her surge in size. One more gulp and she ends up as big as you. "Oh my! Mama certainly experienced a growth spurt." She says surprised, but not the least bit mad that something as amazing as this has happened.

"Bigger Mama!" You cheer happily, wanting to see your mother grow bigger. You missed the days when she would tower over you and protect you from any sort of predators that wanted to eat you. Your mother looked surprised by your desire. "Are you sure sweetie? You could probably get much bigger than mama if you eat this." She says. You nod. "Mama bigger better!" You say smiling causing her to smile back. She decides to gobble the whole rest of the tree down, bark and all. It was either grow big or grow bigger for you two now! Your mother shivered and shook with powerful growth, causing the land beneath you two to rumble in response. Animals and dinosaurs from all around look up in fear of the massive Seismosaur mother, who was only about to get more so. And then...your mother began to GROW...
123111112112.title: Mommy needs to eat and grow too!

choices: You became friends with another T-Rex.
12311111212.content:
Original author: Kardo

Strangely, as you aged, you never got any bigger. You always stayed the same size you were when you hatched. Your "Mother" didn't seem to mind, though, and continued to protect you.

Was there something else weird?
12311111212.title: You stayed tiny!

choices: You see your mother behind the seismosaurus, towering over both of you.
You feel strange as everything starts getting smaller...
1231111122.content:
Original author: Kardo

She looks frightened of you. You're confused, since you don't think you're scary at all! You take a thundering step forward, and realize that the seismosaurus would easily fit in your mouth! You look around, and you see that the shells of your egg crushed the nearby trees when you hatched.

You look back at the seismosaurus and suddenly...
1231111122.title: Fear. She is on top of a tall hill and you didn...

choices: You triple in size, leaving the seismosaurus too scared to move
You DECTUPLE in size, leaving the seismosaurus a nervous wreck
12311111222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Suddenly, a tingly feeling begins to rapidly spread throughout your body. It feels strange, but warm and nice. You see everything begin to slowly get smaller as the feeling builds and builds, reaching such an intensity that it causes the ground, as well as your titanic body, to shake.

The seismosaurus is shaking more than everything else though, and seems to be trying to draw herself in, and she seems more afraid than ever. You weren't sure why she was so scared, or what of - this was fun!

With a loud BOOM, everything starts getting smaller much, much faster, but your baby T-Rex mind doesn't understand that you are actually growing, and growing, bigger and bigger!

Just how big do you grow?
12311111222.title: You feel strange as everything starts getting s...

choices: You grow, grow, grow, and GROW!
The seismosaurus grows so much that she dwarfs even you!
123111112221.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Everything continues to shake and shrink, exciting your baby T-Rex mind further. The warm tingly feeling was slowly fading, and as it did, the rate at which everything was shrinking also slowed down. Your scales streeetch and blow up bigger, and your feet sink deeper into the ground, drawing nearer and nearer to the terrified seismosaurus.

And just like that, the warm feeling was gone. It was disappointing, as you really liked that feeling! Maybe you could find a way to make it happen again. You look around and realise just how huge you are compared to everything, now! You were about three times as tall as the trees when you hatched, but now they barely came to your toes!

You see the teeny tiny seismosaurus, now so small she could fit in your mouth three times over. You don't want to eat her though - she's really funny, and she made you grow! Besides, you're not hungry, anyways. Maybe you could try eating plants?

You lean down, down, down all the way to the seismosaurus and give her a comforting, if ever so slightly rough, nuzzle, and she gratefully returns it, no longer scared.

What happens next?
123111112221.title: You triple in size, leaving the seismosaurus to...

1231111122211.content:
Original author: Infinity421

By now you had figured out that you had actually grown bigger, rather than everything else shrinking. You liked that warm feeling growing gave you. And, just like that, the tingling begins to well up inside you again, growing more and more intense. The seismosaurus retreats from the edge of the hill to make sure she doesn't fall over the edge, and the tingling continues to endlessly build.

The tingling is so intense it shakes the ground, and, slowly, surely, your entire body begins to rumble and groan as you begin to stretch out, growing once more. The warm feeling returns, much stronger now, and your baby T-Rex eyes roll back in their sockets as your growth begins to escalate, pumping you higher into the sky, scales stretching and groaning, skin tightening and pulling wider and wider with every passing second.

The seismosaurus, contrary to her earlier reaction, now seems happy with your growthquake, as you hiccup and double in size, then double in size again, mowing hundreds of trees down under your gargantuan feet. She nuzzles you with her minuscule head, and you feel your scales blowing up larger and larger around her, as your growth continues to speed up.

Suddenly, your growth stops. You growl in confusion, as the tingling feeling grows ever stronger, racing through your mile-tall body with renewed strength and warmth, spreading to every part of you, clouding your thoughts with warm pleasure. You spread your legs into a lower stance, and huddle I wards and downwards, as the other dinosaurs, like gnats before you, start to crowd around you, curious and frightened and the same time, as the tingling simply grows and grows, consuming all of your senses.

There is nothing but the tingling and the warmth, but still they build preparing to catapult you to unimaginable sizes, then far beyond those. Down below at your multi-hundred foot tall feet, a single, timid triceratops lightly taps your claw with her horns.

Then, all of the tingling, all the warmth, all of the growth energy is freed, rushing through your body, filling and nourishing it, for it it to swell.

The growth happens so fast it is barely perceptible to the dinosaurs down below, who are instantly smothered as you double in size again, and again, and again, then burst up to twenty miles in size, then fifty, a hundred, three hundred, your evergrowing bulk ripping millions of trees out of the ground, but harming no living creatures, simply pushing them back as they struggle to register what is happening, any one of your scales dwarfing the largest do dinosaurs.

You feel powerful, so powerful. You inflate warmly to five hundred miles tall, poking far beyond the Earth's atmosphere, before simply rippling outwards again and again and again, the earth itself now no larger than one of your eyes. You nuzzle it, growth energy flooding out of your reptilian snout and causing thousands of other dinosaurs to start growing as you are, the tiny dinos struggling to fit onto any of the continents, before they simply outgrow the earth entirely, floating in your gravitational field.

You see the sun in the distance, as it begins to pull you in towards it, and you are helpless to resist its force. But as you collide with the now merely warm surface, you are infused with even more growth energy, your growth compounding over and over, as you instantly outgrow the solar system, thousands of dinos, larger than planets themselves, growing alongside you. You let out a happy roar that defies physics, before flowing out again, alpha centauri smacking into your belly, before you simply begin to grow, and grow, and grow, and grow, and grow.

The entire galaxy shakes, before you simply outgrow it, incalculable amounts of growth energy flooding into you, as well as the other dinosaurs, before you flood into darkspace, nothing able to stop your growth spurt, your body groaning and squeaking louder and louder with every second. A single raptor, fifty light years tall, latches onto you, flooding bigger with you, feeding off your growth energy, nuzzling you over and over, as you both blow up and inflate ever larger, whole galaxies now meaning nothing to either of you.

You see a galaxy rapidly shrink into nothing, too small to even see, as your growth energy floods into millions of animals from just as many planets, forcing all of the to grow, rapidly taking up more and more space.


THUNK

What was that? You growl in confusion, not liking this, before you realise something.

You have run out of space. You fill the entire universe, quadrillions of parsecs flooding into you every second, straining your form against the walls that were penning you in. You liked that feeling, though. Smooshing against everything in existance, millions of parsecs flooding into both your form, and that of every other animal.

You feel the tingling again, permeating throughout everything in existence, and the walls of the very universe itself begin to strain and buckle underneath your truly indescribably huge bulk, before simply shattering, allowing you to flood into another universe, then another, and another. Your thoughts return to the raptor, when suddenly, you feel almost all of your growth energy being sapped from you, before it all returns in a matter of seconds.

Then, you hear a groaning from your back, then from all around you, then from everywhere, as a gigantic shadow darkens thousands of universes. You look at the giga-yotta-zetta-Raptor, as large compared to her as a planet compared to you.

She licks you, overflowing you with her growth energy, and you burst up to her size, the two of you hug, compounding eachothers growth millions of times every femtosecond, multiverses meaning nothing to either of you as entire exoverses now bow beneath your mind breaking size.

I don't know about you, but I think this would be a perfect place for an epilogue, as I am running out of units of measurement.

So, epilogue, or continue growing into more exoverses, and beyond?
1231111122211.title: You grow, grow, grow, and GROW!

choices: Big enough to cover half the planet!
She doesn't stop! She grows forever!
1231111122212.content:
You nuzzle the little seismosarus again, you making what would sound like giggling if your voice wasn't so deep and booming. The seismosaurus knew though. She giggled along with you, as she felt safe around you, despite your utterly massive form that could crush whole forests under foot. The seismosarus looked up at your massive form. She noticed you seemed a bit sad. You were sad because nobody else could share your hugeness. You wanted this seismosarus to be big too, heck maybe even bigger than yourself as you nuzzle her once more.

Suddenly, she started shivering a lot. You were confused as to why, but only for a moment, before she starts blowing up in size! Her large tail swishing and swaying in ecstasy as she grew and grew, her head rising up higher and higher as her form got all around larger and larger. Eventually, her head was able to reach yours, but she didn't stop there. In fact, it seems like she was just getting started on her growth! She grew and grew, surpassing your size in a matter of seconds, but not slowing down at all. Just how big will she end up getting?
1231111122212.title: Big T-Rex, BIGGER Seismosaurus!

12311112.content:
Original author: Kardo

You hear the humans mutter to each other excitedly. They seem to be very happy about your hatching. This makes you feel happy, too. and you decide you like humans.

You finish breaking out of the shell and lie down, feeling pretty exhausted. Gosh this hatching thing was hard work!

You hear one of the humans being louder than the others. You don't understand what he says, but he sounds like he's giving instructions.

These instructions were, of course..
12311112.title: It's a big white room, with humans in labco...

choices: Panicking. They move to try to get you away from the machine.
Laughing. They think you look adorable.
123111121.content:
Original author: Kardo

You hear a strange humming noise, and you turn to look. There's a strange sort of thing there, black and rather cylindrical. Your tummy grumbles a little, and you think that the device looks tasty enough. You clamp your mouth over the smaller part that is pointed at you.

It doesn't taste that great, but it feels nice in your mouth, so you start sucking on it, as young creatures like to do.

You see the humans...
123111121.title: "Accelerate its growth!"

choices: The humans make you bigger again
They don't make you grow again just yet
1231111212.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You see the humans laughing, and you figure they are happy with you, and that makes you happy! Something feels weird, though, and everything seems to be getting smaller, including the humans. Soon, you feel your head bump against the ceiling, and you realise you like being big! Maybe the humans will make you even bigger if you are good...
1231111212.title: Laughing. They think you look adorable.

choices: The effects of the ray compound--grow, grow, Godzilla-rex!
The slow growth continues, as you break through the building unstoppably!
12311112121.content:
Original author: Growasaur

Already over 11 feet tall, and still a hatchling, you figure you're doing something right, given how happy they seem to be with your growth--you feel so big, so powerful! Most of the humans chatter to themselves, then all nod affirmatively, and head into the next room. Still liking the attention, you bump your reptilian snout softly on the plexiglass divider keeping your in your side of the room; the one human still remaining at the modulator panel looks up, and smiles at you, waving. He seems nice! You wiggle, and clamp your muzzle back over the ray gun; the man looks back over his shoulder, then gulps; he sure looks like he wants to help!

Sure enough, he slides his chair over to the door the scientists just left through, locks it, and grins wide, as he gets back to the panel, turns a dial, and then leans in, watching avidly, as he blasts right into your hungry maw again!

Your scales stretch nicely as you feel your toeclaws digging happily into the floor, your head thumping the ceiling more and more; you fill the containment area, over 25 feet of giddy baby t-rex, hugging the growth ray with your growing little t-rex arms, and sucking away on it as the human reaches to turn the gun off, in so doing spilling coffee on the control panel; bright lights flicker and pop, and you open your eyes at the sound, just as you feel your growing mass pressing harder and tighter against the pane of glass; there's no room left to take up, but the ray just keeps blasting!

Best first day of life ever!
12311112121.title: The humans make you bigger again

choices: You hiccup, making the ray gun blast you much bigger!
You fire a growth beam from the gun inside your mouth: You have a GROWTH BEAM!!
123111121212.content:
Original author: Growasaur

Your feet bump out into the plexiglass divider, swelling out larger and stronger as the glass starts to bend by the slightest of pleading degrees against so much growing reptile; the human at the shorted-out console gasps and runs out of the room, through a different doorway; you hear the other humans banging against the locked door, and you figure you might as well go to them! The more you suckle on the ray gun, the bigger you bulge out, the space growing so tight that it feels a little painful, but mostly good, at the same time; you splay your huge toes over the cracking glass, then, with the most minimal of effort, you shove your feet and tail out, shattering the structure, and allowing your gigantic body to continue flooding the rest of the room unhindered. It felt good to press against everything, but this is even nicer!

You suck away at the still-firing beam, 45 feet of baby t-rex thundering up bigger and bigger; the growth rate spikes without warning, and you feel yourself stretch wonderfully out to fill the area; this is just like a minute ago, so you know the room won't hold you, and you casually stand upright, over 65 growing feet of power bursting up through the ceiling, past the carpeting of the second floor; simultaneously, you feel your belly push through the wall below, snapping the locked doors off their hinges. You feel all the tiny humans wriggling against your belly, and wonder just how much they must be laughing now, what with how big you are--this must be what they wanted, after all!

With every trembling burst of size, you spread out through more and more of the interior, engulfing the paneling, flooring, and piping with every little motion; you really don't need to move much, and it's just too amusing to see everything clattering and crumbling--with another heave of size, your 100-foot tall form crashes free of the inside, revealing a huge, sprawling courtyard--a terrarium, the humans would call it--with more plexiglass boxes set up all over, with other, much smaller dinosaurs inside; still holding the growth beam in between your teeth, you try to roar 'hello' to them, only to have the beam tumble down your throat! You cough a little, and try to suck in to solve the problem, not realizing that you just sucked the power cables and console clear through the building, the generator following after as it goes up into your mouth!

You can feel it still inside of you, no longer blasting away...you must be over 130 feet, though, your shadows spilling over the little dinos around you--you open your maw to try telling them hello again, when...
123111121212.title: The slow growth continues, as you break through...

choices: The Antidote just throws fuel on the fire!
1231111212121.content:
Original author: Growasaur

You suddenly let loose a hiccup, blinking your reptilian eyes sheepishly; if you could blush, you certainly would! And on the topic of reasons for embarrassment, you feel the beam react to the muscular spasm, as it blasts away again in side of you--it's so much warmer this way, kind of nice, really! You feel your entire body pull tight, lurching massively larger as your growth forces you through the remainder of the courtyard wall, your 150-foot baby t-rex figure plopping down beyond heavily onto the turf; all the tinier dinosaurs within their plexiglass cages look at you, stunned by not just your sheer size, but the spectacle you make in entering!

Wriggling the debris off of yourself, you rise...and rise...and rise...and rise, now standing upright at over 220 feet tall! You feel so big! So huge! It feels fantastic, energy flooding your body as it swells greedily bigger over the others--you hardly feel mean-spirited about the whole matter, of course, but it is a bit of thrill to loom so thoroughly! You lower your growing muzzle over a cage, blasting it with your sniffling, caking the thing in a brief mist--can they grow bigger, too? It sure doesn't seem like it...

Your thoughts are interrupted as the humans pour out from behind a door on the opposite end of the rapidly-diminishing interior; you swell even larger as they enter, thudding your head loudly on the glass dome allowing light into the courtyard, a little shiver of pleasure racing through you from the collision; over 250 feet tall, now, you have to stoop lower, splaying out your gigantic legs as best as you can, before you get even larger, the growth pushing your head out along the roofing, and up over the crowd; they back away, as one of them is pushed forward to you, shaking visibly; it's the human who helped make you so big! This is great! You wag your tail, feeling it swell and bulge thicker against the cracked wall behind you, and lean way down, nuzzling away on the man thankfully; he blinks, then reciprocates, his scent shifting to relief as he rubs softly on your huge muzzle.

The others shout at him to put the antidote into use, and he protest, saying it's untested, so on, so forth. Meanwhile, you can feel your sides pressing tighter and tighter against the other cages, making cracks form in them; the caged reptiles back away, some in fear, others in anticipation of freedom! The men shout at the nice human again, and he pulls out a small syringe, painlessly injecting your snout with it; you hardly mind, you trust him just fine!

As you surge to 300 feet, you finally feel the beam's effects slowing to a halt--and you completely fill the courtyard, as well, every bit of you pushing hard against the cracked, shattering cages, pushing the other dinos into the wall, along with the humans; but strange, you suddenly feel a new sensation, as the syringe's dose beings to take effect...
1231111212121.title: You hiccup, making the ray gun blast you much b...

choices: You sneeze, and it shrinks you down even faster!
You sneeze, and it makes your growth spurt go berserk!!
12311112121211.content:
Original author: Growasaur

The growing pressure of your body pumping up against and filling the massive courtyard fades, surprisingly, as you're flooded with an odd, cool feeling of relief, your body no longer getting any bigger, your scaly skin no longer stretching so loud or wide; instead, you feel yourself condensing some, inching smaller and smaller in the tiniest of degrees away from the roof, little shards of glass harmlessly tumbling and bouncing off of your 270-foot form...make that 250 feet! It isn't a bad sensation, this lessening of pressure, but honestly it felt much nicer to increase rather than decrease. You look yourself over quizzically, giving off a little 'rawr' of confusion, before one eye twitches a bit, and you try to put your comparatively little arms up to your muzzle, as you hiccup heavily, recoiling just a bit from how hard you do so.

The scientists stopped their brief cheers of victory, everyone freezing in pre-panic at the sound of your hiccuping. They had gotten you just small enough to where they were no longer pressed so hard against the crackling walls by your bulk, but now your 200 foot-tall body was starting to shake violently, and you hiccuped again, and again, unable to stop. The pressure build back up, and then some, as you felt the hot ray blast off inside of you again and again and again, making you 'ruuuuuurrrurrrl' happily as the pleasure returned.

One little human yelled to the others, something about unforseen allergic reactions to the antidote, and they all took off as fast as they could, for some reason. Shouldn't they be happy? As you noodle it over, your eyes suddenly roll back in your dino skull, and you huff and pant and blooooooooow up to over 320 feet, in one rude, thick push, crashing up through the ceiling, sending glass and drywall and beams all over the air, before you tense up and balloon even larger, shooting up to 460 feet, your growing scaly belly pushing wider as it grinds all the topside and sides of the compound apart! The other dinos all crawl out of the openings cracking in the walls, escaping with panicked expressions as they turn back and hear you growling cutely, seeing you tower to over 600 feet, then 700; feeling better than ever before, you can't help but raise your head up high and blast a happy beam of growth energy into the clouds, before surging powerfully, unstoppably up to 900 feet!! You can feel your toes digging into the soil in glee as you rise taller and wider, more and more tonnage sinking your heaving body into the ground below. Finally you come to a stop, panting and licking your chops in approval, surveying everything below in satisfaction. What a great day it's been!

That strange feeling resumes, the pressure dropping again, as you begin to shrink just as suddenly as you grew, losing 50 feet one second, then another 60 after; at around 800 feet in size, you start stomping around the edge of the city ,snuffling curiously on buildings, seeing yourself in their glassy reflections--well, the taller buildings, that is! You shrink and shrink, down to 600 feet, tapping a massive skyscraper with your muzzle, buffeting it with blasts of air; you can see all these tiny humans inside, and you realize they're as trapped as you were! You want to help them like they helped you before, but you're only 550 feet tall now! They all gawk through their windows and back away, however, as you don't hiccup this time, but feel your nose tingling something awful...
12311112121211.title: The Antidote just throws fuel on the fire!

1231111212122.content:
Original author: Kardo

*Bzzt!* You say.

...

Wait, *Bzzt*? That's not "Roar!" at all! You watch in surprise as a large beam of energy erupts from your mouth, striking the dinosaur you were looking at. She was a tiny seismosaur, but due to your young age, you didn't even have the concept of 'prey', so to you she was just another dinosaur to make friends with.

You watch, happily, as your new friend begins to swell, her body increasing in size, as she quickly begins to run out of room in her cage. She strains against the cage, before her growing body shatters it! The growing dinosaur looks up at you, already 60 feet tall, and still growing from a single use of your new growth ray!

You're too young to really understand dinosaur body language, so you don't know what kind of expression was on her face as she stared up at you. It was, of course...
1231111212122.title: Giant baby T-rex with a growth ray

choices: The T-Rex outgrows her, and then some! Freedom at last!
She keeps getting bigger, and explodes free from the lab!
12311112121221.content:
Original author: Growasaur

The other dinosaurs all stare, more or less agape, as the equally young seismosaur continues to balloon larger and larger, some certain of a vague but persistent squealing rubber noise filling the air, as she steps here and there, to the sides, to keep footing as more and more of her grows, 70 feet swelling to 80, then 90, then an even 100 feet, from foot to head! She shakes her head, just a little smaller than yourself, then smiles up at you, a look of very-much-sincere affection on her face. She nuzzle up under your chin, and if you could blush, you would, and then some--she thanks you for freeing her with a little lick on the nose, which in turn makes you smile back at her; the thing is, the lick makes your nose tickle a little, and with a deep grunt, you can't quite help but pull back, hold, then sneeze hard, blasting your ray right into her, point blank!

Her jaw was momentarily open in confusion, as she had watched your pre-sneeze working up; consequently, the beam shoots straight down her gullet, and like a water balloon under Niagara Falls, she gorges freely on it, her blinks of shock turning to eyerolls of blissful indulgence, as she surges up to your height in less than a second; in the next, her muzzle meets yours in an adorable little dino-kiss. Then, of course, she rockets larger, her eyes lidding in pleasure as she keeps your mouth stuck to hers, feeding hungrily on the beam like a baby with its bottle!

The little humans all scatter through double-doors, just in time to have her growing rump push them right back out, then pump up against the wall, until cracks web bigger and longer from her increasing bulk; 200 feet...230 feet...280 feet...330 feet! She's getting so big that her body floods the interior of the courtyard, her backside rising up into, pressing against, then cracking more and more of the solarium dome at the ceiling's apex! There's no more room for her, or you, as some of the beam blows back into you, making your thick dino-toes curl in as you ripple up into her growing bulk with your own, twin giants filling too little space! Nice as the feeling is, admittedly, you're still shocked enough by this development to instinctively pull back some, cutting the feed off, and leaving her sighing in joy, shivering bigger still against the crumbling interior of the lab's center. If she gets any bigger, she'll burst the place open--or, at the rate you're tingling, you might finish the job yourself!

The grown brachiosaurus peacefully munched on the leaves from the high treetops, not a care in the world besides eating his lunch. The male sauropod was feasting on the high canopy of the 30 foot tall tree in the late Jurassic period, standing tall above the brush and other vegetation on the ground of the large field he was in.

A group of particularly juicy-looking leaves caught his eye, hanging on the tallest branch of the tree yet. He began to raise his massive front legs to catch them with his teeth, soon doing so as his huge feet pounded the earth below, shaking everything in the vicinity. And as he did so, he caught his breath, breathing in a long intake of air from the exertion.

Soon after he started chewing his leaves, he could feel something swell inside him, not being able to figure out the meaning of the sensation. However, as he swallowed his mouthful of leaves, he noticed something odd -- the tree's branches and indeed the entire tree itself seemed to be shrinking in front of him! The big dinosaur surveyed the tree, the tops of the branches now only about halfway up his long neck.

With this, the now even more massive 40 foot tall sauropod ponders what to do next.

It was a fine day, and everything was well. You were out grazing in a rather deserted grassland, your head low to the ground as you searched for small edible shrubs and berries that littered the ground. You had decided to spend some time grazing away from the rest of your small herd; they were in the next grassland over searching for similar food, but were not having much luck. The amount of food you continued to find was adequate, but you always seemed to be hungry no matter how much vegetation you ate: After all, you were a huge stegosaurus, standing at 13 feet tall, 30 feet long, and weighing in at over 2 tons!

You continued to graze for some time, determined to eat as much food before sunset and heading back to your herd. You look up and see the sun low on the horizon, meaning that sunset would come in another hour or two. Just as you were about to turn around and head towards the direction of your herd, you see a flash of color blazing across the sky. A giant, almost spherical object is charging its way towards the sun, or so it appears to be; you figure it must be caught in Earth's orbit but not entering the atmosphere for whatever reason. Instead, the meteorite gently passes by the planet, casting blanketing shadows on the continents as it makes its way past Earth.

You stare up at the large object in the sky, your land covered in shadow due to the semi solar eclipse, and all of the sudden a light shines down from the sky. It is instantly really bright all around you. Squinting, you realize that the light is not coming from something external, it is actually you that is glowing! The brilliant white light emanates from your body, and all you can do is really stand there and take in this unprecedented string of events. Immediately, you feel something like a jolt of adrenaline shoot through your body, and you realize that your surroundings are rapidly getting smaller and smaller---what is happening? You stand there in confusion for a moment, watching as the land around you shrinks further and further, the dark sky growing around you fast...

As fast as it appeared the light is gone, leaving you dazed. The grasslands around you have disappeared. Your feet are standing in what appears to be an expansive plain with a very thin layer of brown earth dotted with green. In the distance you can see a fuller, thick strip of green enclosing what looks like a small, steep hill.

A light bulb goes off, and you realize that these browns and greens are vegetation and trees, and the small hill must be a mountain! Which means...you must have grown...HUGE!

Just how big are you?
12333222121.title: Stegosaurus

Just be warned: despite the fact that the dinosaurs have not evolved past their Cretaceous era levels,or perhaps because of it, they grow a lot more. Suddenly, the raptor in your arms begins to tingle. She shudders, and giggles as she begins to slowly grow. You and the other dinosaurs look on in amazement as she approaches your height of six feet, then grows past it, stopping when she towers over you all at eight feet tall.

The baryonyx had stopped growing at six and a half feet, but the apatosaurus was nine feet tall, and still steadily rumbling upwards. Abruptly, she hiccups, and her body stretches two feet taller. She hiccups again, and again, and again, her body reaching seventeen feet tall, before she lets out one last hiccup, so powerful and loud it makes her body shudder, and balloons steadily up and up, all the way to a gigantic thirty feet tall, making her larger than her mother!

You're taking a walk through a desert, far from your home. You've come here to find a rattlesnake, a species that is supposed to live here, and photograph it, but you haven't had much luck. Taking a break after walking for a few hours, you decide you should just head back home and call it a loss. But as you leave, you hear a familiar rattling...

Turning around, and looking on the ground, you can see a rattlesnake lying coiled up, staring at you. You wonder what it's doing just sitting there, but you decide to photograph it anyway. As you reach for your camera, though, you hear a quiet voice.

"Ssstop, human. I need your help."

You stop, and look around before staring at the snake.

"Did you say that?" you ask it.

Original author: Neirv

You crouch down, looking at the apparently female snake.

"Okay... This is weird, but what do you need?" you ask her.

The snake looks behind her, then quickly slithers up to you, coiling around your leg and moving up your body until she sits with most of her long body coiled on your shoulder.

"There'sss a man coming," she says. "He gave me the ability to talk, and now he wantsss to make me giant! Don't let him!"

You look where she had glanced behind her, and see a crazed looking man in a torn lab coat, holding an odd staff. He takes a few deep breaths, and speaks.

"Call me Dr. Size," he begins. "I believe you have someone I need."

The snake hisses at him, her tail rattling loudly, but the scientist doesn't react.

"I genetically engineered that rattlesnake to be capable of telepathically speaking, and I was trying to determine how to control its size when it escaped. I need it back to continue my research on it!"

"On HER," the snake hisses again.

"Why?" you ask the scientist.

"So I can test if soze control is possible! I want to reveal my findings to other scientists, but I need to test it first. Imagine how powerful having a giant animal to do your bidding would be!"

"Don't let him have me!" the snake hisses. "He wantsss to ussse me to give himssself power! He wantsss to ussse me againssst innocccent people, and forccce them to obey him!"

"That sounds bad," you say. "Nobody should be forced to obey anyone." You glare at Dr. Size.

"I won't let you have her," you tell him.

He just smiles, aiming his staff at the snake on your shoulder. "Okay then. If you won't give her to me, I don't care. I have other snakes I can repeat the speech-giving process on, and use them for my plans. Now, since you won't let me have her... I'll let her have you."

A ball of light hits the snake from the staff, and she begins shuddering. You look in surprise at her as she suddenly starts growing, forcing you to push her from your shoulder. The scientist runs off, and you step back as the snake grows bigger and bigger....

You are 21 years old, and live by yourself in a small house a little bit away from the nearest motorway. It was just you and your blood red corn snake, Ariadne. She was, as far as you could tell, pretty big, at just under four feet in length. Contrary to her size, however, she was very affectionate, often rubbing her scaly head against you, or licking you, and on one occasion, sitting in your lap, something you never would've expected a snake to do!

She never really needed to eat much either, only the occasional frozen rat or mouse you bought from the pet store. She also loved to curl around your neck when you put her on your shoulders, often draping herself over your head.

You are woken by the sun slowly siphoning in through the windows, and look at your clock, taking note of the time - 7 o' clock. You look at the large vivarium next to your bed. You slide the glass pane aside and stroke down the length of Ariadne's spine with a finger, causing her to shudder slightly and wake up. She shudders again, and...

125232112.content:
Original author: TheCrimsonFreak

"Morning, Bosss!" Ariadne announces, smiling. "How'd you sssleep?" She nuzzles your hand, yellow eyes twinkling with glee.

"Not bad," you answer. "Back hurts a little, though--might need to buy some new pillows; maybe save up for a better mattress. Anyway, I'll get you some breakfast--think we have at least one mouse left in the freezer."

Patting her head once more, you turn and leave for the kitchen...that is, until you freeze in the hallway.

Ariadne just talked flashes through your mind. Ariadne. Snake. Talked. To me. Asked question.
Suddenly feeling very stiff, you make a slow turn on your heels and stagger back into your room. Ariadne is lounging atop some rocks in her cage, basking in the morning sunshine.

"Did...you...speak to me, earlier?" You croak out, not knowing if your brain is working right.

Ariadne tilts her head. "Of course, Boss. It was, what, ten seconds ago?"

You roughly sit on the floor, getting at eye-level with your pet snake. "But..you--snake. Not talk...impossible," you blurt.
After a pause, you groan, "Oh blast it, what happened last night?" as you facepalm and massage your temples.

Ariadne sighs. "Bosss, don't be ssso cliche'. You jussst went to a movie with your friendsss in town, remember? And you had dinner too, right? At that Mexican place?"

"Lebanese," you correct...then snort angrily, uncovering your face. "Wait a minute! Why am I correcting a hallucination?!? I just know something is up--I bet that cashier at the theatre put something funny in my popcorn! Or maybe the waiter at the restaurant spiked my drink when I tried to speak to him in Arabic but got the wrong side dish! Or--"

"BOSSS!!" Ariadne shouts, cutting you off. "Look; if you're wondering if you're thinking ssstraight, then obviously you aren't hallucinating! Because that happensss when your brain is all screwy, right? Well, if you're lucid enough to realize something is weird, and you know you aren't having a lucid dream, then the best explanation is that whatever is happening...really is happening!"

You blink...and blink again. Somehow, her logic seemed sound. Not to mention, if your food or drinks had been tampered with, you'd have been affected before now.
That didn't change the fact that your pet snake had suddenly started talking.

After a moment, you decide to roll with this.
"Makes sense...I guess," you admit, slumping your shoulders.

"Aww, don't feel bad, Boss. C'mon, just relax for a bit." Ariadne slithers up the wall of her glass cage, sticking to the side. Taking the hint, you gently pick her up and give the red serpent a quick nuzzle, which elicits laughs from both of you. "There. Feel better?" she coos, flicking out her forked tongue across your nose.

"Yeah...so, how about that breakfast?" you answer, good mood returned.

Now it's Ariadne's turn to look nervous. "Um, about that... Boss, I'm afraid things are gonna get, well, weirder pretty soon."

You laugh. "Weirder? How? You just started talking out of the blue, and just like any human besides hissing the 'S'. Seriously, you don't even have lips--no offense--and you can speak perfectly well, more or less."

Ariadne rubs the back of her neck with her tail, almost like a human would do with their hand. It's actually pretty adorable. "Yeah...well, In a few..seconds, I'm gonna start...getting bigger. A lot bigger."

Something in her tone makes you drop all humor--this could be serious. "What do you mean by, 'a lot bigger'?" you ask.

Ariadne shudders again, like when you petted her. Already, she's starting to magnify.
Chuckling awkwardly, she answers....

"I could sssstand to eat!" Ariadne says, weaving her upper body all around happily, flickering her thickened tongue in and out, giving off a nod or three. "Get it?"

"That's awful," you chide, though you pat her lovingly on her bigger head, "You're awesome, but that was terrible. Well done. For that, it's rats."

"Ratsssssss!" she chirps, thumping her thickened tail on the side of the bed in glee. She takes up most of the room by this point. "Oh, ratssss, the ratsss made me forget--I really sssshould explain what'ssss going on. Ssssee, ever ssssince..."

But you barely hear her, as you've already left to go downstairs. The situation is so amazing that you're more floating around the home than anything else, lost in a dreamy cloud of 'huh'-ness. Come to think of it, if this were a dream, you likely would have awoken upon considering it a dream in the first place. So okay, it's...really happening. A flood of images fill your thoughts, all of them super-cute; a primary one is you sleeping in her giant coils like a scaly, lovey hammock. Oh, you HAVE to ask her about that, if she gets a little bigger.

Ooh, you think. Hopefully she won't get house-damagingly big. The downsides start pouring in, but Ariadne's sweet female voice cuts them off:

"Oh, bossss! You got me the whole plaaaaaate! Gimme, gimme..." she chants, bobbing left and right happily. You smile wide,, as this was really about how you imagined she'd be, were she able to have expressed herself in such a fashion, in the past. You set the entire thing down on the bed, and she sticks her greedy muzle into the pile, hungrily gulping her food down as you slink onto her coils, stroking on her neck; if she could purr, she'd be motoring right now, and loud.

"Okay, so...how is this something, to even begin with?" you ask, petting her scales softly. "I've had you long enough, why is this happening now?" With a few heavy gulps, she siiiighs and flicks her tongue, nosing the plate politely to the side, and curling herself up untightly around you, burying her giant head against yours in affection.

"Right! Well, bosssss, I ssssssaw you watching one of those thingssss on the thing last weekend," she began tail-pointing at the TV. "You were watching sssssomething with a really big, happy sssssnake on it, ssssso big it crussssshed buildings and ssssstuff. I didn't know there were sssssnakes that big! Ssssso...I wished I could be big like that!"

"And you wished to be able to talk, too?"

"I had to explain mysssssssself, didn't I?" Her muzzle bumps your cheek as she rubs into you like a big cat. It's just...awesome...

"Okay, I guess...but that was a movie, like the one I went and saw earlier, it wasn't real. Snakes never get that big."

"They don't?"

"Not even close."

"Then I'm the biggessssst ssssnake in the world!!" she gasped, betraying a massive amount of snakey joy.

"Not even close," you repeat, rubbing under her chin. "There are pythons and constrictors that get way bigger than this, just not as big as the one in the movie..."

"Oh," she said, deflating slightly. "But watch thissssss..." she began, starting to tingle all over, before her coild billowed out and fattened over you, the pile of snuggly snake swelling larger, larger, larger, pushing out in size, her midesction's worth of coils bumping the bed off the frame, then shoving the frame back and against the wall, her head thumping up along the ceiling as she hissed in giddy glee, her scales audibly stretching as the pressure on you increased. She soon stopped again, literally stuffing your room to the brink, with over 20 feet of coiled beauty. She rested her head a little uncomfortably on her own bulk, it alone the size of your upper chest and head.

"Sssssssee? Your affection made me wish I wasssss bigger, sssssso it makessss me get even bigger when you love me!"

"A...Ariadne...you're huge!" you sputter, making her flick her tongue.

"I agree, bosssss! Lemme unwind for you..." she grunted, looking over at the door to the room, which was still opened enough for her to flex around with, making her lower quarters push it fully open; she hisses with a giggle, obviously over-pleased with the whole situation, forcing her tail down the upstairs hallway, then partly down the stairs, weaving around and threading herself through the upper half of the house, to where only her head rests inside the room. "Ta-daaaaah! Tssssss."

"Well done! It's just...you know...you're filling half the house. How do I get out? What are you going to do!?"

The gigantic snake thought on it a minute. "I guesssss I sssssee the downside, bossss...here, I'll fix it!" With that, she nuzzles hard into you, and you reflexively hug her snout tight, giving off a smile as she buries her nose into your belly happily.

Then, with a telltale tingle racing through her body, you realize your error; her nose bulges bigger still against you, then bigger than that, groans and cracks heard around the house as her tingling grows into a hard shudder.

"Oh, rats..." you start, as she swells rapidly...
12523211211.title: "Sure thing, bosss"

Ariadne bulges larger, accidentally pushing you over, and the increasingly larger crimson serpent flicks her tongue in and out, licking you. As Ariadne starts to swell even bigger, she begins to withdraw her coils onto the top floor before threading herself in and out of the rooms on the top floor, then snakes (pardon the pun) her scaly tail down the stairs as it lengthens and swells bigger and bigger.

Ariadne forcefully nuzzles you again, her head as large as your entire body by now. You manage to resist hugging her as she noses over your body, each scale in contact with you stretching wider as you feel them. Ariadne then bursts larger, filling most of the room, as well as those she had put her coils into, the entire house creaking and groaning as her bulk presses against it, her long coils completely filling the ground floor to the point where almost no space at all remained.

You are just a simple 14 year old boy living at home. Unlike most kids, you didn't ask for a dog or cat or even a hamster. Instead, you asked for (and got) a male ball python. You had him ever since he was a wee little baby. You gave him the name "Alexander", after Alexander the Great, since you were a history buff. Over the years you slowly watched him gorw bigger and bigger. You were amazed when he had reached his full length of 3 1/2 feet long.

While some considered pythons dangerous, Alexander was always gentle when he was with you. He devoured his meals greedily, storing the nutrients to grow over the years. With his maximum size attained, he still required his usual meal. Which was what you were just about to give him.

It was the end of the day, and you had just finished school. It was now summer vacation, and you were relieved that there was no work over the break. You rushed home as quick as you could, anxious to see your beloved pet. You threw the front door open, and ran up the stairs into your room, and shut the door carefully.

Dropping your backpack, you turned your head to Alexander's box, and you were shocked when you saw that...
12523212.title: Different breeds

1252322.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

Feeling really bored and antisocial one day, you decide to head to the local zoo by yourself to check out their new animals and exhibits that were advertised in the paper. According to the ad, the zoo now had the single largest snake in human captivity, and that prospect was too cool to miss!

After entering the reptilian block of exhibits, you can quickly see that this news had caused a bit of a fuss with the local community. Across the large hallway people were crowded around the largest tank there, trying to bustle and shove in front of each other to get a better look. You somehow manage to get to the front of the crowd and your eyes go wide at what you see.

There lying peacefully in the tank is the single largest snake you've ever seen, it must have been over 30 feet long, and two feet thick towards the middle of its body! But what kind of snake is it?
1252322.title: The snake is in a zoo.

choices: There's another snake in the tank!
12523221.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

Due to its markings on its dark skin you realize that it's an anaconda, and most likely the biggest one currently in captivity! It really is a fascinating and large creature, and you study it for a few moments before it turns its head away from its coils to look at you. It stares into your face, into your eyes for a few seconds before its tongue sticks out and waves about, seemingly trying to smell you and familiarize itself with you. It begins to slither around a bit, and the crowd behind you livens up more, trying to shove up further to the glass and take pictures.

Feeling annoyed by the crowd, you decide to leave and come back later soon to closing time. You reenter the reptilian exhibit to find it deserted, mostly all of the visitors in the park gone for the day. You walk up to the glass tank with the huge anaconda inside, but you can see from a distance that the front of its body is up against the glass, its eyes staring into yours as you approach. Normally you'd feel creeped out by this, but there already seems to be some sort of connection between you and the snake and you feel calm and collected as you stare into each others' eyes.

You smile at the anaconda, impressed by its intelligence and docile behavior for such a large animal. However, your smile begins to falter when you realize that the snake takes up about half of the large tank just due to its girth. It must have been awfully cramped in there, and you feel sorry for it. You wish that it didn't have to live in such conditions, that it had a much bigger environment to call home.

Just as you were wishing that the huge snake had a bigger place to live, you're shocked to find that:
12523221.title: An anaconda

choices: The snake effortlessly breaks free, and uses its coils to wrap you up in a hug!
The snake stays put for now, and talks to you! But is it a boy or a girl?

Original author: Infinity421

The anaconda seems to... Pulse slightly, a slow ripple spreading throughout its body as you watch, confused. The snake slowly slithers to the front of the enclosure it was being kept in and uses its large coils to elevate its head until it can look you in the eyes, its own intelligent orbs gleaming as they looked over you.

Another pulse runs through the snake, and- no, you must have seen it wrong. A trick of the light or something. But then another pulse runs through the snake and it poofs larger again, an inch or so wider and longer. Pressing itself against the glass of the enclosure, it flicks its to the in and out as it grows against the glass, a squeaking noise filling the air as it runs against the thin sheet more and more.

The snake continues to steadily pulse larger and larger, taking up almost three quarters of its enclosure by now, and still sticking to the glass and flicking its tongue out every few seconds. You slowly back away, unable, or perhaps unwilling, to take your eyes of the anaconda as it swells and pulses bigger and longer and thicker, completely filling the floor of its enclosure and still growing!

It must have been almost sixty feet long now, as it rears its head back, and fixes you with another warm, intelligent stare, having the continually move its head down as it grows more and more, long having dwarfed your own.

The snake regards the glass sheet in front of it. If it really wanted to, it could break free, and then have eeven more room to grow...
125232211.title: The anaconda is growing!

Its coils wrap you up gently into a big hug, each coil being at least two-thirds of your own height! You chuckle as the snake's warm, big body embraces you and its head, now much bigger than your own, reaches down to snuggle yours. Its body thickens and widens more and more as the anaconda pulses bigger and bigger, longer and longer. It must be 100 feet long now and threatening to fill the entire exhibit hallway! The gigantic snake's coils are now quite a bit taller than you, and they are closing in on you as they pulse and expand bigger. This makes for a tighter and more enjoyable hug, but you quickly feel that the snake's embrace is becoming too embracing pretty quickly. Its tongue continues to flicker in and out of its mouth as its pulsating growth intensifies. The anaconda's immense form swells faster than ever before, and soon its scaly body completely fills up the hallway as is threatening to crash through the ceiling!

Sensing impending danger, the anaconda pushes you atop one of its huge coils where you able to grab hold wile on your stomach to avoid the 12 foot tall ceiling right above you. The snake continues to pulse slightly as it slithers for the exit door towards freedom, and potential grounds to grow even bigger in.

What happens once you are both outside?
1252322111.title: Big Hugs!

As intrigued as you are gazing at the massive and growing anaconda, you can't help but feel it needs to break free from behind that glass.

As you continue to think these thoughts and hear the creaking of the glass that was threatening to break, you hear another noise---one of a voice! Your eyes dart away from the anaconda's pulsating body and into its gleaming black eyes.

"Hello, human!" The snake says in a smooth voice. "Pleassssed to meet you."

The voice is that of a...
1252322112.title: The snake stays put for now, and talks to you! ...

She continues to hug you gently, all while pulsating bigger and bigger.
12523221122.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

You stand still in shock for a moment before slowly backing away from the enclosure again, thinking that you misheard, that it was someone else who had spoken.

"What'ssss the matter, human? Never ssseen a growing sssnake before?" The female anaconda says, laughing softly as she flicks her tongue in and out against the glass.

You're finally able to muster up some more courage. "I...I just didn't know that snakes could get so big! Or talk, for that matter...I'm not dreaming that I'm Harry Potter, am I?" you ask rhetorically, shaking your head.

The anaconda laughs playfully again, pulsating even bigger and the sound of breaking glass pierces through the air. "Of courssse not, ssssilly human. I am mossst definitely real, and mossst definitely getting bigger!" she says, her eyes still intelligently gazing into yours.

At this point you don't have many words. "Wow...just wow!" you say, your mouth open a bit as you stare at the growing anaconda. "But please, call me Wes. And may I ask your name? And why you are growing so huge?" you add.

"Niccce to meet you Wesss, my name isss Anna. Anna the anaconda, real original, I know!" she laughs. "And I am growing becaussse you have wisshed it, have you not? I could sssense you feeling sssory for me, for me to have a bigger ssspace to live in...but then I thought, 'Why not sssimply grow, and grow, and grow ssso the world around me can be my home? I can be unssstopable!' Ssso I will fulfill both of our wisshes and become the biggessst sssnake ever!"

And before you're able to get a word in edgewise, Anna's enormous body breaks through the thin glass, her large coils spilling out of the enclosure as she pulses and pulses, bigger and bigger and bigger, her rate of growth much faster now than before!

She quickly slithers out of her cage before becoming trapped inside, and you find yourself wrapped inside her giant coils you as she gives you a gentle hug. Despite the fact that she has grown close to 100 feet long now with coils almost as tall as yourself, her squeezing hugs are very gentle and affectionate, and as she brings her growing head down (now almost as big as your entire body) you are tickled by her flickering tongue as she nuzzles you.

You see and feel her pulsating body stretch bigger and bigger, wider and longer as the enormous anaconda now surpasses 150 feet long, with coils now considerably taller than you! Anna lifts you up in her coils and continues her snuggling, relishing her growth as well as the addition of a new friend!

"Yesss, Wesss...yesss...bigger, bigger, bigger! Mussst get bigger!"

Before you know it she has grown to over 200 feet long, and rapidly expanding even bigger! Will Anna soon outgrow the entire hallway of the reptile exhibits?
12523221122.title: Female

choices: Anna breaks free, her growth slowing down a little
Anna breaks free, growing faster and faster!
125232211222.content:
Original author: Growasaur

The bigger Anna swells in size, the more you think of her growing even larger, that odd and insistent impulse of the mind, that unsubtle desire for more of anything--it focuses into a proverbial laser, which might as well blast out from your forehead and into hers, as the giddy serpent presses her growing head into your body, letting you feel it pump and swell larger against you. The scales, slick but not slimy, spread wider and wider, your arms and hands trailing inward as she grows bigger and bigger and bigger. Her tongue flicks out against your exposed stomach, her snout pulling the shirt up and up, tickling you all over like crazy.

250 feet pulses and booms up to 300, Anna's gentle, heavy coils pouring out over the hallway, looping and thudding into the walls, knocking other exhibits back harmlessly as she shudders and blows up another 50 feet. Her tail flows out through the back end of the hallway, the topside of her girth beginning to plump up into the ceiling, her head thumping and pressed ever-tighter against the uppermost ceiling, filling the up-curved glass skylight with more and more scaly mass.

"Bigger, Wessss...b-b-biiigggerrrr!" Anna hisses, clearly overjoyed. Though her features remain largely unchanged, her eyes sparkled with a loving brilliance, as though she had found the one she would adore forever, and some new, well-deserved existence was now yours to both share in. You blush darkly as her coils tighten, snuggling your tiny body carefully, her head now considerably larger than your entire body! She dips her snout in and nuzzles away over you, tickling more and more with her tongue as she closes her eyes, trembles, shakes, tenses tightly inward...then erupts even bigger!

In one huge, wonderful burst, the snake bulges clear through the west wing of the entire exhibit itself, pushing everything out, as the walls begin to creak and warp outside. Her rumbling grows and grows, over 500 feet of swelling reptilian bliss starting to crack the building down the side! She won't stop getting larger! Y-you don't want her to stop, anyway!

And still you feed her growth, as she trembles and pulses up larger still, all sights of the interior lost to her sheer bulk, her coils completely obscuring everything around you, until there's nothing but her, growing bigger and bigger and bigger...
125232211222.title: Putting the HUG in HUGE

choices: The cops call in the military to stop Anna
The attack makes Anna tremble all over...
1252322112221.content:
Original author: Growasaur

With a great, shattering BOOM, Anna bursts free of the wing, as well as the outer rim, and the main lobby, roaring and shrieking animals tumbling unhurt through and out the front door, clamoring down the steps and into the open, as the anaconda's bulky coils spill freely out behind them. Through the ensuing cloud of grit emerges Anna's colossal head, as she hisses and shivers adorably. She cranes a head as big as a house back and down towards you, her great tongue flickering happily.

"Aaaaaah! Sssso niiiccce!" she moons, wiggling her hefty, bulging midsection, like a gargantuan, scaly ferret, overjoyed in her massive, incredible size-over 650 feet long, nearly 40 feet thick in the middle. "Again, Wesss, pleasssse! That wasss lovely!"

"Whoa, wait, hold up," you stammer, holding on tight to a body-length scale, as she looms so high overhead, "you're already pretty gigantic, aren't you?"

"Ohhh, Wessss, don't," she giggles, as sirens begin to fill the air in the distance. "I can smell it all over you, you're every bit as excccited as I am!"

Her growth has just about steadied, having slowed to a cute crawl, her scales tickling their way against you as they grow and grow. At about 700 feet in length, Anna peers around herself, cocking her head and flicking her tongue as she regards the tiny world below. The animals on the ground, even the largest, fall comically short of the height of her coils, not even coming up the top of the lowest rung. All the while, you fight back at her observation, not so much bothering to justify it or reason the strange feeling out but, more practically, attempting to stifle the sheer joy in being on her at such a magnificent size.

Your stupor is broken, or close enough to it, as the sirens come close, and tiny policemen scatter from their vehicles, all pointing their weaponry high towards the massive snake.

"Oh, they look like the nice man who walks by my cage past clossssing time!" Anna says, making every jaw on every cop drop at the utterance. "They can admire my ssssssssize! Hello, down there! Aren't I pretty?"

In horror, you see them raise their rifles--they must not even see you on her body! A hail of gunfire answers the serpent's question, making her giggle loudly.

"Ah! Haha! T-that ticklessssss!!"
1252322112221.title: Anna breaks free, her growth slowing down a little

choices: The attack actually does a little harm to the unwary anaconda
The attack makes Anna grow near-endlessly larger!
12523221122211.content:
Original author: Growasaur

"Anna, sweetie," you stammer, trying hard to be heard over the continued hail of gunfire below, "seriously, we shouldn't antagonize them! You should get out of dodge!"

"I'm in dodge?" she hissed, curious. "I thought this was Baltimooooore! And who's antagonizzzzing? I like humanssss!"

"She can talk, sir!" one officer said, guns still firing away. His superior, stationed behind the opened door to the squad car, continued reloading his firearm, unfazed.

"Johnson, clearly we're dealing with something beyond our understanding, as a culture and as a species--obviously we should kill it as much as possible! At least, to the full extent of the law!"

"Yes, sir!"

Anna giggled frantically as the bullets bounced limply off her trembling body.

"It's like being tickled all over! Ooh! Keep firing those tiny magic fingersssss!"

"Anna, please..." you say, pleading with the goddess creature.

"Ah...Ahhhh, I'm gonna...g-grooow!"

She thrashed all about happily, as you sigh, whimper, and hang on tight. You know what's coming. Anna cries out as her quaking coils blow up bigger, and bigger, the scales singing some strange symphony of stretching groans and pulling rubbery sounds. The side of her bottom coil pulses fatter and wider, growing bigger and heavier as it rolls down the main walkway and steps, bulldozing the cop cars with no discernable effort as the tiny men scatter every-which-way. 700 feet of anaconda swells to 800 feet...900 feet...1,000 feet! She coos and rumbles and burbles joyfully, feeling herself spread out over more and more, the opposing end of her coils snapping through the nearby park, her bulk spilling cutely into the city streets.

The people all run, which would have baffled the giddy female, were she not busy crowing and panting, gulping in air as she inflated bigger still. Her scales began to bulge into the facades of the neighboring buildings across the way, crackling glass and bending beams, crushing the pavement of the city streets into an increasingly fine powder as her bulk sank in deeper and deeper. Busses flipped, trolleys were put into reverse, and refunds were frantically issued as patrons fled, the 1,400-foot long serpent bulging even thicker, so much so that her midsection got snagged between two much-larger skyscrapers.

She chuckled and nosed lovingly on the buildings, looking up at them both.

"Ooh! Wesss, lookit! I can't wait until these are tiny compared to me!"

As she laughed off the situation, she gave a last shuddery burst, flaring up twice as big, her sides dimpling against the buildings, which groaned and budged just slight, but otherwise held her fast. Her tail was so far away that it still rested over her former home, which she stopped looking back at, once the rumbling of tanks could be heard, as well as the thrumming thumpthump of helicopter blades slicing the air.

"Eeeee, more toyssssss!" Anna cried, wiggling jubilantly in place. Her growth had stopped, leaving her still pinned in between the two huge buildings. She was over half a mile long, and over 450 feet high, without lifting her head (which, when she did, put her at over 1,000 feet tall).

"Fire!" one teeny man in his teeny toy tank roared.

Anna beamed a bit, childish grin, and closed her eyes, puffing up. She was readying for impact!
12523221122211.title: The cops call in the military to stop Anna

choices: Anna grows even bigger than that, her body smashing into each little reactor...
125232211222112.content:
Original author: Growasaur

It's too late. The national guard has opened fire with their big guns, tanks, machine guns, bazookas, anti-aircraft guns, darts, spitballs--everything mankind can muster (shy of a warhead) is hurled, flung, or otherwise propelled towards the massive reptilian beauty. Anna, being Anna, simply squeals out her delight and puffs herself up, as impact clouds and small explosive bursts began scattering all over her trembling hide. Her eyes lid to slits as her tongue flick-flickers excitedly, the quaking tingles racing up and down her length getting worse and worse and worse.

"Ahhh! Yesssssssss!! Keep it coming, you ssssweet little men! M-make me grow!!" she huffs, hungrily writhing with want. Her sides begin inflating by gentle degrees, as if warming up for the show, as they roll bigger, tighter and heavier against the two buildings pinning her in place. Obviously, you know this won't be the situation much longer.

From far down either end of the downtown street, thousands of little people surge away as one, emptying the vicinity as fast as possible, as her quaking rumbles begin pulsing through the pavement, making lamp posts and mailboxes and trees all wobble and shift about precariously in place. Sewer rattle, car alarms cry in...uh, alarm, and even the well-removed crowds are suddenly bowled over, as Anna's breathing sinks into a husky rumbling pant, and she finally explodes:

The swelling anaconda's body balloons out wider and wider, pushing meanly through and shoving both skyscrapers off their foundations, as showering walls of glass tumble around her hide, which just trembles and surges even tighter, the bigger Anna bulges. She cries and whips her head around, nuzzling the air in joy, as she doubles in size, then shakes, moans, and doubles that size, bowling over one city block, then the next, her rolling undersides inflating madly as they snap and pop the rows of tiny buildings flat, like a steamroller over packing bubbles.

"H...haaaaaaaaah!!" she huffs, harder and harder, taking bigger gulps of air in as she pants and shivers and erupts larger, and larger, so much so that a loud, low pulling noise fills the city, the acoustic oddity bouncing off of everything she hasn't yet flattened, accenting the snake's shuddery growth.

2 miles rumbles, tenses, and blows up to 6, then 15, Anna's thickening tail pushing and curling cutely as it looms across town, filling and sweeping ugly trenches through the mid and uptown districts. She's half as long as the entire city! Her sides fatten in the center, gaining more and more curvy weight, making Anna coo and giggle, as she continued trembling worse and worse...

"MOOOORE!" she cries, booming even bigger, and bigger, leaving a 20 mile-tall monster snake smothering the city with her rippling body. She blinks at a teeny plane as it passes along, then tries desperately to change course. "Hello!" she chirps, before shivering again, her head rising higher and higher towards the clouds.

you've been holding on for dear life the entire time, until the gentle slope of her growing body guides you towards the upside of a coil, and you find she's just so big that you can easily stand on the vast plain of it. You breath a little easier, before looking up, and seeing several bombers screeching through the skies--god, they're heading for Anna! Th...they're going to really nuke her!!

"Anna! Anna, honey, move! We have to move!"

"Ooh, Wessss!" she booms, splitting the skies with her giggly voice, "You're sssstill on me! Good, good! I wassss a little afraid I'd lossssst you!"

"Those little dots coming towards us, Anna, they have nukes! You gotta get clear! Those aren't just bullets or tank artillery!" You push uselessly on her massive bulk, feeling you only push yourself back against a smooth, single scale, big as a stadium.

"Really! Thankssss, Wessss, I'm glad you told me sssso!" She just straightens her neck up, before squinting, giving a little look of validation, and then easily snapping her jaws over the cluster of teeny-tiny bombers, swallowing them whole. She blinks, then feels around, and spits out a tinier cluster of parachute-bearing little men, who now have a fun story for their kids.

"Thanksssss for the gift!" Anna laughs, and sincerely--she really thinks the humans want her to grow!

"God, Anna, don't tell me you swallowed them! Those are active!"

"Sssssso? I like to be active too, unlesssss it'ssss cold..."

Funnily enough, you find you're more panicked over the thought of Anna combusting from within, even if she's 20 miles long, and nearly 2 miles from underside to up. You still don't want to lose her!

A deep, stifled rumble emanates from within Anna, and you brace for the worst.

...Nothing. Up far above, the anaconda just hiccups, and lets off a cute puff of smoke.

"Those have a real kick!" she giggles, before starting to shudder like crazy, worse than ever before.

"Oh...no!" you cry, thumping down on your rump in helplessness. "Okay, fine, here we go!"

"That'sssss the ssspirit, Wessss! Heehee!"

And oh, god, how Anna begins to grow...
125232211222112.title: Snafu

choices: Anna grows even bigger than that!!!!

"YEEEEEEEEEEEEEE--"

By the time Anna begins crying out her bliss, she's 50 miles long, her middle bulging up to 4 miles around...

"EEEEEEEEEEEEEEE--"

Anna spasms and blows up even bigger, furiously swelling in size, her skin straining like mad just to contain her mass, as she spurts and pumps past 80 miles in length, and 6 miles around, her booming undersides grinding through the city, lakes and parks and forests and hillsides and interstate...

"EESSSSSSSSSSSSSS!"

The giddy anaconda , once considered quite a healthy size for a snake, was now growing so big that you found yourself engulfed in the chasm spanning the curves where two scales met.
