"Wessss, look! Look!" Anna boomed, her sweet feminine giggles echoing and reverberating across the countryside, both ways. "I'm growing ssssso biiiiiiig!! Everything'sssss ssssso tiny!"

She cooed and swished her thickened tail tip cutely, looking all around the shrinking splay of cities and roads and rivers and mountains, as they all grew comparatively tinier and harder to distinguish proper. She cocked her huge head and flicked her tongue, before booming up to 130 miles, shaking terribly; she moaned and gasped, then squealed adorably, as she rocketed up and up, pushing all the way to 200 miles in length! Her sides heaved in and out as she chuckled, peering around the curve of the world itself.

"Sssssso pretty! I love it! Wessss, look! The moon! I bet I could nom it up now..."

You more feel the vibrations of her colosso-speak, rather than simply hear it. Youstupidly catch yourself starting to answer, then smack your forehead and shrug, certain there's no way she can hear you reply anymore. You don't feel that tingling anymore, so it seems like Anna's growth has stopped--but gads, she was as long as a state now, and totally feeling her proverbial oats. Who knew what on Earth--literally, on Earth--she would do now...

"Please be content, please stop trying to get bigger," you chant uselessly to yourself.

"Ooh," Anna chirps, as she attempts to shift her untold billions of gigatons, in the process of doing so shaking the continent. "Wessss, lookit--More of thosssse little ssstingy-tickly toys!"

Your stomach drops further still. More warheads, surely, being sent from who-knows-where. Surely the Americans had figured out that it just makes Anna grow bigger, but the rest of the world, locked in panic-mode, was probably loosing its entire supply of high-end arms, from all angles, all at Anna.

Well...it was a nice world while it lasted. And not because it was about to be blown up, either--

it was Anna who was going to blow up. Bigtime...
1252322112221121.title: Anna grows 100 times bigger!

choices: Anna's reply is cut short by a flash--a HUGE alien fleet appears!!
Anna likes your thinkin'! She'll try to eat the entire Sun!!!
12523221122211211.content:
Original author: Growasaur

"Nnnngh, sssso gooood," Anna giggles, thrashing her head and stupendously huge neck all about, actually weaving INTO the path of every incoming warhead, so as to not let a single one pass her 200-mile long body by. Such dedication pays off, as said payloads detonate, peppering her reptilian hide with rows upon dotted rows of explosions, each as tiny as a little party popper, compared to the anaconda. "More, little humansssss, more!! Sssssuper-pretty pleasssse?"

The female serpent is in a state well-beyond rapture, her body nearly aglow as it trembles more and more. You curl up into a fetal position, and just brace yourself, now less than a slight percentage the size of a speck against the giggly snake--and that's before you feel the rumbling grow and grow, shaking the entire hemisphere ominously; Anna hisses and cries out in glee as she tightens all over, groans, shudders, pants...and explodes fifteen times larger, in one shove of mass, your blown-up coils pumping and pushing, dragging unstoppably across the continent, as she fully covers the mass, smothering it under increasing teratons of giddy serpent.

But oh, Anna is just getting started--she huffs loudly and moans, as her next spurt forces her up another twenty times larger, making her head surge closer to the moon, as the rim of destruction snugging her anaconda coils rises higher and wider, scattering out against her ballooning body; cities, towns, forests, mountains, canyons, lakes, streets--everything is shoved over and out, as Anna fills the skies, the atmosphere, and even more and more of space, as she outgrows the continent. Her slithery bulk spills cutely out in both oceans at once, her moon-sized head shivering as she closes her eyes and rumbles loudly:

"Haaaah, I c-can't stop...grooooowwwwiiiiing!!!"

True enough to form, Anna explodes from 6,000 miles to 60,000, her coils finally slipping awkwardly down the curvature of the planet, as she outgrows it, hugging herself against the too-small ball tightly; this only grinds her bulk against country after country, island upon island, though amazingly no one seems hurt by her--they all merely get pressed down on impossibly, weighed down by unimaginably big scales, which tremble and stretch bigger, as Anna hiccups, tingles, and grows again!

Slipping free into the void of space, Anna unfurls herself, wiggling all about in zero-gravity; her thick midsection bulges bigger and fatter as she giggles and playfully circles around and around, in a goofy loop-de-loop, with Earth shrinking away in the center.

"Look, Wessssss, I've got the whole world in my coilsssss!"

She laughs and forms her length into the shape of a phony set of jaws, the chuckling female snake acting like the jaws she shaped herself into were nomming the teeny planet. Then she made herself out in the shape of an angry eye, with the planet being the iris.

"Hehe! GRRRRR!" she giggled, as her head alone soon grew equal to the size of the world. She nuzzled lovingly on it, flicking her tongue all about. "Hi, humanssss, hello! Now I can see all of you in your habitat! Hee!"

She grunted, smiling wider, as she let out of little soft coo of pleasure, then rippled out even bigger, and bigger, and bigger, 90,000 miles growing and surging out to 110,000...240,000...390,000...

"Ahhhh, sssso big! Ssssso big! D-don't ever ssssstop, body!" she moons cutely, panting openly. With one last burst of rippling growth, Anna heaves out even larger, and finally comes to a slow, huffing and gulping in bliss.

500,000 miles. Half a million miles. 2,640,000,000 freaking feet of serpentine godliness. You were long-past being stunned or shocked, given you were still taking air in, even after riding with her into space. Something was clearly out of whack, and that was foregoing the monstrous tera-snake, who still chattered and giggled to you.

"Wessss, you think I can find ssssome way to get any bigger?"

"I dunno," you laugh, in hysterics. "Maybe eat the Sun, or something? That'd be one heck of a combustion for you to feed on." You're joking, yet you know what's coming...
12523221122211211.title: Anna grows 5,000 times bigger!!

choices: "Rescue the escape pods first--their friends won't be back for a while."
"Go after the fleet, Anna! It's snack time!" >:D
125232211222112111.content:
Original author: TheCrimsonFreak

Anna cocks her continent-sized head, cutely flicking her forked tongue out a few times. The chipper goddess-sized serpent glaces at the Earth nestled in her coils, then at the blazing yellow jewel it orbits. She looks at the star hungrily, but hesitates. "But, doessssn't the planet kinda need th--" She replies, only to break off mid-sentence, when a massive flash overtakes your vision. You and Anna both yelp in shock and cringe away.

After a second, you blink your vision clear and look back up, a reply to Anna's unfinished question on your lips...which dies rather quickly, when you get a good look at the star-scape.

Starships. Alien starships, specifically--they were even built in the classic "Flying Saucer" style, complete with a shiny plating on the hull that looked an awful lot like chrome. And there were thousands of them.

Well at least these aliens had good taste, right? But why were there so many of them...?

"Wessss? Who are these guys?" Anna chirps, staring at the armada. At her size, the ships looked about the size of cookies compared to a normal-sized anaconda. "Are they gonna help be get bigger? Their toysssss don't look like what thossssse other little men were ussssssing, though--maybe they're friendsssss?"

Looking closer at the swarm of alien ships--who'd halted rather quickly when they spotted Anna--you begin to pick out what look VERY much like weapons mounts mounted on the hulls. LOTS of weapons mounts...BIG ones, too.

Unbelievable. First Anna grows big enough to hold the entire planet in her cute, scaly coils, and now aliens show up and try to invade!
...Well, more emphasis on "try to" than "invade", though.

"I...don't think they're 'friends', Anna," you reply. "I think these guys are here to invade Earth, not help you get bigger."

Anna gasps in shock--the physics-defying inward gust actually pulling a few ships out of formation--and looks down at the little planet she's hugging with a motherly expression."I-Invade?! Why? There's plenty of planet to live on, they just need to ask! I don't see their names on it, so why are they trying to take it?"

Before you can answer that, the biggest ship in the alien fleet, suddenly opens up with its lasers, the white-hot beams searing into Anna's colossal hide just below her head. The rest of the ships follow suit, peppering her with weapons fire....which, naturally, starts off another round of growth!

"Heeerrrre we go agaiiiin!!" Anna whoops out, hissing with glee. This time, her growth is in a smooth, easy motion--no more rocketing and lurching in size when lasers come into play, it seems. 550,000 miles.....675,000 miles....725,000 miles!!!! Within seconds, she's so impossibly, epically, mind-crushingly ENORMOUS that Earth, now less than pea-sized, simply slips from her coils, somehow unharmed despite the sudden release of pressure.

"Hehehehehe....silly alienssss! You can't sssstop me with your itty-bitty gunsssss!" Anna giggle-booms, form quaking with laughter. Indeed, they couldn't. Like the nukes and bombs from before, the barrage of lasers and plasma sent by the now-quite-terrified aliens didn't even leave burn marks on Anna's form. Now in full retreat, the UFOs reversed course and flew away from the unconquerable snake-goddess. A few unlucky stragglers had been smashed to scrap when Anna's ballooning form slammed into their ships from behind. A few more were smacked by her tail, sending the would-be invaders careening helplessly of into the void. The luckier ones retreated, flying away at breakneck speed--though there wasn't another flash. They simply sped away until they were out of sight.

Escape pods were scattered like confetti everywhere; a few had settled into a loose orbit around the Moon and formed rings.

When all was said and done Anna had reached 2,600,567 miles in size. The tip of her tail brushed against Mars, carving a new canyon in the rust-colored surface; her head tapped against Mercury, flattening a sulfurous mountain instantly. She could have easily swallowed a planet, with room in her maw to spare!

"I did it, Wessss! I sssssaved the Earth!! Ooh, I'm a hero now!!" Anna coos, giggling up a storm. She surveys the scattered wreckage of the hundreds of ships that were too slow to escape, and their friends who did, now in full retreat. "Sssso, what do we do about them now? A few got away, but thesssse guys don't deserve to just float out here forever...."

She looks down at you--you were less than microscopic in comparison now; a single scale could have fit a dozen cities with room to spare. Still, she DID have a good point: what to do about the aliens?

After a moment's thought, you answer....
125232211222112111.title: Unwelcome Guests

choices: Loquost absorbs Anna's incoming growth spurt!
Anna gets crazy-big, overshadowing even the planet-eater!
125232211222112112.content:
Original author: Growasaur

"OOOOOHOOHOOHOOOOOO, yesssssss!" Anna booms with rapture at the idea, her coils rolling through the heavens with a giddy tingle of approval. "That'sssss a good idea!!"

"I WAS JOKING!" you bellow, somewhat kicked back into caring by the thought. 'Seriously, don't! It's a miracle enough we didn't--er, YOU didn't annihilate poor Earth, getting so big!"

"But..." Anna stammers, trying to purse her snake lip, "what should I use to grow off of, then?"

"NOTHING! Stop growing, Anna, come on! There's like half a million miles of you already!"

"But..."

"No, Anna, just...stop. Enjoy what you have, okay?"

"But..."

"But what!?"

"But I already reached the Ssssssssun..."

Sure enough, there you both are...and there it is, hot and huge, dwarfing even the mighty serpent female, who wiggles with raw want.

"Gah, can't I even sssssnack on a teeny bit? Enough to not desssstroy ssssstuff?"

"I...don't even know if or how that would work. My mind's already pretty broken up about you getting planet-sized and talking and being roughly invulnerable to harm."

"Well...what'ssssss a little more absssssurdity, then?"

She has you there. You think. Though you fight it, you can already see her sucking in heavily, until huge, lengthy contrails of flame begin to funnel out through space, and into Anna's mouth. She gulps a full length down, before she hiccups and flickers her vast tongue.

"Haaaaaah," she sighs, closing her eyes. "Ssssso good!"

"Would you quit!?"

With a great, cosmos shaking rumble, Anna begins to swell out again, bigger and bigger, her great coils getting lengthier and lengthier, fatter and fatter around the middle; her scales spread out more and more, deepening the cleft-style valley that you find yourself stuck in, forming greater canyons between where each end meets the other. 600,000 miles booms, bulges and bursts to 800,000, then a staggering 1,000,000 miles--with one gulp, Anna has doubled her size! And she's beginning to suck in more and more!

"If you don't stop, I'm leaving!"

Astonishingly...that does it. She gulps, then worriedly turns to where she thinks you are on her body, her tongue lashing frantically.

"No, no, don't! Pleasssssse, don't go!"

"You'll stop, then?"

"Mmmnf...okay..." she sighs, dejectedly.

"Thank you! Okay, let's get somewhere a little less dangerous, okay? We'll figure out what to do then."

"Oka...ahhhhh...HAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHH..." Anna begins to reply, before her words tumble off into an unhinged pant of pleasure. You know what's coming, so you hunker down, as the vast snake's body trembles worse and worse, to the point where you can feel everything shaking more than ever before--and that itself just gets worse and worse, as the shaking builds...

Holy cats, how big will she get!?

Your pondering is cut short by a physics-defying bellow. You and Anna turn to see something every bit as insane as Anna was, in turns of surreal spectacle. There was an alien, akin to some titanic Rhinoceros Beetle with bat wings and a lizard's tail, doing some hefty looming of its own. Gadzooks, it had to be twice as big as Anna was long!!

"What is this?" it roars, its voice deep and feminine. A female!? "I, Loquost, devourer and snacker-upon-er of worlds, have been to many dimensions and spaces...but never have I seen a creature so large! Prepare to battle, strange worm-thing!"

"Hey!" Anna hissed, put-off, even as her tingling gets worse and worse and worse. "Mannersssss!"

You're already throwing your arms up. You've had it.
125232211222112112.title: Zero Sun Gain

choices: Loquost is terrified, and begs for mercy!
Loquost is angry at being upstaged...for all the good it does.
1252322112221121122.content:
Original author: TheCrimsonFreak

Loquost (a butchering of "Locust", and she's a gagantuan bug-thing that eats planets...clever) spreads her bat-wings and lets out a battle-cry as she lunges forward, ready to skewer Anna on her horn. "You shall make a fine appetizer before I munch on these tasty worlds, reptile!" the Lovecraftian titaness roars, hungry and malicious.

Oh, Funk-And-Wagnall, this is not good! Anna wanting to eat the SUN was bad enough, but she had been innocently nibbling, only wanting to get bigger! (and bigger...and bigger...and bigger, etc.) But now...some evil Bug of Death comes out of nowhere, wanting to devour the entire Solar System, including EARTH! And now she was going to skewer Anna like a kabob! The only creaute that could EVER have a hope of standing against her!

Any incredulity or resignation-to-craziness you felt was burned away by sheer, unadulterated survival instinct. You jump up and down in the scale-valley, yelling out to Anna, "DODGE! Get out of the way! Anna, you're gonna have to fight, or this bug will impale you, and EAT EVERYTHING!!"

It was at that moment that Anna's tingling reached a fever pitch. An incredible inertia envelopes you, knocking you on your rump as Anna's growth skyrockets once again!
...At least you THINK it's her growing. The sheer magnitude of the sudden motion robs you of any sense of direction or reference, and for a horrible moment you think that Loquost's attack was successful. You imagine her mandibles opening wide around Earth, the giga-bug laughing evilly...

Until you hear Anna's voice. She was giggling, and sounded triumphant. "HA! Who's the biggest NOW, Miss Big Bad Bug Thingy?!" After a pause, Loquot's reply--sounding farther away, and VERY scared:

"Buh---whaaaaaa?! How is this possible?! Even I, the devourer of worlds and eater of stars, never achieved such size from simply a paltry nibble!!" She sounds somewhere between unbelieving and flat-out terrified.

You manage to scale the scale-mountain, and arrive on the summit...and once again, you throw up you arms in utter disbelief. Anna was beyond mind-bogglingly huge. She had passed incomprehensibly gigantic. She had shattered impossibly big long ago.

Now, Anna the Anaconda was just plain STUPIDLY BIG. Ten. Million. Miles, to be exact. The entire solar system--the Sun, all eight planets (and Pluto), plus the Asteroid Belt, and a good portion of the Oort Cloud, fit easily within her coils, with room to spare. The Sun was less than a marble at her scale. Maybe a .22 BB round, at most.

Anna giggles and leans in, her muzzle easily dwarfing the would-be world-eater. "So. Who's the strange worm-thing now, Missy?"

Loquost can only blankly stare at the snake-goddess before her, eyes wide and mandibles slack. But hoe does the new arrival react once her senses return to her?
1252322112221121122.title: Jorgumand, Eat Your Heart Out!

1253221.content:
Having just dealt with the latest goblin attack you make your way back to the main corridor of the cellar beneath the goblinclaw inn. You've only made a few steps when you see an small orange blur.

Its shivers then Malmekko suddenly swells to the size of the small dragon. You mind rushes as you try to think of a way to defend yourself without hurting Bryim's beloved pet and one true friend.

(Note: to see how you got here listen here https://www.breaker.audio/sryth-bedtime-...)

You remember the bag of white worms you were given. You try to unknot and bag to get a the a worm out but it is tried up with several advanced knots, you don't have time to unknot it. You have no choice but to use the whole bag. You throw the whole bag into the gapping maw of Malmekko. He swallows it. You wait hoping this works because its your only chance with this tactic.

The Salamander shivers and then starts to grow again. Fortunately this time more slowly, It started at 7 feet tall 5 seconds later it hit 7 foot 1 inch. Another 5 second 7 foot two inches.

Its tail grows into some rotten casks smashing them.

It fills nearly the whole passage, there is no way past it. Unless it let you past.

The only option you can think of it to return to Bryim to see if has any idea to shrink it or at least stop its growth. But the salamander blocks the path and you'd rather not fight it.

You use your power of Divination to reach into its mind.

"MALMEKKO LIKE BIG. MALMEKKO WANT MORE BIG. MORE BIG. MORE MORE MORE MORE BIG. CASTLE BIG. MOUNTAIN BIG. WORLD BIG."

You telepathically explain of Malmekko that you have to get past him get to Bryim. It somehow sense that you want it stop growing and is not pleased at all.

"NO STOP BIG. NO STOP BIG. BIG FOREVER. MORE BIG FOREVER" now here telepathically.

Malmekko's growth speed increases now gaining an inch every couple of seconds. Soon he will be crushed by the ceiling or break through in the inn above. Either would be bad.

You decide to use your power of gating. You open up a portal below Malmekko it lead to outside the inn. You can only make it 6 feet across. Not nearly big enough. Malmekko look though the portal and sees it leads outside. He grasp the side of the portal and it grow until it spans the whole width of the passage. Malmekko goes though it.

Got having time to go though the cellar and tavern you go through after. 3 seconds after the portal closes with a zap.

Malmekko is in a clearing outside the inn. His growth rate as ticked up get again, as if he is personally offended by the distant mountains being bigger then him. He is now growing a whole feet every couple of seconds. He is lying down with his tail curled around him and seems perfectly at peace.

Everybody in the tavern has filled out and gathered in the clearing, keeping several dozen yards from the creature.

Grutzmil is loudly berating Bryim. Demanding in stop the growth right down or old Wut will have to deal with both them without mercy. A mob is gathering. You estimate less then a minute before things get ugly.

Parting the crowd with few stern stares you make your way over to Bryim, you explain was happened. Bryim tell your that now Malmekko is in control of its size, its can be as big as it wants which is very.

You convince Bryim to come over and ask Malmekko to at least slow down its growth.

Bryim does then stands before the 120 foot tall salamander. He gentle touches it on the lower jaw, which is all he can reach. The salamander opens its eyes and looks at Bryim.

"I know you like being big but your scaring all these people, and your scaring met, or would your please stop growing so fast, at least until we can think of a way for you to huge without hurting people.

Malmekko eyes twitch as it think then the growth stops. Everybody keeps watching for a few minutes. By carefully watching the toes you note it is growing about an inches every 5 minutes. No one else seems to have noticed that so you decided to keep that secret.

Realising their no imminent danger everybody but Bryim goes back into tavern.

Your talk to Bryim alone and he tells the whole story.

He meet with Malmekko back when he was young man. They had been firm friends ever since. However a couple of months ago something odd happen whilst he was on the road between Highmeadow and Hawklor. A portal such opened up right in front of him. The portal stayed only a few inches wide. Form the other side he felt and power aura of Benevolence. Then a insectoid limb with 3 tentacles on the end burst out and met him in a shoulder cross. Another portal appear for him the complete the cross. Whatever as on the other side felt very fluffy.

It then passed over the leather bag filled with worms.

There was a note attached "These are for your little friend, well currently little,"

It tried to hide them. But eventually Malmekko found the bag and gnawed through the knot to get it open. He ate one of the worms and the suddenly grew to six feet long and snuggled up with him.

He quickly learned and the worm had Malmekko then ability to change size. The more worms he ate the greater then change could be. He also found not that the number of worms in the bag never went down. After a bit he train Malmekko to sizeshift on command.

You ask if eating the bag and thus and unlimited supply of these magic worms mean there is now no limit to how big Malmekko can grow.

"Probably but you can never be sure with magic, especially magic from deep deep in the neverness. Well its what Malmekko thinks and he probably knows best after whatever gave the worms," confirmed Malmekko.

You both realise its only a matter of time until Malmekko grows to big even at the current slow rate of growth, which you doubt he'll maintain. Fortunately you struck by the notice that Malmekko can now learn magic, but what circle should he learn first.
1253221.title: Salamander - Malmekko won't stop growing

12532211.content:
You move back up to Malmekko. You show him some basic fortification spells making a sparkling blue barrier around your self. Malmekko quickly copies you making a barrier around himself.

Seeing how quickly Malmekko learned that you quickly deduce Malmekko now has superhuman levels of intelligence. You use Divination of protect into his mind what you want him to make, a skin tight barrier of fortification around his whole body that would not him crashing into or crushing anything no matter now big he gets.

Malmekko then covers himself in a tight barrier of orange sparkles.

"BIG SAFE NOW?" project Malmekko into your brain.

You ask Malmekko to test this first. You move around the Salamander so that his bulk is between you and the Goblinclaw inn you then then used your power of Necromancy to summon forth a skeleton. He can practice on that without anybody getting hurt if it doesn't work.

Malmekko rests a single toe on the skeleton, crushing it to powder. You summon another now for him to try again, by the fifth one Malmekko has figured out a way to use fortification of divert the force around the skeleton. After a few more tests with several skeletons and ones that move around erratically or feel ready to try it on something living.

You are about to volunteer your self when Bryim insisted he be the first. Before you can protest Malmekko and gently scooped up Bryim and put him on his head. Bryim waves down from up there, he's okay.

"BIG. TIME. NOW" yells out Malmekko it what you are surprised to find is not telepathically but actual speech.

Wut's part in this story is now done. Who do we follow now?

13131.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You yawn and force yourself to roll out of the bed, and onto the floor, as you had a feeling that was the only way to wake yourself up. After getting dressed you fill a small handbucket with corn and walk out to the large wireframe cage where you keep your hens.

You had three hens, all of them 3 years old. They were called Honey, bluebell, and Tikka. Honey was a sort of golden-whitish-yellow colour that was hard to adequately describe. bluebell was white with the occasional black feather here and there, particularly in her tail, and Tikka, who was brown all over.

Honey was the tallest, and one foot and seven inches. Tikka was next, at one and a half feet, and bluebell was the smallest at one foot two inches, although she was very slowly beginning to catch up to the other two. You weren't sure if those sizes were particularly big or small, but it probably meant they were fully grown.

As all three produced eggs, you checked the hen house fairly regularly, every other day or so. Every so often, bluebell failed to lay an egg, and seemed... embarrassed by it, somehow, though she usually seemed to feel better after a bit of light petting.

Honey was by far the most adventurous of the trio, often attempting to get out of the cage, which was large enough for you to stand up and walk around a small bit in. Bluebell was somewhat timid and preferred to stay inside the henhouse that was located partially in, and partially out of the cage. Tikka seemed kind of...mellow. Laid back. Although, like the other hens, she could be quite affectionate when she wanted to.

You enter your back garden and approach the cage and henhouse, where all three hens are outside, stretching their legs. They notice you and turn towards you, before they start to...shudder.

Your mouth drops open as the three hens begin to...

131312.content:
Original author: Growasaur

"Ooh, girls, he's here!" Honey caws suddenly, mid-shudder.

The other two cluck a bit, as does Honey, and you pause to let the moment of strangeness pass. Nah. You just woke up. It's probably even happened before. You know you're up, you just aren't out of the groggy phase.

"Where's breakfast?" Honey demands, flapping her goldish wings impatiently, bouncing in a feathery dance around you.

"I could use some seed," Tikka yawned, calmly sauntering behind Honey.

"P-please..." is all Bluebell can muster, a heavy blush all over her soft tone of voice. If she could hide behind oxygen, she would.

Again, you pause, your jaw doing some weapons-grade slackening, your handful of chickenfeed hovering just out of the rim of the feed bucket in your other arm. Honey whines and leaps up at the few falling flecks of feed falling from your hand.

"Gah, I want iiiiit!" she clucks, bouncing more and more. "Don't tease me, come onnnn..."

She lands at your feet and closes her eyes, concentrating. You finally take notice enough to lower your head, in time to see Honey's feathers fluffing and puffing in and out, as she shudders again, and begins to balloon out in size, just a little bit. Two inches later, she tries leaping again, her beak getting that much closer to your hand.

"Ooh, lemme try..." Tikka says, fluffing up and waddling in place, before blowing up a little bigger than honey, her feathers resting again once she stops at two feet in size. Bluebell cocks her head at the two of them, her beak agape.

"C-can I try?" she murmurs quietly.

"Just do it, Bluebell!" Honey sighs impatiently, still not tall enough to reach the food.

"Go on, sweetie, try it," Tikka clucks soothingly.

Bluebell sheepishly steps around a bit, as if needing to be on the exact right spot; she puffs up and puffs up, though for a minute nothing really happens...all the while, you just gawk and watch, not sure which impossibility to wrap your head around and address first. Before you can pick, Bluebell chirps loudly in shock, feeling herself swell up bigger, and bigger, her talons digging in the dirt happily as she surges up cutely to over 2 feet in size, then 3! She stops at 3.5, shivering in approval, fluttering her feathers all over.

"Look at me, girls!" she cries, overjoyed. "I...I think I got the biggest!"

"Oh, what now?" Honey sputters, momentarily stopping her mad quest for breakfast to see. "Why's bluebell the biggest? Why not me?"

"Girls," you finally speak, as the three all begin to shake more and more...
131312.title: Talk, and grow slightly!

1313122.content:
Original author: Infinity421

"Oh, it's on!" Honey squawks in mock indignation, fluffing up her feathers and puffing up, trying to jump start her growth again, while Tikka emulates her actions, wanting to be a little bit taller. Bluebell, however, seems content with her new size, for the most part, and lazily waddles over to you while keeping an eye on the other two hens.

While Honey continues fluffing herself up more and more, Tikka lets out a soft but loud caw, and shivers up to three feet, before her body groans and squeaks, and another foot floods into her, putting her at four foot even, looking down six inches at Bluebell, who seems comfortable with this arrangement.

Your jaw is still hanging open as you look at the two massive hens, who are now approaching you for breakfast. You try to speak but cannot find any words to ask them just what is going on. Just as you find your tongue you hear a triumphant caw, steadily growing louder, as Honey begins to shiver upwards and outwards, at a slower pace than the growth of Bluebell and Tikka, but far more determined and relentless.

After about ten seconds of slow growth, Honey surpasses Bluebell in height, and she bulges larger mid-caw, up to four foot one, just taller than Tikka, and she shouts a nearly deafening "YES! BIGGER!" Before skyrocketing up to five feet, then a gigantic six feet, about to surge even larger when-

"GIRLS!" You shout, breaking Honey's concentration and stopping the growth-hungry hen from getting any bigger, and attracting the attention of the other two.

Finding your tongue for the first time this morning, you ask them...
1313122.title: All three grow and grow rather dramatically, ge...

choices: Honey decides to make herself even bigger, embarrassment be damned!
The hens want to see the inside of your house.
13131222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

"How are you all talking?"
You asked, shooting Honey an annoyed glare as she attempts to puff up again, before seeing your expression and backing down. She seems slightly embarrassed by her need for growth, but walks over to you anyways, now the same height as you.

Bluebell seems to be trying to speak, but no words come out of her beak. After a comforting nuzzle from Tikka, she clears her throat and begins to talk. "W-well, we noticed that you seem to l-live by yourself, with only us for company, and I thought that you were probably lonely..."

As her voice trails off again you crouch next to her and run a hand through her much larger feathers, slowly petting her. Bluebell blushes, and begins to continue. "S-so, I wished that we could tall to you."

"And the growth " You ask, prompting Bluebell to explain. "Well, honey figured it would be d-difficult to talk to you, because we were so much smaller than you. Emphasis on w-were..."

Bluebell turns to look at Honey after the last remark, causing the human-sized hen to blush heavily and paw at the ground with a foot.

What happens next?
13131222.title: "How are you talking?"

choices: You let them look throughout the house.
131312222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Something behind you catches Honey's eye and she steps to the side to confirm what she was looking at. The door to your kitchen, and your house as a whole.

Honey's leg twitches slightly before she looks over to you, wordlessly asking for your permission. Sighing slightly, you say "Alright, you can all come in. Just don't flap your wings, you might break something."

Smiling, Honey, Tikka and Bluebell follow you in single file, Honey's beak accidentally tapping the back of your head.

Managing to fit all three of the hens into the small kitchen, you let them take a look around for a second.

What happens next?
131312222.title: The hens want to see the inside of your house.
