Original author: Infinity421

What inflatable animal do you have?
155322.title: An adult

choices: Nixie comes to life and speaks
Nixie comes to life but grows as well
1553221.content:
Original author: Cetas

You look though your closet (One in which you haven't cleaned in a while, seriously you might as well have giant dust bunnies) and find what you are looking for. The creak and squeaking of vinyl filling your ears as you pull out an uninflated black mass that has a hint of red here and there. Hooking it to a pump that you managed to stumble over as well in your search of your closet you soon inflate the mass to reveal that of your prized possession: a rare inflatable nightmare horse. They have no visible sex being that of a toy but you always thought of it being a female and lovingly named her Nixie. You just gently pat and brush her expanding form, marveling at her firery red mane and tail against her midnight black body and silvery hooves, till she comes to her full inflated size of 4 ft tall. (she being one of those winning toys from the county fair, you almost throwing out your arm and many many milk cans to win her). It is then you turn around to turn off the pump and take out it's hose when something unexpected happens.
1553221.title: A horse

choices: "Owner, can you inflate me even more?"
"Owner, the other inflatables want to be inflated again - we're all alive!"
15532211.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Fiddling with the power socket, you yank out the plug and begin to wrap it around the air pump, planning to put it away into you needed to reinflate Nixie or another one of your inflatable toys again.

"Hello, Owner!"

Startled, you yelp and drop the pump, whirling around. Before you stood Nixie, the four foot Nightmare swishing her blazing orange tail and gazing up into your eyes. Eyes widening and jaw dropping, the only thing you can do in response to finding out that one of your most prized possessions was alive was to simply stand there while your brain rebooted.

Nixie giggles softly and trots closer to you, tall enough to just come up to your chest. Looking upwards at your face and understanding the reaction that she had caused, she gently nuzzles your chest, snapping you out of your confusion. Frowning slightly, you sit down, looking up about half a foot at Nixie, who smiles and places a silver hoof on your shoulder, rubbing it slightly.

"Are you okay, Owner?" the living inflatable enquires, most likely wondering if she did something wrong. "I'm okay, Nixie, just kind of... Surprised."

Nickering, Nixie rubs down on your head with her ebony muzzle. Giggling softly, you raise a hand and rub down the length of her body, stroking from her head to her rump. A series of small shudders runs down the length of Nixie's body, but she suppresses them, moving herself in front of you so as to make communication easier.

Nixie takes in a breath, her latex hide swelling a few inches larger as she does so, and says...
15532211.title: Nixie comes to life and speaks

15532212.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Turning around to turn off the pump, you kneel on the floor and lift the pump up in front of your face, pushing the button labelled 'on/off'. For a second, you could have sworn you heard a quiet squeak behind you, but you put it out of your mind as you crawl over to the wall socket, pump in hand, and switch the supply of power off before yanking out the power cord for the pump.

It had been quite a while since you had taken Nixie out of the closet and inflated 'her' - far too long, in fact. Picking up the pump and wrapping the power cord around it, you hear another squeak from behind you, this time loud enough so as to be audible. Confusion dominating your face, you whirl around.

Nixie, being an inflatable toy, shouldn't have been able to do anything, really, seeing as how inflatable toys aren't exactly alive. But there she was, her fiery tail gently swishing about; her head turning this was and take to allow her eyes to somehow take in her surroundings.

Needless to say, your jaw drops.

Nixie, having completed her brief survey of her environment, trots over to you, her four foot body creaking and squeaking slightly as she approached you. Convinced that this was a delusion or hallucination of some kind, you reach out with a single trembling hand, gently prodding Nixie's coal-black sides...

... And actually feeling the PVC that she was made of relent ever so slightly to your fingertips.

Apparently, this was real, then.

Sitting down next to Nixie, you hold you head in your hand, rubbing at your temples. How? and Why? were the two main questions that your brain was trying - and failing - to come up with answers for. Nixie gently nuzzles your chest, directing your attention back to her as she presents her squeaky body for petting. Rubbing the side of her muzzle, you smile as the inflatable Nightmare leans into your hand, and...

Starts to GROW?!

Nixie gently swells larger, her entire body slowly inflating, even without the pump, and with her air valve closed. Rising a few centimetres taller every second, Nixie rubs against you even as she grows larger, the action seeming to quicken the pace at which she grows. The expanding former-toy quickly reaches the height of your chest as you stand up, finding her coming up to your shoulders mere seconds later, the Nightmare continuing to stretch taller and taller, bigger and bigger.

Reaching your own height of six foot even, and then surpassing it, Nixie emits a high-pitched squeaking as she finds herself having to bend her neck downwards more and more to maintain eye contact with you. Hugging her neck, you receive a nuzzle in return, providing the inflatable with what she wants more than anything else: affection - and with it, size.

Continuing to blow up larger, Nixie noses down on your head and shoulders before returning her head to its normal upright position, feeling it bump the ceiling ever so slightly, before pressing into it. Leaning her head downwards, Nixie begins to fill the room up as her neck, and then her back, presses firmly against the ceiling; her rump pushes against the wall; her sides continually roll outwards; her silver hooves smother more and more of the carpet underneath themselves; and her muzzle gently pushed into you, the inflatable horse nuzzling you even as she grows ever larger.

Her inflation seeming to finally halt, Nixie nickers loudly as her massive body presses into all four sides of the room, barely leaving you enough room to sit down, let alone stand up! Sitting down underneath Nixie's massive and midnight-black body that seemed to have completely filled most of the room, you give her stomach a short rub, hearing the latex squeak as you do so.

Then, a thought enters your head. Was there enough space for you to be able to even get out of the room? Granted, you didn't feel hungry, and the thought of spending the night being kept warm and cosy by your favourite inflatable toy was rather appealing, but you had to check.

Crawling forward, your back rubbing Nixie the entire way, you manage to make your way to where the door was being smooshed by Nixie's entire leg, the silver hoof covering a large area of the carpet.

If Nixie could move enough, you'd be able to get out of the room and return later, maybe with some blankets and a pillow so you could spend the night with your Nightmare, but if there wasn't you'd be stuck in here with the massive balloon horse until you could shrink her to a mod manageable size... Or she outgrew the room entirely...

Is there enough space for you to get out of the room?
15532212.title: Night of The Living Nixie

choices: Nixie is gone somehow though you know you didn't hear a crash
Nixie has gotten bigger and there is a giant hoof blocking the top of the stairs
155322121.content:
Original author: Cetas

You find with a bit of squeezing and sliding against the ebony leg of the giant Nixie you can mange to reach the door and open it, fortunately for you it opening towards the outside rather than inwards. Nixie takes notice of this action though and nickers rather loudly for her size which to you sounds like akin to cannon fire, while looking down at you. You quickly turn around though and look up to her ponderous head and muzzle "Don't worry girl I will be back quick. I am just going to get me a pillow, blankets, and some food to make things more comfortable for me" If an inflatable horse could frown she would as if Nixie was thinking "Aren't I comfortable enough for you" but relucantly relates to your going, somehow moving her leg a few more centimeters away from the door, in which you slide your way out of.

Once outside the room though you take stock of your situation. You are alone in a two story house (as your roomates/family/parents/etc.) are away for the weekend and you had just blown up a prized inflatable nightmare horse who not only has come alive but has proceeded to grow to fill a 8x12x9 (lwh) room and you don't know if she will either proceed to grow bigger or try to get out by destroying it. You ponder these things while going downstairs to get the extra pillows and blankets from the laundry room while stopping in the kitchen to grab a few things out of the fridge to eat and drink. You can hear Nixie getting impatient with your absence or up to something else while you are doing these things. Finally though you gotten all the things you need and make your way up the stairs only to discover that Nixie wasn't exactly idle in your absence.
155322121.title: Yes, there is.

choices: Nixie nuzzles you to the floor, begging for you to inflate her more
Nixie reacts to the affection, and grows tremendously!
1553221212.content:
Original author: Growasaur

Everything you gathered up in the last few minutes--food, drink, pillows, blankets, courage--all fall from you as you spy a single rubbery hoof bulging out into and filling up the top of the second story stairwell, pressing against the molding on their side as it throbs and begins to expand even larger.

"Whoa, Nixie, no!" you stammer, uselessly shoving back into the ballooning digit, as though doing so would really force her back into your room, and down to proper size. As in in reply, the walls of said room, not to mention the entirety of the second story, all begin to moan, groaning and whining as Nixie's thick latex hide presses more and more into them, a soft, cute whinnying being muffled between walls. You push and push, panting from exertion, which seems to only excite the loving inflatable horse all the more, as you feel her hoof slowly inflate all the larger, pushing you down the stairs one awkward step at a time.

The more you're forced back, the more you can hear the walls warping up above, a few stray cracks starting to dance nervously about the ceiling to the first floor (which, upon landing on your rear at the bottom of the stairs, you can see for yourself all too well). Staying seated on the panel-wood flooring, you reflexively scoot back more, watching as the hoof and leg blows up and up, the underside pinching in against the rail and walls to the stairs, before making them crackle and shatter, the rubber digit exploding massively in size!

Getting onto your feet, you scramble back and around the living room, just as a great, big muzzle bursts down through the ceiling, a snorted rush of air blowing the rug away, and making the lamps topple over. A loud crash fills the rumbling house, and you wobble your way over to the dining room, to see Nixie's soft, smooth belly bulging down through the drywall, pushing loose pipes and spraying dust as it only swells larger, pushing down onto and crushing the dining room table against the floor.

"O-okay, Nixie, you can stop! Please stop, girl!"

You hear a gentle puff of air coming back from the living room; reentering it, you find Nixie's muzzle has grown just shy of the floor. Gadzooks, she must have been thirty feet! Likely, most of it was still somewhat compressed by the walls, but there was just no telling how long they would hold that much rumbling rubber bulk steady. You walk over and stroke on her muzzle, figuring the gesture might calm her down a little...
1553221212.title: Nixie has gotten bigger and there is a giant ho...

choices: She stores her power for a MASSIVE growth spurt in the morning!
155322122.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Crawling over to Nixie's massive silver hooves, you begin to see a problem with your plan to leave the room, namely the fact that Nixie has grown so huge that there is not enough space for you to squeeze past her thick legs and out the door. Pushing yourself back into a sitting position, your head bumping into Nixie's underbelly, you wonder what you are going to do.

Slowly, you begin to feel the slight thirst and hunger that had begun to develop fade away, as if your needs were somehow being switched off. Hearing Nixie's muffled nickering from where her massive head was smooshed against the wall, you give her belly a soft rub, now having to lie flat on your back due to the inflatable mares slow growth, as there was literally not enough room for you to sit up. As Nixie slowly inflated, filling the last few spaces in the room, her onyx belly begins to press into you, pinning you to the floor while keeping you warm.

Nixie's gentle yet loud nickering can be heard, even as she completely fills up the room, her massively overinflated body leaving not an inch of space as she exerted pressure on all four walls, the ceiling, and the floor, small cracks beginning to form in all six. Nixie was a smart Nightmare, and she knew the the only way for either of you to exit the room would be for her to grow so large that her size would break one of the walls enough so that you could slip out, and she force her bulk through the hole until it widened to allow her entire body through.

Knowing this would take time, Nixie seemed to have somehow nullified all of your biological needs, including breathing, as well as somehow making you immune to the tremendous pressure her latex body was putting on the walls. Feeling her body bulge ever so slightly larger against the subtly straining walls, Nixie let out a nicker that was muffled by her own tremendous body, as the inflatable Nightmare weighed her two options.

She could keep you in here, letting you sleep while pinned by her warm and comfy body, storing her energy for one massive spurt in the morning that would let her outgrow the house itself. This would let her spend time with you, her Owner, whom she absolutely adored, before relocating to a more suitable location once she had outgrown your house. However, Nixie wasn't sure just how large she would grow if she did this due to the amount of energy she would store overnight - she may grow slightly larger than the house, but she could lose control of herself and find herself growing and growing and growing, pumping up and inflating unstoppably larger...

On the other hand, Nixie could just simply start growing again, spilling into the other rooms on this floor before filling up the house and bursting out of it. It wouldn't be as exciting, but it would be quicker.

Eventually, Nixie decided on what to do...
155322122.title: Running Out of Space

choices: Nixie just keeps growing and growing!
1553221221.content:
Original author: Growasaur

It's a strange thing; laying there, nearly flattened to the floor by Nixie's soft, warm body, all alone in the big empty house, with a gigantic living balloon who just adores you...you find it's not the claustrophobic oddity one would immediately take it as. Certainly, it IS odd, by nature, if anything natural applied to the situation--but you find it fairly nice, her slight, surprisingly-light weight smooshing down on you, just so.

Actually, it's great. Either you're breathing up and down into her bulk, or she's breathing over you, not that it matters. It's a sheer wall of rubbery, smooth heat, and at last, the thought occurs to you, laying there: she might-well get bigger. In fact, you can practically feel it throbbing inside her, like some tension--or more aptly, an excitement, laying under all the calm and warm fullness filling your room.

As you drift away, the mass of pure affection atop you does indeed thrum and treble with excitement of her own: Nixie, unable to move so much as a latex muscle, lays there in bliss, as though you were holding her tight, even at her size. As she nods off, her muzzle pressing the walls harmlessly, she can feel it building up in her--building up, and up, and up...

You knew the reports and extended forecast before the previous day--cloudy and cold. Yet there's enough faint light filtering in through the blinds to your room to cast a few glowing strips across the contours of Nixie's belly and legs to show you that morning's here, and, as you begin to feel, something else. Something big!

With a little rub under her huge belly, Nixie nickers softly, almost in a giggle, before the pressure sets in, the walls start to groan and warp, and you say your goodbyes to the house; you know what's coming, it only makes its own strange sense. Her belly swells softly but insistently against your entire body, before straining tight, then bursting in a surreal, slow heave, pumping bigger and bigger, rolling and dimpling harder across the floor. Then another push flattens you further, and another, as the door to your room gives, and a growing hoof blasts out through it, tearing the hings away amidst the rumbling tug and pull and stretch of her latex digit. The flooring bends down, down, forming into a curve of wailing paneling and sheared carpet. The pipes crack as she bulges even larger, and larger, her muzzle pushing through the wall and closet, casting clothes off through the next room, her head crashing up into and along the ceiling as she seems to smile wide, and breathe herself even larger...

The lower floor awaits as the one above buckles, crackling wide against a widening span of rubbery belly, forcing you to suddenly clutch away at Nixie's slick tummy, trying not to fall onto your back into the living room. The sensation of your fingers drawing and slipping along her body sends a shiver through you that overrides, amazingly, even the momentary surge of self-preservation coursing through you. The problem amends itself quickly, as she balloons even bigger, and bigger, thumping you into the rug painlessly, before again she inflates larger, rolling over you, the furniture, the TV, the dining room, on and on--the tables smash apart, the walls burst out in all directions, and with a happy neigh, Nixie's now-massive rump crashes out through the back of the house, and loudly.

The front side pushes out into a bizarre curve, as you feel her inflation force you into the front door. With a snap and a heave, you see yourself out, tumbling back over the drive as a wall of smoke and powdered drywall settles down around you. Shaking off the relative devastation and all, you blink, straighten up, and take a breath, before doing what you knew you'd do since last night (and, admittedly, had kind of looked forward to): you look up.

Nixie wears the gutted shell of the remaining homestead as though it were a diaper she's already outgrown--literally. She must be sitting at over 50 feet in size! Amazing!

"You okay, up there, girl?" you find yourself asking, still weighed under a sheet of baffled incredulity.

She seems to almost smile down at you, and it hits--she's not at all done growing, and she knows it, as evidenced by her rumbling tremble, her skin puffing out tighter and tighter. Finally it delivers, and she roars up bigger, and bigger, her pumping sides pushing the walls that had managed to stand to thud off, before her rubber haunches roll meanly over them, then well-beyond, Nixie nickering and breathing herself larger, and larger, and larger, and larger...

You take a little too long to start backing away through the lawn, as she approaches 80 feet...90 feet...100 feet...110 feet...120 feet...s-she just keeps growing! The fences snap, trees bending, yielding, then breaking, the cars on the sidewalk pushed back as her hooves bulge ever-larger, and larger, growing out on either side of you, her rear bulging over the back yard, looming towards the neighbors' homes. She's amazing! All thoughts of worry, though they exist, are pushed aside--they might as well have been the cars pushed aside by Nixie's surging, squeaking bulk.

150 feet...170 feet...200 feet...
1553221221.title: She stores her power for a MASSIVE growth spurt...
