155322211.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Let's start off with the T-Rex, shall we?
155322211.title: Carnivores.

choices: You fall asleep on top of it.
It suddenly inflates, and grows past it's normal size limit!
1553222111.content:
Original author: Infinity421

The ring of your doorbell graces your ears and you rush to answer it. You collect the package from the postman and sign for it, before closing the door. You open the package and gaze at what was inside. An inflatable T-Rex, currently uninflated and folded within a sheet of plastic, along with an air pump entered your field of vision as you tore open the cardboard packaging.

You remember the information you were provided with about it before you ordered it. It was a green colour, with an near 1:1 scale, and measured in at exactly eight and a half feet tall and twelve feet long from snout to tail. When fully inflated you would reach just over its hips, it was so large.

You unpack it in your bedroom and start pumping air into it until, after roughly five minutes, it is fully inflated. Its was several inches too tall for the ceiling, and you had been forced to bend its neck over slightly so it could stand up. Suddenly, a thought occurs to you, and you lay it down on its side, where there is more than enough room. You lay on its side, the green surface squeaking at your touch.

You feel the green PVC stretch and, oddly, tingle slightly as you lay down on it, and begin to drift into sleep...
1553222111.title: T-Rex

choices: Inflate it so that it completely fills the room!
15532221111.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You are slowly roused by the noise of squeaking and stretching coming from somewhere the inflatable dinosaur underneath you felt a lot firmer, and you had you move more to feel its front and back.

You force your eyes open and rub them to regain your sight, and what you see astounds you. Your inflatable T-Rex was now so large that, laying down on its side, it was half the height of the room you were in, and it had been forced to curl into a fetal position to avoid putting pressure on the walls.

Wait, fetal position? How the heck did it move in the first place? You try to move, but find yourself to tired to do so, and slump back onto the dinosaur with a loud squeak from the movement.

Suddenly, you feel movement, and the inflatable T-Rex...turns its neck and head to look at you. Your muscles seize up, both out of amazement and fear. Almost as if sensing this, the Dino starts nuzzling and licking you, and you begin to feel less afraid.

You laugh and hug the friendly dinosaur, feeling the PVC t is comprised of stretch slightly, and enjoy the squeaking sounds caused by the contact. Suddenly, you sight the inflation nozzle on the T-Rexes belly, and the big Dino uncurls slightly to allow you access.

What do you do?
15532221111.title: You fall asleep on top of it.

choices: The pump finally turns off, leaving the Dino as big as your room
The pump keeps roaring away, and the Dino fills your house!
155322211112.content:
Original author: Growasaur

The plasticity of the T-Rex's inflatable hide squeaks cutely against you as you move here and there, even more so each time the Dino noses on your head, and grooms away dryly at your face. Its tail beats against your bed harmlessly, thump-thumping happily as the toy wags. It clearly has presented its nozzle to you, a hopeful grin forming, full of rounded faux-teeth, and a fit of madness seizes you. More than likely, this was just some dream--but nonetheless, that you were having it to begin with seemed worth some flustering. Still, here you were!

Determined that this might as well play out and contribute to a good dream session, you gladly take the tube of the pump and gently insert it over the nozzle, making sure it's good and secure. Once satisfied, you give the Dino a grin, nod, and flick the pump back on.

The inflatable toy seems to be growling in approval, at first--then you realize it's the stretching of its hide, as the balloon-reptile bulges larger against you, starting to push you back; the belly groans and pumps wider, starting to rub and grind softly against your front side, the stretching hide tugging and pulling your shirt in different directions. The Dino sighs and rubs big, giddy circles across its stomach, eliciting a symphony of supple squeals, as it grows and grows and grows. Slowly, the mass of PVC and air starts to flood the remainder of the room, your computer and TV getting nudged aside, before toppling over onto its bouncy body. Larger still the Dino inflates, bobbling the TV and letting the computer monitor sliiiiide over and thud against the wall, before it grows even bigger, smothering both items tight. Its sides bulge flat into all four walls, rolling higher and higher up, as its expanding muzzle bores into you adoringly. The Dino closes its eyes and laps away over you as its head bumps the ceiling, your bedding snapping flatter under its expanding body.

On and on the pump goes, as a lapse of foresight becomes apparent: you left the pump out of reach, too lost in rubbing and stroking its smooth hide, feeling it grow against you! Now the thing is stuck, wedged to the wall by the Dino's growth spurt, and it's still on...
155322211112.title: Inflate it so that it completely fills the room!

15533.content:
Original author: Infinity421

The farm: you are a farm animal or the owner of a farm, and one day you and the other animals, or the animals that you own, start to get a little...big.
15533.title: Other scenarios

155332.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Growth spurts: an animal starts experiencing growth spurts that begin to happen more and more regularly, with each one being bigger than the last.
155332.title: A different scenario

1553321.content: What pov do we go with
1553321.title: Growth spurts

1553322.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Petting: Petting an animal causes it to grow bigger, but the bigger it gets the more playful it will become, and the more it will want to be petted
1553322.title: Different scenario

15533221.content: You woke up feeling good. You couldn't describe it, but something told you that today was going to be special. Before you could even get out of bed, one of your affectionate pets jumped up with you, and you started petting them absentmindedly. Looking down, you saw it was your...
15533221.title: Petting

choices: Evie begins to demand more petting
Your dog Cooper comes in, begging for affection
155332211.content:
It was your calico cat Evie. The white, black, and orange cat was usually lounging somewhere near a window in the sun, but she every so often she would lie on your lap. She purred as you stroked her fur, pressing into you slightly. While you pet her, you checked your phone to see what was going on in the world. Evie kept up a satisfied rumble the whole time, but it felt like she was constantly shifting in your lap. You didn't think much of it and gave her a scratch behind her ears. Or at least, where you thought her ears were. In reality, you ended up scratching her on the back and had to move your hand up further to reach her head than you should have.

Looking away from your phone, you saw Evie stretched out across your bed like you expected. What you didn't expect, was that she was twice the size that she should have been. She looked the same as ever, just on a larger scale, and the look she gave you seemed to ask why you stopped petting her. You started petting her again, watching to see any changes. As you pet her, you could see her whole body swell slightly, getting bigger each time you stroked her fur. After another minute of this, Evie was nearly the size of your dog, and she looked all too happy to stay on your bed and be pet by you.
155332211.title: Your calico, Evie

choices: You succumb to temptation and pet them even more
You manage to resist them and leave the house
1553322112.content:
You moved yourself out from under your much larger cat and began to get dressed, trying to understand how the simple act of petting Evie could cause her to grow so quickly. You'd never heard of anything like this happening before. Stranger still, you'd been petting her every day for as long as you'd had her, so why was it only today that she started growing?

You were broken out of your thoughts by a nudge from your golden retriever, Cooper. He was an energetic dog who loved to play and go on long walks. Closely behind him was Evie, incredibly matching Cooper's height. Even though you had seen her larger form earlier, it was surreal to see it in comparison to your normal sized dog. You bent over and started petting Cooper, rubbing him vigorously as his tail wagged quickly. While you were petting him, Evie was staring at you expectantly, in a way that you felt almost looked like jealousy at the fact that you were petting Cooper and not her. While you were looking at Evie, you hadn't even realized that you were subconsciously adjusting your stance to reach higher and higher to continue petting Cooper. Finally you decided to stop petting him.

Looking back to your dog, you realized he had undergone the same transformation as Evie had earlier on your bed. Cooper had grown about a foot in the process, with his back now level with your waist. Based on the way his tail was wagging, he seemed proud to show off his new height to you, pressing himself against your waist to emphasize the increase. Evie took the opportunity to plant herself at your other side. You couldn't resist your pets and resumed petting both of them at the same time. Almost immediately, you could feel their bodies begin to expand in response to your petting. You wanted to experiment with the process a little, so you pet Evie harder than Cooper to see if she would grow more.

As you continued to pet your pets, it seemed like your hypothesis was being proven correct. Evie was growing faster than Cooper and was well on her way to matching his size for the second time today. It wasn't a competition however, and both of them just looked happy to be receiving so much affection. You decided that you would stop petting them once Evie caught up to Cooper, and that time was not long off. You finally stopped petting them as Evie's head met Cooper's at the same level as your chest. By your estimate, they were both an incredible 4'6" tall, and about twice as long as they were tall. Their heads were now as large as your chest, and their eyes didn't have to look up very far to meet yours. From the looks they were giving you, you could tell that they didn't want you to stop petting them and you were strongly tempted to keep giving them what they wanted.
1553322112.title: Cooper enters the fray

15533222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

The Zoo: you are a worker or an animal at a zoo, and one day, some of the animals start to get a little bit too big...
15533222.title: A different scenario

155332221.content:
You are one of the many caretakers that work in the city's local zoo. The zoo was quite large and had well-built habitats for all of the species of animals it held, making it a hotspot for tourism and wildlife education. You've always enjoyed working with animals and based on the time at the zoo it seemed they also enjoyed working with you. No matter what part of the zoo you got assigned you felt perfectly safe because you found you could always trust the animals to behave. Your affinity for the zoo animals even made you a favorite amongst your peers as well as the visitors, especially since all of the animals seemed to be bigger than average.

Many of the animals held at this zoo in particular were quite large and many held world-record titles in terms of pure size. Funnily enough, it was around the time that you started working at this zoo that you started to see World's Largest Whatever posters plastered around the city. Even more strange was all these record-holders happened to be directly under your care. You're in for a surprise one day when you clock in to tend to one of the animals and find that they are still growing. Quite fast, actually.

In fact, what part of the zoo do you take care of specifically?
155332221.title: The Zoo

1553322211.content: Let's narrow it down. Do you tend to the larger mammals or do you watch over the smaller ones?
1553322211.title: Mammals

15533222111.content:
You take care of most of the large animals for obvious reasons. You could turn your back on the biggest, meanest predator and not have to worry at all. They all seemed relaxed and enjoyed your company, making your job quite easy and somewhat fun. Clocking in you grab your equipment and set out to the large mammal section of the zoo.

You decided to first check in on the...
15533222111.title: Large Mammals

choices: It works both ways! Karina grows herself by forcibly giving YOU affection.
1553322211111.content:
Your caretaking responsibility lied with the larger mammals of the zoo. It was the mid-afternoon and many visitors were beginning to leave the zoo as it neared closing time but those that remained got to see you feed the various animals. A couple of people had taken sick-leave so you tried to systematically work through each of the enclosures as to not waste time, although the animals were being particularly affectionate today which was making it difficult. The crowd that remained loved it though, giggling as you got barraged by the friendly licks of an excited wolf pack or got nuzzled against by the small herd of gazelle. You were used working with the affectionate animals but you found that each day it was getting tougher to control them, almost as if they were getting stronger or something each time you visited them.

Eventually you worked your way through the enclosures until you got to the big cats, a few hours have passed and the last of the visitors were leaving. The big cats were your favorite animals in the zoo because they were so laid-back and easy to manage, the felines mainly just sticking to rubbing against you like overgrown house cats before digging into their food. There was one enclosure in particular that you always liked to leave for last, the tiger exhibit. It held one of the zoo's many record holders, a female Sumatran tiger named Karina. Despite being the smallest subspecies of tiger, she out-sized the largest subspecies of tiger by a whole foot making her famous for being a "giant tiger". This fame coupled with her location in the zoo made her enclosure the most visited places in the zoo which can sometimes stress her and the other tigers out. By working in her enclosure last it gives you the time to give her some well-needed TLC as the zoo closes to help calm her down.

Stepping into the enclosure and locking the gate behind you grab your feed and move inside the exhibit. The majority of the enclosure was grass with a multitude of ferns and trees on its border to give it an Indonesian jungle theme. You instinctively raise the buckets holding their feed up as a group of tigers saunters over to you and begins to rub against you. As you hand out a big slab of meat to each of the big cats you couldn't help but notice that Karina wasn't among them. She could usually be found in the shelter at the back of the enclosure, a big concrete pen left open so the tigers could either hide from the rain or be separated temporarily. As you approached the shelter you could see through the wire mesh on the front of the pen that Karina was laying down on one of the huge mattresses that the zoo supplied.

Seeing you enter the shelter Karina stood up and started walking over to you. You spread your arms and braced yourself as she increased her speed towards you before she embraced you in a big tigery hug. She nuzzled against you and rubbed the sides of her face all over you as you tried to lower the incredibly heavy feline down off of you. You really enjoyed spending time with Karina, she was much more affectionate than the other big cats and there was something fun about taking care of a kitten-like giant predator. You could swear she had grown since last you saw her as she sat down on her hind legs, her golden eyes level with yours. An expectant growl came from the tiger as you grabbed the a slab of meat and gave it to her. She barely chewed before you heard a big gulp and saw the bulge of the meat disappear down her throat.

"Karina, you need to chew, girl." You try and reason with her as you hand her the last piece of meat, Karina swallowing the meat in the same fashion before letting out a contented growl. With a sigh you put down the rest of your equipment and stroke the side of the tigresses face before she pulls away and rolls onto her back. Despite being the toughest feline on the block she was still very delicate, the multitude of people gawking at her during the day taking its toll on the tiger. You found that some good pampering seems to alleviate her stress, even if it did spoil her a bit. You begin to rub the soft white fur of her belly, giving her a slight massage as you work your hands over her powerful muscles. Going over body you can't help but feel there was more surface area on the tigress as your hands glide through her soft fur, almost feeling as if she was bigger than the day before.

Slowly you work your way to her thighs and calves until you eventually reach her big paws that you liked to save for last. Having spent her life in the zoo, her grey leathery pawpads were exceptionally smooth and soft. This was without a doubt yours and Karina's favorite part. Grabbing her large paw in both your hands you slowly work your fingers between her toes as you massaged her paws, continuing for a while until you move onto her main pawpad. Holding her paw you spread both of your thumbs onto her pawpad and begin pressing into in a circular motion, eliciting a growl of pleasure from the tigress. It felt like Karina was constantly pushing her paw towards you while you were pampering her paws so when you move over to the next leg you sit a bit further back to give her some leeway.

Working your way up her thighs and calves again you felt a strange sensation come from the tigress when your hand reached her paw. You could swear you could see it too, it was as if her body suddenly trembled for a second. Chalking it up to your imagination you resume your massage, repeating the same process as you did with the other paw. With each stroke of your fingers you saw the tiger tremble out the corner of your eye and when you start massaging her pawpad with your thumbs do you finally notice that Karina's paws were definitely bigger. You stare at them, perplexed as you try and wrap your hands around her paw only to find you can barely touch together the tips of your thumbs. In fact, her whole body was bigger! Looking down at Karina you saw that she was completely covering the large mattresss, her head starting to ride up against the concrete wall as she watched you with her relaxed, golden eyes.

You nervously gulp at the sudden realization that the tiger your indulging probably grew between one or two feet in the space of a few minutes. It made you nervous but you were incredibly excited and curious about the fact. Did I make her grow? To test your theory you continue to knead her paws, pressing your thumbs down hard onto her soft pads. Almost as soon as you press down on them you could see the pad stretch wider, growing almost a whole inch in every direction. You continue rubbing her pawpads and start working your fingers through her toes again, feeling the digits swell in your hand. Looking back down to Karina while massaging her paws you could see her body slowly pulsing bigger as you pampered her.

Releasing her paws after letting her grow a couple of extra feet you sit back before the much larger tiger, you suddenly have an epiphany. Am I the one causing the animals here to grow up so big? Does me giving them affection cause them to grow or something? You were lost in thought until Karina spat out a quick, impatient growl at you. Something inside of you almost wanted to keep spoiling the giant tigress to see how big she would get. Right now she was big enough to encompass an entire paw over your face and feeling her grow in your hands was strange and exciting. Not to mention all the animals in this zoo including Karina were so good-tempered that you doubt that even at giant sizes they would hurt the public. Not on purpose anyway.

You bite your lip as you struggle to decide if you want to keep pampering her or to leave before she gets any bigger.
1553322211111.title: Karina the Sumatran Tiger

choices: You decide to make Karina grow even larger.
The other tigers are growing now. Are your powers increasing in severity?
15533222111112.content:
The thought that you had a special power that could make an animal grow by just doing something as simple as running a hand along their fur blew your mind. It would explain why so many animals in the zoo were so large but what didn't make sense was their slow, inconspicuous growth over your time working at the zoo in comparison to the tiger before you. Within a short time span you had already doubled Karina's already large size! Was it because you spent the most time with Karina or is it because your odd power is getting stronger? Another quick growl of impatience breaks you from your thought as Karina stares at you, her golden eyes begging for more attention.

Some nagging thought in the back of your mind was compelling you to give her all the love and care she wanted just to test the scope of your awakening power but you decided against it. With a tiger already this big in the zoo it was bound to get the attention of the of the Occupational Health and Safety people. If she got any bigger they would most likely say she has to be sent off to some facility or something and that's if they even let her stay after growing as much as she did. Watching Karina flop over to her side you decide it would be best to just leave things be before things get too out of control. Picking up your gear and exiting the concrete and wire mesh shelter you hear a playful chuff coming from the tiger behind you.

Your awestruck when you turn around to see Karina meandering out of the shelter. Her back was just about riding along the roof of the small concrete building and you had to crane your head up as she began standing to her full height after exiting the small building. You can't help but think you really underestimated her size as she elegantly saunters over to you, her hips swaying side to side with each step. The tigress was almost twice as tall as you and It was obvious she still wanted attention from you. "H-hey Karina!" You stammered while lowering your gear back to the ground and stepped back. "I'm going home now, alright?" Karina completely ignores your words and instead keeps determinedly waltzing towards you until her massive furred head impacts your chest.

The big cats of the zoo rubbing against you like giant house-cats was typical but the added size of the tiger nuzzling against you inadvertently turned her display of affection into a headbutt. You instinctively clutch onto the fur of Karina's cheeks to stop yourself from getting bowled over as she continues to push her head into your chest. "H-hey!" You yelp as she keeps pressing against you. As you try and fend off her advances you suddenly realize she wasn't even actively pushing into you, her head growing wider in your hands becoming painfully obvious. You let go and fumble to the ground as you try and distance yourself as the expanding tiger's growth slowly comes to a stop as she crouches down over you.

Looking up to the tiger giantess a warm fuzzy feeling welled up in your chest. Making this friendly predator even bigger was oddly exciting and wanted to see her get even bigger but you knew having a massive tiger romping around the city would no doubt cause some issues. Okay. If I don't want her to get any more bigger I just need to sit here and do nothing until she gets bored, right? Planning your course of action you watch Karina lazily lower herself towards you, placing her thick furry arms to either side of you before she goes in to nuzzle you again. With your hands planted on the grass you brace yourself as her fluffy cheeks brush against your entire face, the tigress letting out playful chirrups while doing so. When your face wasn't full of orange and black fur you manage to look up and still see her form moving despite her lack of movement. You suddenly realize that she was actually still growing! With her head hovering above your face you noticed that she had grown so much that her head was almost the size of your torso!

You two stare at each other for a split second as you and seemingly Karina recognized what was happening. She doesn't need me to give her affection to grow, she can just deal it out herself and grow all the same! Karina suddenly opens her maw and gives you a good view of her fleshy maw before a massive tongue brushes along your face. You flinch and tumble on your back from the shock of being covered in her warm saliva. You barely have time to wipe your face before a massive paw pins your leg down and she begins licking your entire body as if you were a little tiger cub. It was definitely apparent that she wasn't about to let you go anytime soon. Your shirt only lasted a few licks before her barbed tongue began to tear the fabric apart. You prepared for the pain of her rough tongue raking across your bare chest but you were surprised when the thick muscle softly combed across your body giving you what felt like a massage, causing you to let out an involuntary moan.

You could only lay there and watch as more of Karina began to dominate your view, growing bigger in a stop-start motion with every lick. Every time her tongue dragged across you it stretched a little wider and was able to cover more and more of you. The weight on your legs from the paw pinning you down also slowly intensifying as its expansion made her digits slowly crawl over your waist. As her unrelenting licking comes to a stop you wipe your face again as you look at her. By now Karina must have be at least 20 feet tall, maybe even bigger! The weight on your legs is lifted as she eases her paw off you, although you stay put as you see no point in resisting the tiger's affection at this point. She slowly rises her paw above you, giving you a good view of her pawpads. Behind them, though, you could see what could only be described as a smirk on Karina's face. You feel your face flush red as you realize what she was about to do.

You always had a strange fascination with paws and it seemed Karina had picked up on this from your time with her. You're not sure if she was trying to just make herself bigger or just indulge your weird fantasy, but you find yourself grabbing her paw with both your hands as it descends upon your chest nonetheless. Simply just holding onto it you could feel it getting bigger. Heck, she's already this big right? You give in as Karina slowly begins rubbing her paw against your bare chest until it reaches your face. You turn your head to the side as you grip onto her furry toes and let out a contented sigh as you the feel the warm leathery pads spread over you. With your face fully encompassed in her paw you could audibly hear her growth. You could hear pops and crackles as her bones lengthened, fleshy groans as her muscles increased in size and the sound of leather stretching as her pawpads spread over you.

Between gasps of fresh air as she continually ran her paw along the length of your body you could also hear the sound of wood snapping behind her. With a guess you figured that she was starting to get a bit too large for the enclosure and her body was starting to push against the trees and ferns. In fact, you begin to notice that she wasn't kneading you as much as before and was instead just lightly squeezing her toes around your frame. It takes you a second to realize she was doing that because she had grown big enough to fully enclose her paw over your entire body! Each of her toes was bigger than your head and her black keratin claws rivaled the tusks on the zoo's elephants. She continues smothering you under her warm paws for a few more minutes before you feel a gust of cold, fresh air hit your body when she removes her foot off you and stands up.

She made herself really big. You felt like a bug in the grass as you just stared up at her massive body, dumbfounded at her ludicrous size. She completely dominated the enclosure and you guessed that she must be roughly around 50 feet tall. At this size she was more than twice the height of the tiger pen's fence but thankfully the tall trees still managed to conceal her. Obviously happy with the situation Karina happily growls down at you, her added size making her much more louder. As you lean up she adjusts her position in her much smaller habitat and you could actually feel her weight bearing down on the land whenever her paws thumped down to the ground. Content with her size for now she lovingly stares down at you as she seemingly waits for you to do something.

A thought in your mind was almost compelling you to see how big you could make her, both for the sake of your curiosity and her safety. Her size was definitely going to catch some attention now and friendly or not she probably won't receive a warm welcome if she exits the zoo, making the thought of growing her an even more valid option. Maybe you could even ride on her back and try and guide her out of the city? As you pondered your options you watch the other smaller tigers saunter about the outskirts of the enclosure, obviously confused at the sudden growth of one of their friends.

What happens next?
15533222111112.title: Karina doesn't want you to leave just yet.

155332221112.content:
Are you the zoo's wolf whisperer?

Do you work with the wolves, enjoying their beauty and the bonds they form?

And will you also enjoy their inevitable growth?
155332221112.title: Wolves?

155332222.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Creation Chamber: Essentially a sci-fi version of the creation powers scenario, with you creating animals using a machine on a large ship, with you as it's sole inhabitant.
155332222.title: Another scenario

1553322221.content:
Original author: Infinity421

All in all, being stuck on a semi-derelict space ship wasn't so bad. The food was good, you had near infinite levels of spare time and the view from your cabin was always breathtaking. On the other hand, you were several light years off course from your intended destination, where you would have used the stored DNA from people on other worlds and the machinery on board the ship to establish a colony. The creation chamber did not need DNA to function, but it had never been tested without it, and nobody wanted to run the risk of anything going wrong. Creation chambers were frequently used to provide livestock for fledgling colonies, you recalled, always without DNA. Perhaps that was one reason why DNA was always used to create humans - nobody would want to be placed on the same level as, say, a cow or chicken.

Absent mindedly, you look out of the window of your cabin. It was actually the captain's cabin, but you had liberated it for yourself as you were the only living thing on board the ship. You begin to feel lonely, as had been happening with increasing frequency over the course of your time on the ship. You sigh heavily, and weigh your options. Most of the human DNA samples were too old to use, or were simply missing from the Vault. It was obvious you were going to make an animal, if you used the creation chamber. However, unauthorised use of a creation chamber was heavily punished, and although all security on the ship had either been rendered inoperable by you or degraded over time, the Enforcers seemed to have near psychic abilities for finding criminals, even if they themselves had no idea where they were. You close the curtain across the viewing port and walk to the creation chamber, having made your mind up.

You reach the creation chamber's room and enter. Rows of flashing red lights adorn the walls, along with a control panel and a set of heavily outlined welding marks indicate where any animals or people are created, as the walls slide apart to allow whatever was created to exit. You approach the panel, and its bottom half raises slightly so as to tilt the screen up towards you. It is a fairly advanced display, with a yellow wireframe background , a space for a silhouette of whatever was being created, its height, and a small picture comparison with a six foot tall human, this being your height. You know it is a touchscreen, so you begin navigating through menus to reach the creation stage. Excited at the prospect of finally having. A companion, and maybe several more after that, you set the chamber to create...
1553322221.title: Creation chamber

choices: You show her your cabin, and possibly go to bed.
15533222211.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You set the chamber to create an aquatic dragon and set its gender to female. For now, you ignore th display of its appearance and engage the creation chamber. You hear a rapid series of clanks and hums as the machinery moves into place and begins to create your new companion. Suddenly, the doors open and you see your animal friend for the first time. Most of her body is a light blue, with dark blue splotches over ber body, and her underbelly a sea foam grey with yellow stripes running up it. She has four flippers, the back half of which are the same light blue as most of her body, and the front halts being the dark blue of the splotches on her body. She has several fins on her head and on her long tail which are also the same dark blue. She is also extremely tall, towering over you. You estimate her to be roughly seven feet tall. You rush into a hug with her long neck as she croons in confusion but gratefully returns the hug as best she can, as if sensing your loneliness.
What happens next?
15533222211.title: A dragon

choices: No, and you create another animal.
Yes, and you find a place for her where she can grow.
155332222112.content:
Original author: Infinity421

You slowly break off the hug with the newly created sea dragon, who is looking at you with her huge purple eyes. You decide to show her your cabin, so so tell her to follow you and start walking out of the room, making sure she is following you. You quickly reach your cabin and enter, with the dragon having to lower her head slightly due to the low doorframe. Once inside, however, she can have her neck fully extended due to the ten foot high ceiling. You begin to feel extremely tired and get into your bed, with the dragon allowing you to hug her like a stuffed toy while you fall asleep.
Does she grow while you sleep?
155332222112.title: You show her your cabin, and possibly go to bed.

choices: Go to the Cafe for size-increasing eats!
Go to the Solarium, for some major water absorption!
1553322221122.content:
Original author: Growasaur

As you drift off to sleep, for the first time in so long, you think you could just stay right there, warm and quiet, hugging the soft, smooth, gigantic sea dragoness; your head slides along her collarbone, dimpling into her hide just enough to where it feels like a big, heated pillow; her breathing swells her sides in and out, and the sound is infinitely soothing; yet, as you drift so into peace, she begins to twitch with small tics that race gently along her body, and, too sleepy to readily hear, her dragonhide begins to stretch, as she sleeps beside you, with a kind of proximity to a human smile, getting bigger and bigger by just inches; on the ship's camera, a time-elapse run shows her growing more fluidly, more rapidly as time goes on, until she's doubled in size, your reinforced bedding frame starting to groan in protest of her increasing weight.

In another hour she's over 16 feet in size, her heavier, thicker, longer neck slumped down cutely over you, pinning you to the rest of her giant bulk; through the haze of half-sleep, you put together what's happened, though it's a shock to say the least! You take time in carefully slipping out of her grip, petting her big muzzle and whispering for her to get back up--you'll need to find a new place for her to stay, at this size! Perhaps the Solarium would work? The water filtration cycle was still running, there would be lots of water and some healthy plant life around...

As you lead her out, you have to tuck her sides in bit by bit, helping to force her out of your quarters as she hums and chirps at you, nudging your arm with her snout, thumping her big tail gently behind her as she takes up most of the hallway. You smile, even with (or maybe even on account of) the situation at hand, kind of liking her growth. As if sensing it, she balloons larger mid-hallway, nearly mooshing you into the wall lining, and clicking lovingly to you. Will you make it to the solarium at all, at this rate? The cafeteria is closer, and still has room and food...
1553322221122.title: Growing Affinity

choices: Head up to the escape pods on the top deck! You have to get out!
Head down to the lab--use all the dehydration capsules, and shrink her!
15533222211222.content:
Original author: Growasaur

Over 25 feet of reptilian sci-fi glory bulges on either side of the doorway, clicking and cooing happily at you. You let a panicked little laugh out between breaths, unable to resist the growing sea dragoness's charming manner--but business is business! You have to get her moving!

With some severe effort, you work several beams in against her bulging, smooth body, and you work away at them, one after the other, until she pops loose from the doorway, thumping clumsily into the wall on the other end of the hallway--which, thankfully, can still contain her. Barely.

Her sides push you into the walls gently with every breath, the rhythmic noise of her belly expanding in and out...it kind of near-hypnotizes you, as you try and guide the sweet-natured creature along. The Solarium is close enough, you know you can make it--and besides, if she were to fill up the cafeteria, your food supply would get compromised. The clear-pane double-doors to the Solarium sliiide open with a mechanized WHOOSH of displaced air, and the sea dragoness perks up at the wave of scents and all within, her fins twitching cutely as she rurrs curiously.

You pat her thick neck comfortingly, and she actually grins at you--she grins! What an expressive creature...there was really no telling just how smart she was, but clearly, she knew enough; she trundled calmly into the massive space, giggling as the grown patches of grass tickled her underbelly, and made her way towards a pool of water, nearly the size of a small lake.

You ask if she wants to go into the water, and she offers a big nod, further astonishing you. You motion, laughing, at the water, and she clickclicks adoringly, nuzzling on your entire body with just her muzzle. The waters push out a little as she augers her gigantic, 25-foot body into the pool, sinking beneath the topside for a moment. You sigh in relief, figuring you might as well head over to the cafeteria to get her some real food, just in case. You speak your intentions over the pool, knowing she should be able to hear you alright, then head off. Within seconds, the water begins to ripple, as the sea dragoness tingles all over, wildly...

...

As you head back from the food locker, fishes and drinks and fruit in hand, quite a sight meets you, as you stand outside the doors to the Solarium: there she is, looming well-over the water, displacing so much of it that it pools against the bottom of the sliding doors. Her body must be at least 100 feet in size! And...good god, she's bulging even bigger! The water levels slowly drop as she sponges it into herself, trembling and chirping and smiling, before she tingles worse, then BOOMS even bigger, doubling in size! Her growing smooth belly smooshes tight against the borders of the entire Solarium, before she bulges even bigger, and bigger, and bigger, cracks forming in the seemingly indestructible glass panel casing. Step by stunned step, you back away from the wall of blues and yellows pressing furiously against everything containing her.

Klaxon begins to blare, as the massive ship's computer begins speaking, in a monotone fashion:

CAUTION...CAUTION...UNIDENTIFIED MASS INCREASING IN SOLARIUM...CAUTION...MASS EXPANDING AT EXPONENTIAL RATE...MASS INCREASING 4,000%...

The dragoness's enlarged voice cascades through the halls as you hear her giggle happily; the cracks web out wider and wider, as the ship starts to shudder.

CAUTION...MASS INCREASING...%8,000...%9,000...EVACUATE SHIP...ALL HANDS...EVACUATE SHIP...

S...she absorbs water! What have you done!? You panic, tumbling backwards, as her body erupts free of the Solarium, shattering it in a rolling wave of wet reptilian body mass. Her flippers shoot out and tear through the bordering hallway, her head punching up clear through the roof of the mid-deck you're on. Her growing weight forces an increasingly deep dent in the floor. You look up from the mad display of size as her head forces itself back down into your deck, and she click-clicks lovingly at you, curiously regarding how small you are to her now. Untold hundreds of feet of sea dragoness begin to tremble and bulge out even larger, her body consuming all space available nearby, and you race to the elevators, hammering frantically at the buttons...
15533222211222.title: Go to the Solarium, for some major water absorp...

choices: Honey follows as you drift to a nearby blue (water) planet
Honey guides you to another planet, swimming through space
155332222112221.content:
Original author: Growasaur

Your finger nearly breaks the UP button on the elevator, you're hammering away so hard at it. Behind you, the snaps and clangs and pops of tubing, roofing and sheared metal plates combine with the hiss of steam and the whine of klaxon, all coalescing into a wild roar of sounds, suggesting the ship might break apart any second--and yet, over that all, comes the loving warble and purr of the sea dragoness, as she fills more and more of the ship. Her slick, wet sides bulge bigger into support beams and hallway corners and delivery transit shafts, only to tremble and burst even larger, dominantly shoving all forms of construction away as you hear her coo and balloon loudly in size.

Just as you wish there were stairs nearby, the elevator finally opens, and you rush in just in time to spot her gigantic eye batting softly, as she watches you leave. You hear something close to a giggle, before her rumbling intensifies, and you hear the wall space where you just were crumple and crash apart.

"...Love...you..." a strange, near-human voice echoes, like some gigantic ghost, down below. Gods, had she just managed some rough speech!? You only have so much time to think on it, as the elevator door whizzes open, and you bolt out towards the escape pods. Again, you hammer away wildly at the sequencing activation button, until the circular doors whirl open in different directions. You climb in, just as that same voice echoes out into the ship, reverberating everywhere:

"Love you! Love you! Don't...l...leaaave..."

Your heart swells. It really IS her! She's picked up speech, overnight! She doesn't sound sad, really; she sounds much more like a giggly little kid, egging a companion to stick around and play more. Your helmet and suit are already on, when you step in fully, entering the pod, as the doors close, and you shoot out into space. Turning on the intercom channel link, you speak through your helmet's headset:

"I love you too, honey! I'm outside of the ship now, but I'm still close by! Okay?"

"Hon...honey...Honey!" you hear her boom back into the ship's speaker system, her voice overflowing with glee.

"Haha...yeah. Honey. That's your new name, okay?" You forgo yelling at her over the ship, since you technically are the one who made her start growing so massive. Sure enough, with another stretching noise over the intercom, you watch as Honey starts to force the ship's organic plated exterior bulge out more and more, and more...until, at last, and with no sound, the entire giant ship bursts completely apart, leaving only the utterly monstrous-sized sea dragoness floating there, in space. Good lord...going off the ship's rough specs, she was easily a quarter of a mile in size!!! Incredible!

"Hi! Hi! See you!" her voice crackles over the intercom. She must have swallowed the intercom system whole, it must have been a part of the ship that hadn't broken to bits...

"Hi, Honey! Yes, I see you too!"

"I'm...big!!!"

"You uh...certainly are! You're so amazingly huge!"

"Heehee! Made me huge! Love you!"

You blush inside your helmet, watching in silent awe as she looms closer to your pod. You caution her gently not to hurt it, and she nods and smiles wide. Her had alone vastly outsizes even the pod, it being more the size of her huge, beautiful eyes, which blink as she regards you happily.

"What...now?" she asks, at length. It's sure a fair question! You have some rations tucked into the pod's emergency kit, and some water, so you should be okay awhile...but not forever...

"Well, the thrusters are intact on the pod, so...we just need to find a new place to land!"
155332222112221.title: Head up to the escape pods on the top deck! You...

choices: It's an alien ship--and they don't look too friendly...
It's a life-sustaining planet! But it seems abandoned and rocky...
1553322221122212.content:
Original author: Growasaur

The thruster still have some fuel, thank goodness...but there's absolutely nothing out there to find, let alone land on...you quietly burn off a little worry, hoping you can find something before the food and water runs out. Luckily, thanks to the genetic coding, it looks like Honey can live perfectly well in the cold vacuum of space. If anything, she looks totally ecstatic.

"Where do you want to go, master?" she asks, her voice crackling through the intercom; as she queries, you can see her flexible reptilian jaw moving up and down, making you grin. It's just a liiiitle difficult to feel doomed around her.

"Well, I dunno, Honey," you start, clearing the worry out of your throat. "The fuel for the thrusters should hold out for days, and the same goes for the food, if I'm stingy. Hey, wait--what about you? Aren't you...you know, hungry or something?"

"No, my belly is happy. I'm happy too!"

"Heh, well, alright, glad you two are fine. Whichever way we head...it had better have a close-by planet, or I'm toast."

"Humans turn into bread!?" she balks, making you smack your head--er, helmet, with a palm.

"No, I won't turn into bread. It's just an expression. But seriously, luck had better be on my side, whichever way we go...otherwise...there won't be any coming back froooOOOAH!"

A soft but noticeable impact shakes the pod, as you look out to see nothing but a splay of yellow and a little blue. You can't see worth a thing, but you can feel you're moving.


"Which way should I take you?" she chirps into the intercom.

"Oh...right! Duh, of course! Just keep going straight, Honey, thank you!"

You suddenly feel fairly stupid--of course she could move you, and spare the use of fuel. You smile and set remove the helmet, taking a moment to thump appreciatively on the window pane. Clearly, the vibrations reach the other side, tickling her sea dragoness belly:

"Eeeeeheeehee!"

"What, you like that?"

"Do it again, again!"

Shrugging, you play a little drum solo on the window, and the intercom explodes with laughter. On and on you drum, until you finally need to lay back in your seat, and rest a little. You tell Honey you need a nap, after all the shock of losing the ship. She guiltily replies in the affirmative, and before you nod off, you tell her none of the ship's destruction was her fault. You hope she's nodding out there, because you mean it...

...


"Master...master? Wake up, please?"

Your eyes flutter open, to the foggy sight of Honey pushing at the window--all of her, that is. She must only be three feet tall now!

"H-honey!?" you stammer, sputtering awake. "What happened? Why are you so tiny again?"

"Well...I think I burned off all that water I absorbed! I've been pushing you for over a day..."

"A day!? Why didn't you wake me up?"

"Well, you were talking in your sleep, and I liked listening, because it felt like you were with me--I mean, big like me, and hugging me, like when I was first born!"

"Awww...well...you can stop pushing, then. Here, lemme put my helmet on, and you can get in, okay?"

That very series of events happens, and in moments the door seals shut again, and you now have a two-foot Honey wiggling around in your lap.

"Warm, warm! It's warm!"

That's the heater! And my own heat, a little bit. You still not hungry or anything?"

"No, I haven't gotten hungry yet. Should I tell you when I do?"

"Please, that'd be fine, Honey. You're a good girl, you know that?"

She bumps her head up under your chin, sighing loudly, her long tail whipping dumbly about. You laugh, and unscrew a bottled water from your kit to take a drink, when a few little bits float free, bumping and splashing apart on Honey's head.

"Oops! Sorry, Honey! Lemme wipe that up..."

Too late! The water's absorbed, and Honey balloons about ten inches larger, her little body swelling a little bit larger into you. You wince, hoping it stops there...and, after another two inches, she seems to end it, huffing happily.

"Mmmmmm!" her bigger tail thump-thumps too close to the ejector button.

"Oop, mind the controls! Here, why don't you take a nap, this time? I'm not going anywhere, so why don't you enjoy your break? I'll turn the thrusters on, and keep guiding us further. I'm sure we'll hit something soon!"

She's already asleep, so you hush up, and turn on the propulsion system. As the thruster warm up, you just lean back in your chair and grin, stroking on her like she's a kitten. She even starts to work up a low, lizard-like rumble, smiling as you pet her in her sleep.

You stare out into space as you pet Honey, just wondering and hoping if or when you'd find some inhabitable place to land. The comm system whrrs through channel after channel, and no one from control seems to be responding to your messages, as you whisper them, so as not to wake up Honey. She twists and wiggles and stretches and sighs, like some scaly blue cat, her fins perking all over as she smiles. She's shrunken back down to 3.5 feet by now...maybe she's dreaming of being even bigger?

Three hours later, and a little red light to the side of the console begins blinking rapidly. Something's being picked up by the motion sensors on the exterior!!
1553322221122212.title: Honey guides you to another planet, swimming th...

choices: Stand down and prepare to be boarded...for now, that is.
Aw, heck no! Get Honey B.I.G., and NOW!!
15533222211222121.content:
Original author: TheCrimsonFreak

With a smooth, practiced series of taps and slides on one of the console's touch-screens, you call up the reading...the readings look like an energy spike, and gravity being warped around something fierce! But there was nothing out there, your escape pod was alone!

...Right?

Tearing your eyes away from the console, you look up towards the viewscreen--
And see a patch of space off to starboard twist, bend, and distort as another ship comes tearing out of the anomoly, space snapping back to order behind it.

Oh. Right. You were looking at an FTL (Faster Than Light) signature just a moment ago, from this very ship. So, you weren't just going to keep drifting through the void, hoping for a livable planet to turn up. That was the good news.

...The bad news, was that this new ship looked nothing like your old home. You couldn't see the whole thing--it easily dwarfed your puny escape pod, and had jumped in rather close to you--but you recognized weapon mounts when you saw them. And this alien ship had some BIG guns...and missile tubes...and plasma cannons. Also, you were fairly sure that you saw hangar decks arrayed along the port side and lower spine, meaning this thing was probably some kind of carrier/battleship hybrid.

In other words, this ship was armed to the teeth, and then some...and it didn't look like humans made it, nor by any of the alien races mankind had met and befriended over the years.

Somehow, I don't think this is a rescue party... Goes through your mind as you gulp.

As if to confirm that, a growling voice snarls from the comm--twinged with a slight computerized monotone, indicating it was being translated; either by your ship's hardware, or some device the alien had:

"Human escape pod on heading Zero-Five-Seven, respond to this transmission at once! We know where you are, and have you outgunned!" They weren't bluffing: a quick glance at the console confirmed you were being tracked by the ship's sensors...and the targeting systems. No lock-ons, but they DID have you in their cross-hairs.

Gulping again, you pick up the headset and respond, "Er, Escape pod on heading Oh-Five-Seven responding...who am I speaking with?"

There's a series of hisses and growls from the other end...was that alien laughing at you? If he was, it sounded rather sinister...worthy of a decent super-villain, at least.

"Ha! You don't know?! Poor sap...you have the pleasure of talking to Kaxx Io, the best pirate in this whole blasted galaxy! Now, why don't you just sit tight while I send over a boarding party, hmm? Then, you and I can have a chat--mostly about how you managed to wreck a top-of-the-line colony ship all on your lonesome, and cost me some prime loot that I've been tracking for days!! Oh, and don't think of jumping to FTL and escaping--my guns can charge faster than your engines." With one last snarl, the transmission is cut.

Your head hits the console, hard. Unbelievable! Some pirate had been stalking your ship for days; that was bad enough, but now he'd been deprived of his prize, and had you and Honey cornered like rats!

Honey...you look back at the sea dragon, still snuggling nicely in bed despite all the racket. You really don't want this pirate to get his hands on her, especially if his goons somehow find out she came from the Creation Chamber--to say that humanity was tight-lipped about that piece of tech would be putting it mildly. Not even Earth's closest, most longtime allies had been let in on the secret.

And if some thug like Kaxx got his hands/claws/tentacles on it...

You look up, head still on the console, and see some shuttlecraft--no, gunships--fly out of a hangar bay and angle towards you. Great, just great...in all the infinite vastness of space, the sheer insane size of the cosmos, you had to run into a pirate with a grudge against you, after one day's flight in an escape pod.

As much as you love and adore Honey, you think that that Creation Chamber has brought you the worst luck in the universe.

But the question remains: What to do about Kazz and his pirate minions?
15533222211222121.title: The Worst Luck In The Universe?

choices: Keep Honey at her current size
Grow her back up to seven feet tall
15533222211222122.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Grinning slightly, you use the touchscreens built into the console to bring up an image of what had been detected.

An image of a grey-brown planet meets your eyes. Raising an eyebrow, you look at the image more closely, realising that the planet's exterior was cracked and riddled with pockmarks and meteorites impact sites. Well, it certainly wasn't the most ideal world... but it'd have to do. One major problem was the lack of any visible water on the planet's surface. Granted, there could be water on the other side, but it'd take too long to reach.

Right, you know the planet is there. Now you just need atmospheric data and you can have the console calculating an entry vector while you sleep - automatically calculating entry vectors was a notoriously slow, if utterly reliable process. Given how you weren't an expert pilot, you didn't feel like risking everything just so you could make planetfall a few hours earlier.

As you cratch and pet Honey, something suddenly occurs to you. It had been several hours since you last ate when you used the Creation Chamber, creating Honey. After that, you had gone to sleep, immediately escorting Honey to the solarium when you woke up. After that, you had gone to gather food, water, and so on, dropping your supplies when Honey's ship destroying growth had started. Then, when you had entered the escape pod and gone to sleep after several minutes of conversing with and drumming on Honey's then massive body, sleeping for a standard day according to Honey.

That meant you had gone almost two days without food.

And you didn't feel hungry in the slightest. Come to think of it, that small sip of water was the only drink you'd had in the same time period.

Frowning slightly, you look down at Honey's sleeping form. Honey herself had never eaten once sonce she was born. A d she had reported being completely content when you had asked her if she was hungry. Perhaps Honey's presence somehow nullified your need for food and water, to a major extent? You usually got pretty hungry after just seven or so hours, let alone two entire days!

So, not only were you in the company of a Chamber-created water dragoness who seemingly didn't need food or drink, and could easily shrug off the freezing vacuum of space... but you seemed to be somehow receiving these two properties from her? This would be interesting, to put it lightly.

Looking back to the touchpad, you realise that atmospheric analysis and vector calculation would take, in total, about twelve hours.

Huffing, you think about going back to sleep. It would pass the time, and if your hupothesis about no longer needing food or drink was correct, then no resources would be lost as a result of abnormal amounts of sleep.

As Honey begins to slowly wake up, you decide that you're going to go to sleep, hugging her like the 'day' she was born. The question was, does she stay at this size, or do you grow her back up to seven feet tall to serve as a warm, scaly bed of sorts?
15533222211222122.title: The Barren Planet

choices: Honey's getting even bigger, somehow! She'll blow apart the pod!!
Honey's finally getting hungry--what lousy timing!
155332222112221222.content:
Original author: Growasaur

Was it the scenario driving your hunger away, or was said hunger actually gone? It was a good question. As Honey moves about in your one arm, you use the other to fish a food packet out of the kit attached to the wall. You work the pull tab with your teeth, then take some experimental gulps of the fruit gel within, just to see what happens.

...Well, it seems good enough, and your stomach still feels fine. The only thing the action really resolves is that food hasn't been rendered bad for you, or anything. The only real thing you feel, funny enough, is cold...but that shouldn't be the case; the heating system in the pod should have been nominal. Yet, as the soft drone of the vent dies off and sputters, you wait in bridled horror, hoping beyond hope that the heating unit hasn't gone out or died on you.

"Oh, no," you mutter, as Honey stretches in your grip, then yawns, her cute little jaws opened wide as she makes a little squeaking chirp.

"Wh-what is it?" the sea dragoness asks, blinking her big little eyes up at you. Already, you're starting to shiver involuntarily, even though you're trying to put up a bold front. "It feels cold in here again!"

"Y-yeah, well...the heating unit's dead, it looks like," you sigh, seeing your breath cloud out into the open. The insulation in the pod is the only reason I haven't frozen to death."

"Death!?" Honey nearly wails, suddenly breathing in and out nervously. "But you can't die, master! You can't! Please don't!"

"Honey, Honey, calm down," you gently say, shushing her quietly with a big, loving snuggle. "I'm not going to die, okay? In fact, you can keep me from danger. Will you help me out?"

"O-of course, master, yes! What do I do?"

"Just stay here, against me. You're still warm, so I need you to cover me up for a little while, until we land on the charted planet, alright?" Already you've removed the water bottle. You motion for her to open wide, and you gently pour a quarter of the bottle into Honey's open maw, the sweet little creature drinking obediently. "After a few hours, take some more water, so you stay giant."

With every gulp, she balloons out, groaning loudly, as her hide pulls tighter over more inflating mass. She gets bigger and bigger, warmer and warmer, inch after inch of her rubbery, soft body creeping over you; in a minute, she's over seven feet in size, her snuggly form completely blanketing you over. She smiles and presses herself on you tenderly.

"Is that good?" she asks, almost purring.

You try to respond, but her bulk smothers the words out. Instead, you rub on her belly affectionately, making her giggle and sigh happily. Even if the heating system kicked back into gear, you might just stay buried under her like this.

...



You awake to the hard thud of the landing gear as it settles. Land--you must have landed on the planet's surface, at last! Honey had fallen asleep as well, the water bottle still in her muzzle as she snoozes against you. She's insanely heavy...you feel around, realizing she must have overdone it, and gotten way too big at one point, during your sleep; she must nearly fill the pod! Eventually, you squirm your way out from her warm bulk, working your way to your helmet (just in case), which you put on before you wiggle out of the pod door.

The landscape seems to rocky and desolate--yet the readings confirm that you can, indeed, breathe the air in the atmosphere, so you take a collecting breath and remove the helmet. Sure enough, you can take in the air! Whew!

"Master," a husky, heavy female voice peeps, from inside the pod. You turn to see Honey's head poking out of the pod, her head titling at you as though she were a curious dog.

"Honey, you're up! Look, we hit land!"

"Yay!" the gigantic sea dragoness rumbled, shaking the pod. "I'll join you!"

"Well, wait a little while, and shrink back down; can't have you bursting the thing apart."

"Aww...what should I do, in the meantime?"

"I really should get a feel for the lay of the land," you start, making her shake the pod worse in protest.

"Oh, no, don't leave me here alone!"

"Okay, okay--well...why don't I look at the heating unit, while you shrink down?"

As you make your way to the pod, and unscrew the panel to the external unit, to tinker around with the wiring, you feel the pod begin to rumble a bit, and rather ominously so.

"Did you feel that, Honey?"

"That...was me..." the giant reptile rumbles, embarrassed, as you feel another rumble, and another...
155332222112221222.title: Grow her back up to seven feet tall

choices: Honey stops growing at 250 feet, and you look for shelter
Honey just keeps growing as you watch--how big can she freaking swell!?
1553322221122212221.content:
Original author: Growasaur

Thousands of years of intellect straining to best the world around it.

Millions of minds working together, expanding the core base of knowledge, advancing theories that would boggle any dreamer towards reality.

Progress that we as a species had once never dared to conceive of, breeding unfathomable technologies across the world, and throughout the ageless cosmos.

Right now, all it boiled down to was:

"NNNNNRRRRGHFGHLLLBL!"

Honey, a rare product of such mammoth intellect and design, was stuck in a big ball, and was flailing with such vigor that the pod she filled rocked and moaned its escalating distress. Being stuck on this odd new world with the gigantic sea serpent-thing, and having no other way off of it that was currently knowable, you react in kind:

"HONEYNOOOOO!"

The box of wiring you had been fooling with before Honey's trembling rumbles grew so bad flies off, still in your hands, as you thud backwards onto the soil; the remainder of the pod's exterior plating pops and splits, metallic segments exploding free from the frame, which reveals Honey's form as she bulges angrily against it. Yeah...she's still growing.

"Sorry, Master, sorry!" she groans, amidst a few ill-placed (but impossible to restrain) huffs of bliss. Her reptilian bulk pumps and swells all the more, burrrrssssting slowly and surely against the frame, further warping it, as her thickening neck forces her head higher and higher up. "I...I can't stop!"

"Well, don't panic," you start, as her groans, interior and exterior, get more and more pronounced, loud, and long. "Just stay cool, okay?"

"Okay!"

The groans grow worse.

"...My temperature's pretty nominal, I think! Now what?"

"I didn't meant literally cool! I just meant don't panic!"

As if bred from some unspoken impatience, the frame gives, blowing apart with a screech of steel and plastics, bits and science-y bric-a-brac flying all about the area. The smoke clears, and a whopping 50-foot Honey looms over you, looking herself over. She peers at you like a dog about to be scolded for swiping a sweet, sweet cookie off the counter.

"Are you mad?" she peeps, her teeny voice in no way properly-reflecting her gigantic size.

"No...I mean, it was probably our one way off this place...and without some power source, this box I have, which DOES contain a distress beacon, is useless..."

"We had a distress thingie?" Honey asks, doing the ophidian equivalent of a balk.

"We couldn't use it then, it was already out of juice, Honey. I would have tried it otherwise. Maintenance on all the pods had been scheduled for later, since a few things needed fixing."

"Well, won't they try and find us, when you don't report in?"

"Sure...and they'll look where we were supposed to be, not here. Not unless we get this puppy working."

"PUPPY!?" Honey gasps. "WE HAVE A LITTLE DOG HERE?"

"Lord..." you sigh, squaring up your shoulders, "not a real puppy. The box. This box, here, that I'm holding, sweetie, it's what I was talking about. We...I need to go over slang with you, soon. I know you came built-in with some rough knowledge, which is great..."

"I'm smart," she peeps again, nearly blushing. You wince, then correct course.

"No, you are, Honey, I know. You're wonderful."

You give her belly a soft pat, and she giggles, before she begins tingling again. With something akin to a low hiccup, Honey begins to swell out even larger, yet again, her sleek hide stretching loudly as she closes her eyes and smiles, ballooning out bigger and bigger against you. She ripples like a water balloon being filled at the tap, on high, her sides getting wider, her back rising higher, and her cute neck growing thicker and longer as she towers further up over you.

"Before you ask...I dunno!" Honey sputters, beating you to the punch. You wobble and step back in time with her growth, trying not to get bowled over as she inflates past 60 feet...then 65...

"While I was asleep, what'd you actually consume!? Just the bottle of water, right?"

"Welllll..." Honey huffs, nervously looking around.

"Seriously, Honey, what did you have? Something else?"

"I may have gotten just a tiny bit peckish, and didn't want to wake you," she murmured, clearing her rumbly throat. "And, uh...I may have nommed up a packet of dried food and...what are those pills, that were packaged with it?"

Your stomach drops to your ankles, attempting to dig through and into the world's crust.

"Those...are time-release capsules! Those auto-hydrate throughout a time period! How many did you have!? Please, please, don't say--"

"All of them. Kind of. For sure."

"Those keep releasing water into the system for 12 hours, A CAPSULE!"

With another hiccup, Honey bulges up to 80 feet, then 100, getting rounder and heavier as her body outpaces her neck and head; her flippers grow and grow, her bulging tail thumping uselessly around on the dirt as she covers more and more ground.

"W--well, how big will that make me, Master?"

"VERY!"

"...Ooh," she giggles, obviously not hating the notion so much; she sees your look, then her celebratory little giggle crumbles into an apologetic little wheeze. 110 feet...130 feet...150 feet...

"Okay, it's done, fine. If we can't find some cave or cover to lodge in, I'll need to use your body as a cover!"

"Neat! I can be more help to you, then!"

"Yeah, it's great beyond words," you sigh. Honestly...it's kind of a cute image, in your head. "So, we see how far you grow before the first capsule wears off, then we get shelter taken care of, then we look for something to power up this pup--er, box."

"What if all the capsules work at me, at once?"

You blink, then hang your head. God help you both, if she's right about that...because if she is, she's barely even begun to grow bigger...
1553322221122212221.title: Tea With Honey

1553322222221111.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

It was a bright, sunny afternoon when you decide that it was time to dig out the old yearbooks from the attic to remember the glory days of high school. As you are stumbling and looking through the numerous boxes, something black, dusty, and worn catches your eye. Atop a box to your right is an old tome covered in dust that looks like it has gone through some wear and tear over the years.

Your heart leaps for a moment; you couldn't believe it. You had been looking for this book for years!

You first got the book about 10 years ago while traveling abroad in Asia. To this day you still can't remember the town's name or the little roadside shop's that you got it at. However, you do remember browsing through the items before your tour guide gave a loud gasp and pointed to the book with the black cover emblazoned with strange symbols. The guide tried to explain it to you with his local language, but you simply shrugged your shoulders. A little exasperated, he seemed to be trying to think of the correct English words. "Big!" he said, motioning the rising of something with his arms. "Big!" Off-putted a bit from his motions and word choice, you figured it must be important enough to buy as a rare souvenir of sorts, and so you payed the merchant with the local currency and brought it home.

Now you had finally found it, it must have been up here all these years! You pick it up, blow off the dust, and open the worn and leathery pages. You are surprised to see that all the pages appear blank; you could have sworn there was ancient writing in it before. Disregarding this, you make the decision to use the book to write your short stories in: You were an aspiring writer after all.

That night you open the book upon your desk and turn on the desk light. You put your pen to your lip, thinking about what to write about. After thinking for a couple of minutes your pet golden retriever, Bailey, comes into the room, tail wagging and a grin upon his face before he stands up to nuzzle your arm.

Just then, your mind seems to race incredibly fast before becoming very clear again in a short amount of time. Perplexed, you watch as your hand starts to write on the page of the book on its own accord.

Your hand underlines the title "My Much Bigger Bailey." It's the strangest thing that has ever occurred to you: it was as if someone else was writing the words down, like the pathway between your mind, arm and hand was being controlled like a puppet by some unknown force. However, and perhaps even stranger, you instantly knew that this force was benevolent and not anything bad or evil. It was there to help you, to guide you through your stories. You couldn't decipher the meaning of the title much either. Then, your hand starts to write again:

"Tonight, my dog Bailey will become even more intelligent, and then have a growth spurt."

You wait for a moment in anticipation, looking at your dog, before:
1553322222221111.title: Bigger Bailey

choices: "Every growth spurt Bailey has will be bigger than the last."
"Every time Bailey grows, your other pet dog, Melanie, will grow too."
15533222222211111.content:
Original author: Bluecrystal12

"Hello, master! Hello! It's nice to finally be able to speak to you!" comes a deep voice.

You rub your eyes and stare, wanting to make sure that what just happened was real. And indeed it was: Your own golden retriever had just spoken to you! "B...Bailey? Was that you? What just happened?...And how come you can talk!??" you blurt out, a little clueless about the change of events even though the mystical tome was open and written in right in front of you. The book's pages had also started to glow faintly, although you only noticed out of the corner of your eye as you stare at your dog, open-mouthed.

"Hehe, but master, don't you remember that I've been able to talk ever since you got me as a puppy?" Bailey says happily, resting his right paw on your shoulder and licking your face affectionately. "Besides, you've always known I was smart, haven't you?" he laughs.

"Don't get me wrong Bailey, I just wasn't expecting you to be this smart!" you say, managing a smile.

Just then the floor began to creak, and you look around for the source of the rumbling as Bailey smiles at you still. "I just feel like I have all this untapped power within me! And I feel that I have this ability...an ability to grow bigger, much, MUCH bigger! Just for you, master. And haven't you always wanted a bigger, stronger dog?"

And with that, Bailey closed his eyes and began to shudder and slowly grow bigger and bigger and biiigger, the source of the rumbling confirmed. His body vibrated and expanded, filling up more and more of the room. His huge paws and frontside slowly swelled into you, pushing you back to the wall along with your writing desk. Bailey's backside grew and grew further, closing in on the opposite wall, pushing aside chairs, tables, and CD racks. The top of his head threatened to crash through the ceiling at any moment. He must have been 12 feet tall by now! The dog finally opened his eyes once more and smiled down at you, his tongue lolling out happily as he panted a bit. "Pretty big, huh master! And I can still feel even more power in me!"

Before you could respond, your writing arm is drawn to the book again, and your hand continues the larger-than-life story: "Confused as you undoubtedly were, you couldn't help but stare in wonder and admiration at your bigger pet. Even though you were surprised and baffled, you couldn't deny that there was some part of you that wanted to see your golden retriever get even bigger..." You finish writing the first small paragraph, and then your hand starts to write the beginning of the second:
15533222222211111.title: Bailey starts to speak before he grows!

choices: "They're about to outgrow the house, just for you, their master!"
"You now have another pet, in your living room - and she's about to grow!"
155332222222111112.content:
Original author: Infinity421

"Every time Bailey grows, your other pet dog, Melanie, will grow too."

Your writing hand patiently waits for a few seconds before setting down the pen of its own accord, then returning control of itself to you. You hear a rumbling from a different part of the boys as Melanie, your pet Dalmatian, grows like Bailey. Before you know it, Melanie has torn through the door into your room, the now seven feet tall Dalmatian eagerly licking all over you. Now that she is in the room with Bailey, she slowly grows to the same massive scale, her rear firmly pushing against the wall, her head cracking the ceiling slightly, and her muzzle blowing up into you by leaving you enough space to sit at your desk as the two giant canines happily pant and poll their tongues about, desiring nothing more than growth, playtime, growth, maybe walkies, and more growth.

Your hand autonomously picks up the pen and begins to write again, with you watching what it writes.

"You can't help but be impressed at the massive size of your canine companions, and can't wait for them to grow more! But, hold on..."
155332222222111112.title: Big Bailey and Massive Melanie
