15533222222222211211.content:
Original author: Infinity421

Angel giggles loudly as her body pulses larger, her muzzle pushing into your head and chest as she slowly begins to expand again. "Angel, stop this right now! You're already bigger than you need to be!" But Angel doesn't listen, instead nuzzling you rather forcefully as she grows, her doggy butt pushing against the wall, her tail being force upwards as her sides approach the two other walls, and licks you with a tongue that gets a few centimetres longer and wider with each lick.

The ceiling creaks as Angel's back pushes up into it, facing the same predicament as the walls and floor as Angel fills to room the the brim, accidentally pinning you to the wall with her big muzzle. "Heh, sorry, master...-" Angel's voice is so loud it causes the walls to shake slightly when she speaks, and lurches bigger again, her entire back pushing against the slowly relenting ceiling. "-but you're just not big enough to protect yourself, there are too many things that might hurt you!" Her eyes look deep into you as she bulges bigger and bigger, applying huge amounts of pressure but not harming you in away way as you are slowly pushed into the wall, her sweet, loud voice sounding extremely concerned for a second before switching to a confident tone. "But if I can just grow enough, bigger and bigger and bigger-" she spurts larger suddenly, her back pushing up into the second floor, her sides smooshing into the walls, her muzzle completely pinning you to the wall, and her butt crashing through the wall, and into the dining room. "-then I'll be able to protect you, from ANY threat, because I'll be sooo big, that nothing can hurt me or you!"

Angel backs her muzzle up a few inches, and it is all you need to throw yourself to the side and crawl out of the room as Angel giggles, the walls shaking, before she spurts so large that hr back pushes clear into your headroom upstairs, her muzzle crashes into, then through, the wall it had pinned you to, her sides exert more and more pressure on the walls, and her rear end continue to grow through into the dining room, her tail and butt already through the wall and growing into the room.

Angel's growth suddenly spikes, pushing her body through each immediate wall, and giving her space to move slightly as her rump takes up half of the dining room, her muzzle flows into your primary office, and her sides blow up and out.

Angel sighs contentedly, wagging her huge tail so hard that it cracks and dents the walls it thumps into. "Master, look at me! I'm almost fifteen feet tall now!"

"Mmmf!"

Angel looks down and giggles nervously, sighting where she had accidentally trapped you under a massive paw. She removes the paw and helpfully nudges you into a standing position.

You are about to speak when Angel interrupts you.

"There's something about this size, master... I can keep watch over you and keep you safe, play with you, maybe you can take me on walkies, but..."
15533222222222211211.title: A Bigger Guardian Angel

choices: They'll need to be several miles tall, at the minimum!
Even planet-sized is too small to protect you!
155332222222222112112.content:
Original author: Infinity421

"...Okay, Angel. I guess I can't stop you from growing, then... Just try not to damage anything else, please?"

"I'll try, master! But being able to protect you has to come first, I'm sure you'll understand..."

Chuckling, you rub Angel's muzzle with a comparatively tiny hand. She'd always been rather protective of you. Angel giggles, gently swelling a few inches larger, her paws slowly creeping out a few more inches.

"I understand, Angel... although I'm pretty confused about everything happening right now..."

Angel giggles again, the sound shaking the walls of your house. "Well, master, in that case I think I'll have to explain everything to you..."

"You've heard the saying that dogs are man's best friend, haven't you master?" Of course you had, that phrase was saturated into pretty much everything. "Well, we view ourselves as more than man's best friend. In our language, your word 'dog' translates to either 'protector' or 'guardian'..."

This explained Angel's behaviour to a degree. But you still had questions.

"Okay... but Angel, I don't need protecting. Certainly not to this degree-" you gesture to Angel's body, which was undoutedly holding most of the house up, her body having grown into the first floor during her spurt. "-and besides, this is the UK. One of the safest countries on Earth. And if I do need protection, then I'm pretty sure my cricket bat will suffice."

Angel doesn't look convinced, however. If anything, she only seems more concerned. "No, master, you do need protection! Think about how much you hurt yourself just walking around the house!" Angel was referring to your annoying habit of stub of your toes on pretty much anything. It was extremely irritating, so say the least. "And think of that time you broke your arm! If I was bigger, I could have taken care of you!"

You begin to rub Angel's muzzle in the hope of calming her down, but she only seems to grow more and more frightened for your safety. "You're not big enough to protect yourself, master! None of us are big enough to protect our masters! We need to be BIGGER!" Angel roars, dust and plaster falling from the ceiling. Wait, 'none of us are big enough'... Uh oh. Managing to slip away from Angel's already bulging muzzle, you run up the stairs to the first floor, coming to the landing, which you knew had a window that let you see outside.

Half a dozen dogs, all far larger than they ought to be, met your eyes. Here, one that was a 'mere' eight feet tall; there, one matching Angel's size; another three dogs had burst out of their homes, plaster falling from their expanding frames as they walked, carrying their masters to different areas. And the largest of them all, looming over the horizon, was a titanic golden retriever, his mile tall form bulging and stretching and GROWING with each heavy breath, as the dog continues to fill more and more of the skies.

Gulping, you hear Angel's muzzle crash out of the house, and she begins to talk in that loud, yet protective and concerned roar again. "SEE, MASTER? NONE OF US ARE BIG ENOUGH YET!"

It is then that you make the mistake of asking just how big would be big enough. The answer you receive, is of course, that...
155332222222222112112.title: The Fluffy Protector

choices: Shudders and starts to vibrate. They're all about to grow again!
Suggests they all meet up with the Retriever. The streets are getting cramped!
1553322222222221121122.content:
The whole house started violently shaking as Angel began to laugh. Her bulging flank crashes through the wall behind you, the flimsy construct obliterated by the growing canine, as her back slams into the ceiling. The ceiling valiantly resists for just under three seconds before it's completely pulverized by Angel's massive body.

As alarmingly huge cracks begin to appear in the rest of the plaster, you decide to make your escape before the house collapses and you are trapped in the rubble. As soon as you finish that thought you wonder what, if anything, Angel could or would do to help you if that happened and how she would feel being the one who outgrew the building in the first place. Although by that point, you've already scrambled down the stairs and have the key in the lock of the front door, which fortunately rather renders that contemplation moot.

You're glad to be on the ground floor by now, as when you yank the door open, the noise of the house collapsing around Angel's expanding form reaches your ears. You immediately dive out of the door and sprint down the path, turning to gaze upon the awesome sight of a Husky outgrowing a two-story house as Angel's head - her thick, muscular neck now completely outside of the house - turns to look at you - her eyes filled with love and adoration - and her furiously wagging tail and backside creeps ever closer to the neighbouring house as the roof begins to tremble.

The roof bulges upwards in an unnatural manner as slates begin to slide off, shattering against the ground.

Suddenly, the house falls unnervingly still, the only sound you can hear in your tunnel-vision state is the sound of your titan of a husky panting deeply.

Then the roof bulges. Once.

Twice.

All at once, Angel's back bursts explosively out of the roof; tiles and guttering thrown this way and that way as the walls collapse in near synchronization, a cloud of dust billowing up, hiding her huge frame from sight.

You stumble back, bumping into the thick, muscled leg of the now 24-foot tall Pit Bull whom you had seen at only 8 feet just a few mere moments ago. It would seem that he - Buck; and his master Jessica, a doctor at the hospital - had come over to investigate the commotion.

"Oh my God! Are you okay?" She gasped, looking quickly between you and the ruins of your home, from beneath the shelter of Buck's huge, muscled chest.

"Yeah, I'm alright thanks, but what's happening? Angel just started talking, and then she started growing, and now she's bigger than the house!"

"I've got no idea! It was much the same with me, Buck just started nuzzling me and then he started going on about how he and other dogs were going to become our guardians, and suddenly, he's crushed the sofa under his body and he's still getting bigger! I'm lucky he actually left the house before he hit this growth spurt!"

Buck lets out a booming laugh, the sheer power of his baritone voice rattling manhole covers and setting off car alarms that hadn't already been activated by the thunderous, earth-shaking steps of the other canine giants.

"Well, that is our home Master! Although, I don't think it'll fit me anymore, and it definitely won't fit any of the others!" He grins, tail whipping around behind him, kicking up a breeze as he turns his gaze back to your house.

You turn to see a now 40-foot tall Angel shake the last of the dust from her stormy grey fur and trot towards you, panting happily all the while.

"Hey there Buck!" She rumbles excitedly.

"Angel!" He thunders. "I see you didn't let something as weak as a building stand in the way of you preparing to become a guardian!"

Angel laughs in response. "Well, you just took it a bit slower to start! No doubt you'll catch up soon though!" She laughs again, looking over at the other dogs.

You don't even have time to ask them how they're all growing like this, as your attention is grabbed by the other dogs as you follow Angel's gaze, noticing that the dog that had was just finishing a growth spurt and again matched Angel's size was a Doberman, clearly a male, easily identifiable at such a size. Now, what was his name? Stanley, if you remember correctly, and right now he was lying down, resting in front of what you could only presume was his home, a broad smile on his snout as he gently rested a huge paw on the roof of his owner's sedan - not applying force, just resting it there - while he animatedly spoke with his owner - Nathan, the cashier for that little bakery a little way up the road - and pointing out the other dogs.

Said dogs were the trio of canines who had outgrown their homes, each of them now towering above you at a height of what must have been at least 80 feet, their huge bodies so wide, they had to stand with their paws in multiple streets, their paws easily taking up the entire width, lest they crush any houses beneath said paws that sink into the tarmac, their huge, powerful torsos looming over the rooftops with a great amount of clearance.

The male German Shepherd, Simon's his name, you're sure of it, is gushing to his owner who's sitting on his nose - Keith, one of the salesmen at the Ford Showroom - about how easy it'll be to protect him and Lucy, his friend and the local joiner, especially now that the female Shepherd, Katie, is a 'Guardian' too, her tail wagging furiously, whipping up a wind behind her that was strong enough to shake parked cars, the ones whose alarms had timed out starting up again.

Those cars were under the expansive shadow of the towering Rottweiler, Lou, who's currently excitedly explaining to his owner, the local mechanic Grace, who was perched atop his head, what was happening. Although, before you could hear any semblance of an explanation as to why it was happening, your attention was grabbed by a shadow falling over the neighborhood.

Everyone in the street, and likely everyone hiding in their homes in panic and fear, all turn to see the sun being blotted out by the still-growing enormous Golden Retriever, his equally enormous grin beaming out across the land with his long tongue lolling out, his deep, heavy, thunderous breaths dissipating clouds and then reforming them with the heat and moisture of his breath.

As his head blocks out the last of the sun's light, his growth stops, leaving his looming form illuminated from behind like he was some sort of god, although considering how big he was, and how many laws of physics and biology he had to be defying with that alone, perhaps he, and by extension the other dogs, were.

You swallow thickly at that thought looking over at Angel. Could she be a goddess? You have to admit that the thought isn't exactly unappealing.

You look back to the Retriever, wondering what it must be like to be his owner, and then feel a thrill of concern as you wonder where he's sitting. You can only hope it's not in a populated area; the property damage would no doubt be in the billions, if not trillions.

Your attention is taken up by Angel, who leans down to gently nuzzle your tiny frame as she giggles softly. She stands up to her full height again and beams down at you. She...
1553322222222221121122.title: Even planet-sized is too small to protect you!

Hyper

It's a fact of nature that some animals are bigger than others - and some are big in more ways than one! Members so large their bodies seem small in comparison - bodies so monstrous and muscular that without all of that strength they'd be dozens of times smaller!

This scenario has just one requirement - the growing animal, or animals, must grow to be hyper or hyper-muscular - they can start off like this, or quite literally grow into it, but it must happen at some point. Other than that, go wild - everything else is up to you!

An even bigger adult shows up to assert dominance!
15533222222222222111.content:
You were a T-Rex, one that was a bit smaller than most by a couple feet, at about 9 feet tall to be exact. Though you felt pretty puny because of this, you had a large friend of yours who was a bit bigger than most already at about 14 feet. You and him had stuck together for a while now, but he always knew that your smaller stature was always a sore spot for you. One day, you notice your friend is late for a hunt you and him were gonna go on.

He is rushing over to you about a few minutes, holding something in his mouth. "Hey bud! I got shomting for you!" He says looking down at you happily. It looks like a strange leg of meat. "Did you go hunting without me?" You ask a bit sad. "Uh uh! Ish a meat piece my family found, shaid it had shome weird properties to it!" He says with the meat in his mouth still. "Weird...properties? Like what?" You ask confused. "I shink they shaid dat thish would make you bigger if you eat it!" he explains. You look at him, like he is just pulling your leg. "Yeah, sure. Just eat it so we can go hunting already." You say rolling your eyes. "Oh, guessh you need shome proof, huh? Okay!" he says, before biting the leg of meat in half, the other half falling to the ground.

You look at him for a few seconds and nothing seems to happen. "...See? Nothing happened. Now come on, let's-" You start before your friend moans loudly out of nowhere, giving you a bit of a jump. Before you can ask him why he had suddenly started moaning like that, you notice him shudder and before your eyes, grow a bit bigger. You jump back a bit, shocked and surprised, before he grunts and huffs and grows again, even more than last time. You are now looking even more up at him, as he stands at 15 feet and 9 inches tall. And you can't help but notice his dick is coming out of it's sheathe. And it looks bigger too. "Mmm, told you it'd do this!" He says grinning widely, before panting and moaning as he grew once more, making you take a couple more steps back. You were now starting to regret not taking him up on his initial offering. As he grows past 17 feet tall and still growing, what are you gonna do now?
15533222222222222111.title: The tiny T Rex and the Embiggening Meat

info.brief_description: It's back, and bigger than ever before!
info.description:
A good while ago, there used to be an interactive on this site called Giant Friendly Animals, created by Kardo, who left the site just over two years ago. As the name suggests, it focused on animals of all kinds growing - growing, and growing, with no end in sight - but remaining gentle, no matter what unimaginable sizes they reached.

Thanks to the efforts of another user who will remain unnamed unless they want to be mentioned directly, I came across a copy of a mostly complete archive of Giant Friendly Animals, and decided to start rebuilding it.

As such, the rules for this interactive will be as follows:

1. Stick to the content rating - E. Reveling in growth and power is okay, and innocent, harmless destruction is as well, but let's not have things like swearing, mature content, or detailed descriptions of gore, okay?
Please see the edit at the bottom of the page - this item's age rating has been changed to allow for a greater range of content, though the prohibition on gore still applies.

2. Try to keep choice chapters to a minimum- or, if they're necessary, type at least a couple of paragraphs for them. This way the interactive won't be clogged up with filler - though as I'll be directly copying the old interactive into this one, this rule will have to be bent to an extent.

3. If you want something in a chapter you've written to be edited, don't hesitate to ask me. Of course, if you want me to delete an entire storyline I might decline, but it's always worth at least making sure I know about your concerns.

4. Please try to keep your writing to at least a decent standard. I don't mind if your writing isn't that good, but at the very least it needs to be legible.

5. No fat or weight gain-related content is allowed.

6. Make sure to have fun - lots of endlessly, unstoppably, insatiably growing fun!

As a side note, all kinds of macro personalities are allowed - sweet and gentle, to greedy and power-hungry - so long as they remain gentle in their actions.

EDIT - 03/05/2020

After a conversation with a friend I've decided to make some changes to this interactive. First off, the age rating has been raised, to 'May Contain Graphic content'; this is for a reason - I have decided to allow depictions of both muscle and hyper growth in this interactive - just keep things relatively friendly, please!
